analyzed: prastāvanā

original: asminbharatakhaṇḍe khalvadyāvadhi bahavaḥ saṃskṛtagranthāḥ saṃśodhya mudraṇadvārā prākāśyaṃ nītāstatra tatra paṇḍitaprakāṇḍaiḥ /
analyzed: asmin bharatakhaṇḍe khalu adya avadhi bahavaḥ saṃskṛta granthāḥ saṃśodhya mudraṇa dvārā prākāśyam nītāḥ tatra tatra paṇḍita prakāṇḍaiḥ

original: tathāpi katicana prājīnāḥ prabandhāḥ prakāśanārhā api pustakakośeṣveva nilīnā vartante /

original: teṣāmanyatamo 'yaṃ kāvyālaṅkārasaṃgrahākhyaḥ prabandho yo 'dya mahatā prayatnena sahṛdayahṛdayavanodāya prakāśyate /
analyzed: teṣām anyatamaḥ yam kāvyālaṅkārasaṃgraha ākhyaḥ prabandhaḥ yaḥ mahatā prayatnena sahṛdaya hṛdaya vanodāya prakāśyate
asya kāvyālaṅkārasaṅgraha granthasya praṇetā udbhaṭa bhaṭṭaḥ
udbhaṭa bhaṭṭasya bhaṭṭa udbhaṭa audbhaṭa ācāryaḥ
nāma ullekhaḥ grantha antareṣu dṛśyate
udbhaṭa bhaṭṭa kaśmīreṣu jayāpīḍaḥ bhūpasya sabhāpatiḥ āsīt iti kalhaṇavaracata rājataraṅgiṇī granthāt avagamyate
jayāpīḍa nṛpati rājya kālaḥ tu khrista varṣam ārabhya varṣa paryantam āsīt iti jñāyate

original: atastatsabhāpaterudbhaṭabhaṭṭasyāpi jīvitasamayaḥ sa eveti viduṣāṃ nirṇayaḥ /

original: udbhaṭācāryeṇa kumārasaṃbhavākhyaṃ kāvyaṃ tathā bhāmahakṛtālaṅkāragranthasya vivaraṇaṃ ca viracitamāsīditi jñāyate /
analyzed: udbhaṭa ācāryeṇa kumārasaṃbhava ākhyam kāvyam tathā bhāmaha kṛta alaṅkāra granthasya vivaraṇam ca viracitam āsīt iti jñāyate

original: atra pramāṇaṃ tu asyāṃ laghuvṛttau “anena granthakṛtā khoparacitakumārasaṃbhavaikadeśo
analyzed: atra pramāṇam tu asyām laghu vṛttau anena granthakṛtā kha uparacita kumārasaṃbhava eka deśaḥ

original: ekadeśaśbada evaṃ vyākhyātaḥ“pṛ0 13 iti ca pratīhārendurājasyoktiḥ /

original: laghuvṛtteḥ prārambhopasaṃhārayoḥ sthitābhyāṃ nimnalikhitapadyābhyāṃ sphuṭaṃ bhavati /

original: padasamudāyātmakasya tu pādasya svarūpārthāviśeṣe tātparyabhedena punaruktau pādābhyāsaparipāṭyā svatantrapadāśrayo lāṭānuprāso bhavati /

original: pādābhyāsakrameṇa ceti kramagrahaṇena sakṛddvistriśca pādābhyāse ye bhedāḥ saṃbhavanti tatsvīkāreṇa pādābhyāse lāṭānuprāsasya pravṛttiḥ sūcitā

tathā hi

uttaraḥ tu bhramaṇa kriyā kartṛ bhūta ṣaṭpada ādhāra tvena

original: tathā pūrvaḥ ṣaṭpadaśabdo bhramaṇakriyāṃ prati kartṛtvenopavarṇitaḥ,
analyzed: tathā pūrvaḥ ṣaṭpada śabdaḥ bhramaṇa kriyām prati kartṛ tvena upavarṇitaḥ

mukhara śabdau tu
viśeṣaṇa bhūtam
sa śabda tvam bhinna artha niṣṭha tayā avagamayataḥ

apareṇa tu sārasa niṣṭham
evam ayam pada dvitaya paratantra śabda dvaya āśrayaḥ lāṭānuprāsaḥ bhihitaḥ

jita anyapuṣṭa kiñjalka kiñjalka śreṇi śobhitam

original: padāntarasya guṇavṛtterapareṇa padena yoge rūpakaṃ bhavati /

original: nanvevaṃ sati nīlamutpalamityatrāpi nīlaśabdasya guṇavṛtterutpalaśabdena yoge rūpakatāprasaṅga ityāśaṅkyoktaṃ---śrutyā saṃbandhavirahāditi

yathā

original: tenāmbuśabdasya śrutyā nirantarārthaniṣṭhena abhidhāvyāpāreṇa yaḥ padāntareṇa jyotsnāśabdena saṃbandhastacchūnyatvādguṇavṛttitā /

a taḥ tra
rūpaka tā

kim tarhi svatas evā iti na rūpaka tā prasaṅgaḥ

original: nanu viruddhārthābhidhāyinoḥ samānādhikaraṇayoḥ śabdayornirantarārthaniṣṭhena abhidhāvyāpāreṇa anupapdyamānānyonyasamanvayatvādyadyekasya lakṣaṇayā
analyzed: nanu viruddha artha abhidhāyinoḥ samāna adhikaraṇayoḥ śabdayoḥ nirantara artha niṣṭhena abhidhā vyāpāreṇa anupapdyamāna anyonya samanvaya tvāt yadi ekasya lakṣaṇayā
evam sati paryāyeṇa atra guṇa vṛtti tvam prāpnoti
niyama karaṇa abhāvāt
tatas ca yathā ambu śabdasya jyotsnā śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyāt guṇa vṛtti tvam uktam

original: tadvajjyotsnāśabdasyāpi ambuśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyādguṇavṛttitvaṃ kathaṃ na syādityāśaṅkyoktaṃ pradhāneneti /
analyzed: tadvat jyotsnā śabdasya api ambu śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyāt guṇa vṛtti tvam katham na syāt iti āśaṅkya uktam pradhānena iti
pradhāna artha anurodhena upasarjanasya lakṣaṇayā guṇa vṛtti tvam upapannam
pradhāna vaśa varti tvāt guṇānām iti abhiprāyaḥ
atas ca prākaraṇika artha abhidhāyi tvāt pradhāna artha viṣayaḥ yaḥ jyotsnā śabdaḥ tad anurodhena
ambu śabdasya a prākaraṇika artha tvāt apradhāna arthasya guṇa vṛtti tvam upapannam iti na paryāyeṇa
jyotsnā ambu śabdayoḥ paraspara anurodhena

original: nanu ca jyotsnāmbunetyatra ambunaḥ prādhānyaṃ jyotsnāyāśca guṇabhāvaḥ /

tathā hi

original: etasmiñśloke tadbhāvādhyavasānena sekāvacchāditarūpatayā sekātmakatvena yāsau vyomno vyāptirasicyateti pratipāditā,

original: tayā svasādhanabhūtaṃ yattadambho 'pekṣitaṃ tadatra jyotsnayā viśiṣyate jyotsnaivāmbviti /

uktam ca upasarjana upameyam kṛtvā tu samāsam etayoḥ ubhayoḥ

etayoḥ ubhayoḥ iti
upamāna upameyayoḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tatkathamidamuktaṃ jyotsnāpadasya prādhānyāttadvaśenāmbuśabdasya guṇavṛttitvaṃ kalpyate iti /

ucyate
atra khalu dve vasthe vidyete

original: tatra yadā tāvajjyotsnā amburūpatvamāpadyate tadā prākaraṇikatvāt jyotsnā pradhānam /

original: viśeṣoktilakṣaṇe ca bhāmahavivaraṇe bhaṭṭodbhaṭena ekadeśaśabda evaṃ vyākhyāto yathohāsmābhirnirūpitaḥ tatra viśeṣoktilakṣaṇam----

anyatra ca anyadā prabhaviṣṇu upārjanam

dīpakam
ādi madhya anta viṣayāḥ prādhānya itara yoginaḥ
antargata upamā dharmāḥ yatra tat dīpakam viduḥ
yatra antargata ūrtha sāmarthya avaseya tvāt upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ yeṣām tathāvidhānām dharmaṇām upanibandhaḥ tatra kāvya dīpakam bhavati
tathāvidha kāvya viṣaya tvāt ca dīpakasya tat kāvyam dīpakam iti upacārāt sāmānādhikaraṇyam
atra ca dharmāṇām eka vāram upanibandhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
asakṛt upādāne hi teṣām prativastūpamām vakṣyati

original: ata eva caikadeśavartināmapi teṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ yau dvau upamānopameyabhāvena avasthitau vākyārthau bahabo vā tathāvidhāstaduddīpanahetutvāddīpakatā
analyzed: atas eva ca eka deśa vartinām api teṣām dharmāṇām yau dvau upamāna upameya bhāvena avasthitau vākya arthau bahabaḥ vā tathāvidhāḥ tad uddīpana hetu tvāt dīpaka tā
yāvat ca teṣām dharmāṇām upamāna upameya bhāva samanvayena atra upanibandhaḥ tāvat balāt prādhānya itara yogitvam āpatati

guṇa bhāvāt

original: tābhyāṃ yogaḥ saṃbandho vidyate yeṣāṃ te tathoktāḥ /

original: atra saṃharaṇātmā dharmaḥ kadambakusumaśobhākarmakatvena virahiṇīsukhasampatkarmakatvena ca upanibadhyamāno 'ntargatopamaḥ /

śarad samayasya upavarṇyamāna tayā kadamba kusuma śrī saṃharasya prākaraṇika artha niṣṭha tva ādi vrahiṇī sukha saṃpad saṃhārasya ca a prākaraṇika artha viṣaya tvāt

original: yathā preyoviyoginīnāṃ niḥśeṣāḥ sukhasampadaḥ saṃjahāra tathā kadambakusumaśriyo 'pīti /

sādṛśya saṃbandhi tvena upādīyate yat prākaraṇikam tat upameyam
na khalu prākaraṇikasya api sādṛśya saṃbandhi tvena an upādīyamānasya upameya tā
yathā rājñaḥ puruṣam ānaya iti atra puruṣasya
puruṣaḥ hi atra ānīyamāna tvena codyamāna tvāt sati api prākaraṇika tve sādṛsya saṃbandhi tvena anupādīyamāna tvāt na upameyaḥ

original: satyapi ca sādṛśyasaṃbandhitvenopādāne yasya prākaraṇikatvaṃ nāsti tasyopamānatvaṃ,
analyzed: sati api ca sādṛśya saṃbandhi tvena upādāne yasya prākaraṇika tvam na asti tasya upamāna tvam
na tu upameya tvam iti prākaraṇikam iti uktam
tat evam sādṛśya saṃbandhi tvena upādīyamānam yat prākaraṇikam tat upameyam
tat hi upamānena sādṛśya pratipādana dvāreṇa samīpe kṣipyate tasmāt upameyam
a prākaraṇikam tu tathāvidham eva upamānam

original: tayorupamānopameyayoryatsādharmyaṃ samāno dharmaḥ tena dharmeṇa saṃbandho yaḥ sā upamānopameyayoḥ sādṛśyadvāreṇa sābhīpyaparicchedahetutvādupamā
analyzed: tayoḥ upamāna upameyayoḥ yat sādharmyam samānaḥ dharmaḥ tena dharmeṇa saṃbandhaḥ yaḥ sā upamāna upameyayoḥ sādṛśya dvāreṇa sābhīpya pariccheda hetu tvāt upamā
tasyāḥ ca alaṅkāra adhikārāt cetaḥ hāri tvam labdham eva
kāvya śobhā āvahānām dharmāṇām guṇa vyatirikta tve sati alaṅkāra tvāt
guṇāḥ khalu kāvya śobhā hetavaḥ dharmāḥ

original: te ca mādhuryaujaḥprasādalakṣaṇāḥ yeṣāṃ tu guṇopajanitaśobhe kāvye śobhātiśayahetutvaṃ te 'laṅkārāḥ /
analyzed: te ca mādhurya ojaḥ prasāda lakṣaṇāḥ yeṣām tu guṇa upajanita śobhe kāvye śobhā atiśaya hetu tvam te laṅkārāḥ
yat avocat bhaṭṭa vāmanaḥ
kāvya śobhāyāḥ kartāraḥ dharmāḥ guṇāḥ
tad atiśaya hetavaḥ tu alaṅkārāḥ iti tena alaṅakāra tvāt eva upamāyāḥ cetaḥ hāri tvam labdham
atas cetaḥ hāri iti anuvādaḥ

analyzed: sup dhātu pratyaya avaseyā punar upamā trividhā kyac kyaṅ kvipū pratyaya avaseya tvāt
kyac pratyaya avaseyā api trividhā karma upamānaka tvāt adhikaraṇa upamānaka tvāt ca
tat uktam tathā upamānāt ācāre kyac pratyaya bala uktitaḥ iti

original: yathā samāse saṃkṣepābhihitā upamā samāsasamarthyādavagamyamānā nibadhyate tathā
analyzed: yathā samāse saṃkṣepa abhihitā upamā samāsa samarthyāt avagamyamānā nibadhyate tathā

original: kasmiṃścidviṣaye upamānātkarmaṇaḥ adhikaraṇādvā ācārārthe yathākramaṃ sautra aupasaṃkhyānikaśca
analyzed: kasmiṃścid viṣaye upamānāt karmaṇaḥ adhikaraṇāt vā ācāra arthe yathākramam sautraḥ aupasaṃkhyānikaḥ ca
yaḥ kyac pratyayaḥ tad balena yā asau bhaṇitiḥ tad sāmarthyāt api avasīyamānā nibadhyate
tasyāḥ udāharaṇam
sa duḥsthīyan kṛtārthaḥ pi niḥśeṣa aiśvarya saṃpadā
nikāma kamanīye pi narakīyati kānane
niḥśeṣa aiśvarya saṃpadā api iti saṃbandhaḥ
atra duḥstham iva ātmānam ācaran iti duḥsthaḥ kaścid dāridṣa ādi upaplutaḥ upamānam
bhagavat ātmā upameyaḥ
ācāra ākhyaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ kyac pratyaya upāttaḥ
atra ca upamāna sādhāraṇa dharmayoḥ śabda spṛṣṭa tvam
upameyasya upamāna upameya bhāvasya ca sāmarthyāt avagatiḥ
tena iyam dvitayasya gamyamāna artha tvāt dvitaya lope sati sup dhātu upamā
evam iyam karma upamānikā sup dhātu upamā udāhṛtā
adhikaraṇa upamānikā tu
atra narakaḥ upamānam
kānanam upameyam
kyac pratyaya upāttaḥ tu ācāraḥ sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ
iva ādayaḥ tu kyac pratyaya sāmarthena upamāna upameya bhāvasya avaseya tvāt aprayuktāḥ
tena iyam eka lope sati sup dhātu pamā
evam eṣā kyac pratyaya avagamyā dvividhā
kyaṅ pratyaya sāmarthya avagamyā tu kartṛ apamānikā saṃkṣepa upamā bhavati
tat āha kartuḥ ācāre kyaṅā sā iti
tathā iti
upamānāt ācāra eti
kvacid iti ca pūrva uktasya atra anuṣaṅgaḥ

original: karturupamānāduttareṃṇācāraviṣayeṇa kyaṅā sā saṃkṣepopamā kvacinnibadhyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kartuḥ upamānāt uttareṇa ācāra viṣayeṇa kyaṅā sā saṃkṣepopamā kvacid nibadhyate iti arthaḥ
tasyāḥ udāharaṇam
kṛśānu vat jagattsya paśyataḥ tām priyām vinā
khadyotāyitum ārabdham tattva jñāna mahā mahaḥ
atra khadyotāyitum ityādau khadyotaḥ upamānam
tad ātmakam yat tat mahat utkṛṣṭam mahaḥ tejaḥ tat upameyam
kyaṅka pratyaya upāttaḥ ca ācāraḥ sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ
kyaṅ pratyaya sāmarthya avaseya tvāt ca atra eva ādeḥ aprayogaḥ
tena iyam eka lopena sup dhātu upamā upanibaddhā

original: kvacit viṣaye kartrupamānikā sā saṃkṣepopamā kvipā nibadhyate /
analyzed: kvacid viṣaye kartṛ upamānikā sā saṃkṣepa upamā kvipā nibadhyate

original: sa ca kvip “sarvaprātipadikebhyaḥ kvibvā vaktavyaḥ“ityanena vidhīyate /
analyzed: sa ca kvip sarva prātipadikebhyaḥ kvip vā vaktavyaḥ iti anena vidhīyate
tat uktam sā kvipā kvacid iti
atra api tathā iti
upamānāt ācāraḥ iti
kartuḥ iti ca trayam anuṣajyate
tasyāḥ udāharaṇam
kṛśānu vat jagat ijagat upameyam
ācāraḥ ca sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ kvip sāmarthya davagamyate
atra ca upamāna upameyayoḥ śabda upātta tvāt iva ādīnām ācārasya ca artha sāmārthya vaseya tvāt tad dvitaya lopaḥ
na khalu aśrūyamāṇasya kvipaḥ ūrtha abhidhāyi tā vaktum śakyā
evam eṣā sup dhātu avaseyā trividhā saṃkṣepa upamā pratipāditā
kyac kyaṅ kvip paratyaya avaseya tvāt
kyac pratyaya sāmarthya avaseyā tu dvividhā
karma adhikaraṇa upamānaka tvāt
kyap pratyaya avaseyā tu eka prakārā
kvip pratyaya avaseyā api eka prakārā eva bhavati
tat evam eṣā caturvidhā sup dhātu pratyaya avaseyā saṃkṣepa upamā uktā
kṛt pratyaya sāmarthya avaseyā saṃkṣepopamā dvividhā
karma upamānikā kartṛ upamānikā ca

original: taduktaṃ 'upamāne karmaṇi vā kartari vā yo ṇamulkaṣādigatastadvācyā se'ti /
analyzed: tat uktam upamāne karmaṇi vā kartari vā yaḥ ṇamul kaṣa ādi gataḥ tad vācyā sā iti
kaṣā ādi gataḥ kaṣā ādi anuprayogakaḥ iti arthaḥ
karma upamānikāyāḥ tasyāḥ udāharaṇam
tasya itara manaḥ dāham adahat prajvalat manaḥ
umām prati tapaḥ śakti ākṛṣṭa buddheḥ smara analaḥ

original: atra itarasya prākṛtasya saṃbandhi mana upamānaṃ,
analyzed: atra itarasya prākṛtasya saṃbandhi manaḥ upamānam
bhagavat manaḥ upameyam
dahyamāna tvam sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ
tat ca trayam śabda spṛṣṭam
upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ tu atra ṇamul sāmarthyāt iva ādīnām aprayoge gamyate
tena iyam eka lope saṃkṣepa upamā karma upamānikā kṛt pratyaya avaseyā
kartṛ upamānikāyāḥ tu tasyāḥ udāharaṇam
sa dagdha vigraheṇa api vīrya mātra sthita ātmanā
spṛṣṭaḥ kāmena sāmānya prāṇi cintam acintayat
vigrahaḥ śarīram
atra sāmānya bhūtaḥ prāṇī guṇa atiśaya śūnyaḥ upaprānam
tad śabda nirdiṣṭaḥ ca bhagavān upameyaḥ
cintayitṛ tvam sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ
ṇamul sāmarthyāt ca iva ādeḥ aprayoge pi upamāna upameya bhāva avasāyaḥ
tena iyam eka lope sati kartṛ upamānikā saṃkṣepa upamā kṛt pratyaya avaseyā
evam eṣā kṛt pratyaya avaseyā saṃkṣepopamā dvividhā pratipāda tā
yā tu taddhita sāmarthya avaseyā vati śabdāt avagamyate
sā saṃpūrṇa tvāt pūrvam uktā
anyā tu a saṃpūrṇā kalpapa ādeḥ prayogāt avasīyate
tat uktam tad hitaiḥ sā nibadhyate kavibhiḥ iti
prabhṛti śabdena atra ive pratikṛtau ityādi vihitānām kana ādīnām parigrahaḥ
tasyāḥ udāharaṇam
caṇḍāla kalpe kandarpa pluṣṭā mayi tirohite

original: saṃjātātulanairāśyā kiṃ sā śokānmṛtā bhavet // UKss_1.*30 //
analyzed: saṃjāta atula nairāśyā kim sā śokāt mṛtā bhavet
atra caṇḍālaḥ upamānam
mayi iti asmad arthaḥ upameyaḥ
ca sādṛśyam upāttam

original: prakṛtyarthasadṛśer'the bhagavatkātyāyanadṛśā kalpabādīnāṃ vidhānāt krauryādistu dharmaḥ svaśabdānupātto 'pi sāmarthyādatrāvasīyate /
analyzed: prakṛti artha sadṛśa irthe bhagavat kātyāyana dṛśā vidhānāt kraurya ādiḥ tu dharmaḥ sva śabda anupāttaḥ pi sāmarthyāt atra avasīyate
tena iyam eka lope sati taddhita avagamyā saṃkṣepa upamā
evam aśvakaḥ iti atra api draṣṭavyam
iva artha upalakṣite sadṛśe kanaḥ vidhānāt
āyaḥśūlikaḥ ityādau tu tritaya lopena taddhita sāmarthāt upamā avasāyaḥ
tathā hi atra ayaḥ śūlena anvicchati iti vigṛhya ayaḥ śūla daṇḍa ajinābhyām iti ṭhak vadhīyate
atra ca ayaḥśūlam upamānam

original: arthānveṣaṇopāyaḥ kaścidupameyaḥ tīkṣṇatvādiḥ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ upamānopameyabhāvaśceti catuṣṭayamavagamyate /
analyzed: artha anveṣaṇa upāyaḥ kaścid upameyaḥ tīkṣṇa tva ādiḥ sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ ca iti catuṣṭayam avagamyate
tad madhyāt sva śabda spuṣṭam upamānam ayaḥśūlena iti
śiṣṭa śabdasya tu tritayasya atra artha sāmarthyāt avagatiḥ
nanu ca atra upamānena ayaḥśūlena artha anveṣaṇa upāyasya upameyasya tad bhāva adhyavasānena āpādita abhedasya pratīyamāna tvāt atiśayoktiḥ iyam na tu upamā
tat katham etat upamāna udāharaṇam
ucyate
yathā śaśi chāya vadanām iti atra sati api śaśi chāyā pracchādita rūpa tve vadana chāyāyāḥ
kathañcid bheda pratipatti puras sarīkāreṇa upamā bheda tvam upanyastam tathā atra api bhaviṣyati iti adoṣaḥ

original: tenāyaḥ--śūlika ityatra tritayalope sati taddhitāvaseyā saṃkṣepopamā bhavati ev śvā
analyzed: tena ayaḥśūlikaḥ iti atra tritaya lope sati taddhita avaseyā saṃkṣepa upamā bhavati eva śvā

original: mumūrṣati kūlaṃ pipatipatītyādāvapi yadi maraṇapatanādyānuguṇyasya upameyabhūtasya
analyzed: mumūrṣati kūlam pipatipati ityādau api yadi maraṇa patana ādya ānuguṇyasya upameya bhūtasya
tad bhāva adhyavasānāt san vācyayā icchayā upamāna bhūtayā samāpādita abhedasya pratīyamānasya
bheda avagati nibandhanam kiñcid vidyate tadā upamā bheda tvam vācyam
anyathā tu atiśayokti bheda tā asya avaseyā

original: yadāha sanvidhau bhagavānkātyāyanaḥ--“āśaṅkāyāmacetaneṣūpasaṃkhyānam““na vā tulyakāraṇātvādicchāyā hi pravṛttita upalabdhiri“ti,
analyzed: yat āha san vidhau bhagavān kātyāyanaḥ āśaṅkāyām acetaneṣu upasaṃkhyānam na vā tulya kāraṇā tvāt icchāyāḥ hi pravṛttitaḥ upalabdhiḥ iti
upamānāt vā siddham iti ca

original: atra hi 'na vā tulyakāraṇatvādi'tyādinā tadbhāvadhyavasānaṃ sūcitam /
analyzed: atra hi na vā tulya kāraṇatvāt ityādinā tad bhāva adhyavasānam sūcitam
upamānāt vā siddham iti tu upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ

original: iyaṃ ca ghātoḥ sano vidhānāttadantasya ca dhātutvātsubdhātūpamāvat dhātudhātūpamāvaseyā /
analyzed: iyam ca ghātoḥ sanaḥ vidhānāt tad antasya ca dhātu tvāt sup dhātu upamā vat dhātu dhātu upamā avaseyā
evam vartamāna sāmīpya ādau api upamā bheda tvam atiśayokti bheda tvam vā yathāprati iti yojyam
cūrṇikārasya tu evamādau tad bhāva adhyavasāna samāśrayema na atiśayokti bheda tvam evā iṣṭam
yat āha tiṅ antena upamānam asti iti

original: ata eva daṇḍinā “limpatīva tamo 'ṅgāni varṣatīvāñjanaṃ nabhaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva daṇḍinā limpati iva tamaḥ ṅgāni varṣati iva añjanam nabhaḥ
asat puruṣa sevā iva dṛṣṭiḥ niṣphala tām gatā ityādeḥ garbhīkṛta atiśaya utprekṣā beda tvam eva mahatā prapañcena abhyadhāyi
tena kadā devadatta grāmam gamiṣyasi
eṣa gacchāmi ityādau api vartamāna sāmīpye vartamāna rūpatayā bhaviṣyat kālasya adhyavasānāt atiśayokti bheda tvam eva vācyam
evam anyatra api ūhyam

original: evameṣā vākyasamāsasubdhātukṛttaddhitāvaseyā saṃkṣepo pamā pañcavidhā pratipāditā /
analyzed: evam eṣā vākya samāsa sup dhātu kṛt taddhita avaseyā saṃkṣepā u pamā pañcavidhā pratipāditā
saṃpūrṇā tu vākyā samāsa taddhita bhedena trividhā pūrvam uktā
āsām eva ca avāntarabhedāḥ anye nirdiṣṭāḥ
tathā hi saṃpūrṇayoḥ vākya taddhita upamayoḥ śrauta tva artha tva bhedena pratyekam dvaividhyam uktam
saṃkṣepa upamāyāḥ ca samāsopamāyāḥ eka dvaya traya lopena caturbidha tvam
eka lopasya hi tatra dvaividhyam uktam
iva ādeḥ sādhāraṇa dharma vācinaḥ ca sap dhātūpamāyāḥ caturvidha tvam
kyac kyaṅ kvip pratyāya avaseya tvāt
kyac pratyāya avaseyā hi karma adha karaṇa upamānaka tvena dvividhā uktā
kṛt pratyāya avaseyāyāḥ ca kartṛ karma upamānaka tvena dvividha tvam
tat evam eṣā saptadaśavidhā granthakṛtā upamā pratipāditā
tat āhuḥ
kṛt ta dvita samāsebhyaḥ sup dhātoḥ atha vākyataḥ
pūrṇā lupta eka deśā ca gamyate dvividhā upamā
eka dvaya trayāṇām ca lopāt syāt lopinī trīdhā

original: pūrvau bhedau dvidhā cātra tṛtīyastvekarūpakaḥ // iti
analyzed: pūrvau bhedau dvidhā ca atra tṛtīyaḥ tu eka rūpakaḥ iti

original: pūrvau bhedau dvidhā cātreti sādhāraṇadharmavācilopāccaikalopasya dvaividhyam /
analyzed: pūrvau bhedau dvidhā ca atrā iti sādhāraṇa dharma vāci lopāt ca eka lopasya dvaividhyam
dvitaya lopaḥ pi sādhāraṇa dharma vācī vādi viyogāt tathā upameya vācī vādi viyogāt dvividhaḥ

original: eṣā copamā vicitrabhedatve satyapi yatraiva cetohāritvamasti tatraivālaṅkāratāṃ pratipadyate na sarvatretyuktam //
analyzed: eṣā ca upamā vicitra bheda tve sati api yatra eva cetaḥ hāri tvam asti tatra eva alaṅkāra tām pratipadyate na sarvatra iti uktam
prativastūpamā
upamāna saṃnidhāne sāmya vācī ucyate budhaiḥ yatra

original: upameyasya ca kavibhiḥ sā prativastūpamā gaditā // UKss_1.22 //
analyzed: upameyasya ca kavibhiḥ sā prativastūpamā gaditā

original: yatropamānopameyayoḥ saṃnidhāne sāmyavācinaḥ padasyāsakṛdupādānaṃ kriyate sā parativastūpamā /
analyzed: yatra upamāna upameyayoḥ saṃnidhāne sāmya vācinaḥ padasya asakṛt upādānam kriyate sā parativastūpamā

original: nanu yadi sāmyavācinaḥ padasya tatrāsakṛdupādānaṃ kriyate tato 'nekavākyatvamāpatati /
analyzed: nanu yadi sāmya vācinaḥ padasya tatra asakṛt upādānam kriyate tatas na eka vākya tvam āpatati
na ca anekasmin vākye iva ādīni prayujyante
eka vākya niṣṭha tayā teṣām abhidhā sāmarthya avasita tvāt
atas ca iva ādīnām aprayoge katham tatra upamāna upameya bhāva avasāyaḥ iti āsaṅkya āha
prākaraṇika itara tva sthityā ekaḥ ca upameya tām labhate
upamāna tvam ca apare iti upamā vāci śūnyatvam
nānā vākya tva ādiva ādīnām aprayoge pi prākaraṇika tva aprākaraṇika tva paryālocanayā artha sāmarthyāt atra upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ vasīyate iti arthaḥ
tat āhuḥ
iva ādeḥ apratītā api śabda saṃskārataḥ kvacid
upamā lakṣyate nyatra kevala artha nibandhanā iti
iha prakāra trayeṇa upamāyāḥ pratipattiḥ
kvacid ava ādi śabda sāmarthyāt upamā vācya bhūtā pratīyate
yathā candraḥ iva mukham asyāḥ ityādau
kvacid tu tad tad viśiṣṭa saṃskāra sahāyāt śabdāt sva artha abhidhāna mukhena lakṣyamāṇāyāḥ tasyāḥ pratipattiḥ
yathā śastrīśyāmā iti
atra hi
samāsa nibandhana eka padya ādi saṃskāra sahitābhyām śa strī śyāmā śabdābhyām
svārtha abhidhāna vyavadhānena lakṣyamāṇā upamā gamyate
kvacid tu upamāna upameya nibandhana śabda saṃskāra abhāve pi kevalāt eva artha sāmarthyāt tasyāḥ pratipattiḥ
yathā rūpaka dīpaka prativastūpamā ādiṣu iti arthaḥ
atas ca asyām prativastūpamāyām kevalena eva artha sāmarthyena upamāna upameya tvam avagamyate iti adoṣaḥ
tasyāḥ udāharaṇam
viralāḥ tādṛśaḥ loke śīla saundarya saṃpadaḥ

original: niśāḥ kiyatyo varṣe 'pi yākhindiḥ pūrṇamaṇḍalaḥ // UKss_1.*31 //
analyzed: niśāḥ kiyatyaḥ varṣe pi yākhindiḥ pūrṇa maṇḍalaḥ
viralāḥ su alpāḥ
tādṛśaḥ pārvatī varttinyaḥ yāḥ śīla saundarya saṃpadaḥ tad sadṛsyaḥ
śīlam su svabhāva tā
saundaryam lāvaṇyam
atra saṃvatsara madhya vartinyaḥ khaṇḍa śaśi bimbāḥ rātrayaḥ dvādaśa upamānam
śīla saundaryayoḥ saṃbhārāḥ sakala loka utkṛṣṭāḥ katipaya jana juṣaḥ upameyāḥ
sādhāraṇaḥ ca dharmaḥ virala tvam
tat ca upamāna saṃnidhāne kiyatyaḥ iti upāttam
upameya saṃnidhāne tu viralāḥ iti
iva ādi anupādāne ca prākaraṇika tva aprākaraṇika tva paryālocana yātrā upamāna upameya bhāva avasāyaḥ
tena iyam vastuni vastuni sādhāraṇa upanibandhāt prativastūpamā
iti mahā śrī pratīhāra indurāja viracitāyām udbhaṭa alaṅkārasārasaṃgraha laghu vṛttau prathamaḥ vargaḥ
atha dvitīyaḥ vargaḥ
ākṣepa ūrthāntaranyāsaḥ vyatirekaḥ vibhāvanā
samāsa atiśayoktī ca iti alaṅkārān pare viduḥ
samāsa atiśaya uktī ca iti atra samāsa atiśaya ya śabdayoḥ ukti śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate
ākṣepaḥ
pratiṣedhaḥ iva iṣṭasya yaḥ viśeṣa abhidhitsayā

original: ākṣepa iti taṃ santaḥ śaṃsanti kavayaḥ sadā // UKss_2.2 //
analyzed: ākṣepaḥ iti tam santaḥ śaṃsanti kavayaḥ sadā

original: iha kācidvakrabhaṇitistathāvidhā saṃbhavati yasyāṃ vidhitsitor'tho niṣedhavyājena saṃskriyate,
analyzed: iha kācid vakra bhaṇitiḥ tathāvidhā saṃbhavati yasyām vidhitsita ūrthaḥ niṣedha vyājena saṃskriyate
na tu niṣidhyate

original: tatra vidhitsitasyārthasya yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate sa pratiṣedha iva bhavati,
analyzed: tatra vidhitsitasya arthasya yaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ kriyate sa pratiṣedhaḥ iva bhavati
na tu pratiṣedhaḥ eva
avāntaravākya artha tvena tatra vākyasya aparyavasānāt
avāntara vākya artha tā ca tatra niṣedhasya vidhitsita artha virodhāt bhavati

original: tatra hi vidhitsitor'thaḥ pūrvopakrāntatvena sthemnāvatiṣṭhamānaḥ svavirūddhatvena niṣedhaṃ niṣedhatātparyātpracyāvyasvagataviseṣābhidhānāyāvāntaravākyārthīkaroti
analyzed: tatra hi vidhitsita ūrthaḥ pūrva upakrānta tvena sthemnā avatiṣṭhamānaḥ sva virūddha tvena niṣedham niṣedha tātparyāt pracyāvya svagata viseṣa abhidhānāya avāntaravākya arthīkaroti

original: ato 'nantaroktena prakāreṇeṣṭasyārthasya viśeṣamabhidhātuṃ yatra niṣedha iva na tu niṣedha eva,
analyzed: atas nantara uktena prakāreṇa iṣṭasya arthasya viśeṣam abhidhātum yatra niṣedhaḥ iva na tu niṣedhaḥ eva
asau iṣṭa artha nirākaraṇasya leśena saṃbhavat ākṣepa saṃjñakaḥ laṅkāraḥ sat kavibhiḥ abhidhīyate
santaḥ kavayaḥ iti saṃbandhaḥ
tasya bheda dvitaya upadarśanāya āha
vakṣyamāṇa ukta viṣayaḥ sa ca dvividhaḥ iṣyate
vakṣyamāṇam uktam ca iṣṭam āśritya niṣedha abhidhānāt ākṣepaḥ dvividhaḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu pratiṣedhaḥ iva iṣṭasya eti ākṣepa lakṣaṇam uktam
iṣṭa tvam ca icchā karma tā

original: yasya ca vastuna icchākarmatā tasya nāvaśyamuktikriyāṃ prati karmatvaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yasya ca vastunaḥ icchā karma tā tasya na avaśya mukti kriyām prati karma tvam bhavati
iṣyamāṇam hi kadācid ucyate kadācid na

original: ataśceṣṭasyoktikarmatāmāśritya yadetadākṣepasya vakṣyamāṇoktaviṣayatayā dvaividhyamuktaṃ tanna saṃgacchate ityāśaṅkyāha----
analyzed: atas ca iṣṭasya ukti karmatām āśritya yat etat ākṣepasya vakṣyamāṇa ukta viṣaya tayā dvaividhyam uktam tat na saṃgacchate iti āśaṅkya āha

original: niṣedheneva tadbandho vidheyasya ca kīrtitaḥ // UKss_2.3 //
analyzed: niṣedhena iva tad bandhaḥ vidheyasya ca kīrtitaḥ

original: vidheyasya vidhātuṃ jñāpayitumabhimatasya yo niṣedha iva tenāyaṃ vakṣyamāṇoktaviṣaya ākṣepo nibadhyate /
analyzed: vidheyasya vidhātum jñāpayitum abhimatasya yaḥ niṣedhaḥ iva tena ayam vakṣyamāṇa ukta viṣayaḥ ākṣepaḥ nibadhyate
etat uktam bhavati vidhāna karmatā dvāreṇa eva atra iṣṭatvam avasīyate
nibandhana antara abhāvāt
vidhāna karma tā ca vidhāna ātmikāyāḥ ukteḥ karma tā
sā ca dvividhā ārthī
śābdī ca
yatra sva śabda vyāpāram antareṇa api śabda antara vyāpāra sahāya niṣedha mukhena eva vidhitsita ūrthaḥ vagamyate tatra arthī
tatra ca vakṣyamāṇa viṣayaḥ ākṣepaḥ

original: yatra tu vidhimukhenaiva vaktumiṣṭasyārthasyopādānaṃ kriyate tatra śābdī /
analyzed: yatra tu vidhi mukhena eva vaktum iṣṭasya arthasya upādānam kriyate tatra śābdī
tatra ca ukta viṣaya tā ākṣepasya

original: evaṃ cānantaroditaya nītyā śābdenārthena ca vidhinā yadaṃvasitamiṣṭaṃ tasyoktikriyākarmatvasaṃbhavāduktikriyāyāḥ karmabhūto yor'thastadāśrayaṃ
analyzed: evam nītyā śābdena arthena ca vidhinā yat aṃvasitam iṣṭam tasya ukti kriyā karma tva saṃbhavāt ukti kriyāyāḥ karma bhūtaḥ yaḥ ṛthaḥ tad āśrayam
vakṣyamāṇa viṣaya tvam ukta viṣaya tvam ca ākṣepasya nibadhyate
tatra vakṣyamāṇa viṣayasya ākṣepasya udāharaṇam
aho smarasya māhātmyam yat rudre daśā īdṛśī

original: iyadāstāṃ samudrāmbhaḥ kumbhairmāne tu ke vayam // UKss_2.*1 //
analyzed: iyat āstām samudra ambhaḥ kumbhaiḥ māne tu ke vayam
aho iti vismaye
atra manmatha māhātmyam tad avasthā viśeṣa saṃsparśena pratipādayitum iṣṭam
tat ca tasya tathā pratipādanam iyat āstām ityādinā niṣiddham
niṣedhaḥ ca atra abhidheya tva virodhāt
abhidheya tvena ca virodham vakti
ānantyena tasya tathāvidhasya vaktum aśakya tvāt

original: rudre 'pi nāma īdṛśī daśeti hi sāmānyarūpatvena manmathamāhātmyaṃ pratipāditaṃ na tu viśeṣarūpatayā /
analyzed: rudre pi nāma īdṛśī daśā iti hi sāmānya rūpa tvena manmatha māhātmyam pratipāditam na tu viśeṣa rūpa tayā

original: ato vaktumiṣṭānāṃ smaramāhātmyāvasthāviśeṣāṇāmayamānantyenābhidhānaniṣedha iva natu niṣedha eva /
analyzed: atas vaktum iṣṭānām smara māhātmya avasthā viśeṣāṇām ayam ānantyena abhidhāna niṣedhaḥ iva na tu niṣedhaḥ eva
vivakṣita artha virodhena avāntaravākya artha tvāt
tathā hi atra samudra ambhasaḥ kumbhaiḥ mātum aśakya tvam yat asmad artha kartṛkam abhihitam
tad sādṛśyena ānantya viśiṣṭa tvena utkarṣayitum iṣṭānām manmatha māhātmya avasthā viśeṣāṇām
pūrvam pratipipādayiṣita tvena labdha pratiṣṭhānām vākya artha tvam
atas ca tad abhidhāna niṣedhasya tad virodhāt atra avāntaravākya artha tā
na ca avāntaravākya arthaḥ vākya viśrānti sthāna tayā vaktum śakyaḥ

original: na khalu raktaḥ paṭo bhavatītyatra raktatvāvacchinnapaṭabhavanaparatvādvākyasya paṭabhavanaparyavasānamātratvaṃ subhaṇam /
analyzed: na khalu raktaḥ paṭaḥ bhavati iti atra rakta tva avacchinna paṭa bhavana paratvāt vākyasya paṭa bhavana paryavasāna mātra tvam
atas trā api niṣedhasya avāntaravākya artha tvena vākya viśrānti sthāna tva abhāvāt niṣedha rūpa tvam iva na tu niṣedha rūpa tā

original: sa ca niṣedho 'trāvāntaravākyatvātpradhānavākyārthānuguṇyena pravartamānaḥ khakaṇṭhenābhidhānaṃ manmathamāhātmyāvasthaviśeṣāṇāṃ niṣedhati,
analyzed: sa ca niṣedhaḥ trā avāntaravākya tvāt pradhāna vākya artha ānuguṇyena pravartamānaḥ khakaṇṭhena abhidhānam manmatha māhātmya avasthā viśeṣāṇām niṣedhati
na punar artha sāmarthya avaseyam api
atas ca samudra ambhasaḥ sva kaṇṭhena abhihitam
yat tat sādṛśyena avasite saṃvijñāna pada śūnye smara māhātmya avasthā viśeṣāṇām ānantya lakṣaṇe

original: viśeṣe vākyasya paryavasānaṃ tenāyamiṣṭamarthaṃ pratiṣedhavyājena viśeṣe 'vasthāpayati tasmādākṣepaḥ /
analyzed: viśeṣe vākyasya paryavasānam tena ayam iṣṭam artham pratiṣedha vyājena viśeṣe vasthāpayati tasmāt ākṣepaḥ
atra ca aho smarasya māhātmyam yat rudre pi daśā idṛśī iti etad śabda vyāpāra sahāyena eyadā āstām iti
niṣedhena eva sva kaṇṭhena anupāttānām api manmatha māhātmya avasthā viśeṣāṇām vakṣyamāṇa tayā sūcanam
teṣām ca tathā sūcitānām niṣedha vyājena saṃvijñāna pada śūnya ānantya bheda pratipādanam
atas vakṣyamāṇa viṣaya tā ākṣepasya
ukta viṣayasya tu tasya udāharaṇam
iti cintayataḥ tasya citram cintā avadhiḥ na yat

original: kva vā kāmavikalpānāmantaḥ kālasya cekṣitaḥ // UKss_2.*2 //
analyzed: kva vā kāma vikalpānām antar kālasya ca īkṣitaḥ
atra citra tvasya uktasya uktiḥ kva vā iti prasiddha tvāt ākṣipyate
pūrvatra khalu viruddha tvam ākṣepa nibandhanam uktam
iha tu prasiddha tvam

original: dvābhyāmeva ca prakārābhyāmākṣepo bhavati viruddhatvena prasiddhatvena ca /
analyzed: dvābhyām eva ca prakārābhyām ākṣepaḥ bhavati viruddha tvena prasiddha tvena ca
uktam ca vastu prasiddham iti yat viruddham iti vā asya vacanam ākṣipya
yatra brūyāt saḥ ākṣepaḥ iti
prasiddha tvam ca atra samarthayitum kāla sādṛśya samuktam
yathā kālasya antaḥ na īkṣyate tadvat kāma vikalpānām
atas na eva atra catra tvam
anyatra api asya rūpasya paridṛṣṭa tvāt iti
kāla tulya tayā ca atra kāma vikalpānām ānantya ātmakaḥ viseṣaḥ saṃvijñāna pada śūnyaḥ bhidhitsitaḥ

original: tasya ca citratayā sāmānyena pūrvamupakrāntasyādhunā niṣedhavaśena saṃvijñānapadaśūnyena vivakṣitena rūpeṇa vākyārthīṃbhūtatvānniṣedhasya pūrvavadavāntaravākyārthatā
analyzed: tasya ca citra tayā sāmānyena pūrvam upakrāntasya adhunā niṣedha vaśena saṃvijñāna pada śūnyena vivakṣitena rūpeṇa vākya arthīṃbhūta tvāt niṣedhasya pūrvavat avāntaravākya artha tā

original: tena kvavetyayaṃ niṣedha iva natu niṣedha eva /
analyzed: tena kva vā iti ayam niṣedhaḥ iva na tu niṣedhaḥ eva
tena atra ukta viṣaya tā ākṣepasya
tat āhuḥ
śabda spṛṣṭe vaktum iṣṭe niṣiddha tā
tad aṅgam tad virodhena yatra ākṣepaḥ bhavet asau
iti
śabdena spṛśyate spṛṣṭe
vaktum iṣṭe ukta viṣaye ākṣepe
vakṣyamāṇa viṣaye tu vivakṣitasya ārthatā
śabda antara vyāpāra sahāya niṣedha mukhena
tasya upasthāpyamāna tvāt

original: yaścātrobhayatrāpi niṣedhaḥ kriyate sa vivakṣitārthavirodhātsvatātparyaṃ tyaktvā vivakṣitamevārthaṃ saṃkurvaṃstadaṅgatāṃ pratipadyate /
analyzed: yaḥ ca atra ubhayatra api niṣedhaḥ kriyate sa vivakṣita artha virodhāt sva tātparyam tyaktvā vivakṣitam eva artham saṃkurvan tad aṅgatām pratipadyate
dvividhaḥ ākṣepaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ
artha antara nyāsaḥ
samarthakasya pūrvam yat vacaḥ nyasya ca pṛṣṭhatas
viparyayeṇa vā yat syāt hi śabda uktyā anyathā api vā
jñeyaḥ saḥ ṛtha antara nayāsaḥ
yatra samarthya samarthaka bhāvaḥ saḥ ūrthāntaranyāsaḥ

original: tatra hi samarthakasya samarthakatāvagatihetuṃ vyāptiṃ pakṣadharmatvaṃ cānupanyasyārthāntarasyevopanyāsaḥ kriyate /
analyzed: tatra hi samarthakasya samarthaka tā avagati hetum vyāptim pakṣa dharma tvam ca an upanyasya artha antarasya iva upanyāsaḥ kriyate
vyāpti pakṣa dharma tvayoḥ sva śabdena anupāttayoḥ api garbhīkṛta tvāt
atas saḥ artha antara nyāsaḥ
sa ca caturvidhaḥ

original: tatra samarthake pūrvamabhihite samarthyasya yatra paścādabhidhānaṃ tatra dvau prakārau bhavataḥ /
analyzed: tatra samarthake pūrvam abhihite samarthyasya yatra paścāt abhidhānam tatra dvau prakārau bhavataḥ
hiśabda abhivyakta tvam samarthya samarthaka bhāvasya evakaḥ prakāraḥ
tat uktam samarthakasya pūrvam yat vacaḥ nyasya ca pṛṣṭhatas
iti hi śabda uktyā iti ca
tasya udāharaṇam
tat na asti yat na kurute lokaḥ hi utpanna kāryikaḥ

original: eṣa śarvo 'pi bhagavān baṭūbhūya sma vartate // UKss_2.*3 //
analyzed: eṣa bhagavān sma vartate
acira kṛta upanayana tvam āpadya

original: atra śarvasya sarvalokātiśāyino baṭūbhāvena vṛttimanupapadyamānatayāśaṅkya tatsamarthanāya samarthakaṃ pūrvamevopanyastaṃ “tannāsti yanna kurute“iti
analyzed: atra śarvasya sarva loka atiśāyinaḥ baṭū bhāvena vṛttim anupapadyamāna tayā āśaṅkya tad samarthanāya samarthakam pūrvam eva upanyastam tat na asti yat na kurute iti
atyanta kāryika tvāt anucitam api rūpam anubhūtavān
śarvaḥ tad anya evaṃvidha puruṣa vat iti
atra ca hiśabdena abhivyaktaḥ samarthya samarthaka bhāvaḥ

original: yatra pūrveṇaiva krameṇa samarthyasamarthakayorupanyāse hiśabdaścārthasāmarthyavaseyārthatvānna prayujyate tatra dvitīyor'thāntaranyāsabhedo  #
analyzed: yatra pūrveṇa eva krameṇa samarthya samarthakayoḥ upanyāse hi śabdaḥ ca artha sāmarthya vaseya artha tvāt na prayujyate tatra
bhavati
tat uktam anyathā api ca eti
hi śabda uktim antareṇa api iti arthaḥ
tasya udāharaṇ
pracchannā śasyate vṛttiḥ strīṇām bhāva parīkṣaṇe
pratasthe dhūrjaṭiḥ atas tanum svīkṛtya bāṭavīm
bhāvaḥ āśayaḥ
bāṭavīm brahmacāri saṃbandhinīm
atra dhūrjaṭeḥ baṭu veṣa ālambanena pracchannā śasyate vṛttiḥ ityādinā
yoṣit āśaya parīkṣaṇa pravṛtta tvāt dhūrjaṭiḥ pracchannām vṛttim āśritavān iti
hi śabdaḥ ca atra atas śabda sāmarthyena yasmāt iti asya arthasya avagata tvāt na upāttaḥ
evam etau samarthaka pūrva upanyāsau artha antara nyāsau dvau eva uktau
yatra api ca etad viparyayeṇa sāmarthyasya pūrvam upanyāsaḥ paścāt samarthakasya

original: tatrāpi samarthyasamarthakabhāve hiśabdāvagater'thākṣipte ca sati dvaividhyam /
analyzed: tatra api samarthya samarthaka bhāve hi śabda avagata irtha ākṣipte ca sati dvaividhyam
tat uktam viparyayeṇa vā yat syāt hi śabda uktyā anyathā api vā iti
pūrvasya udāharaṇam
dhyānam ātasthau saṃsthāpya ātmānam ātmanā

original: visaṃvadeddhi pratyakṣaṃ nirdhyātaṃ dhyānato na tu // UKss_2.*5 //
analyzed: visaṃvadet hi pratyakṣam nirdhyātam dhyānataḥ na tu
atra harasya vyavahita ādi artha viṣaya tvena apratihata bāhya indriya vṛtti tvāt sati bāhya indriya janya pratyakṣa saṃbhave
dhyāna āśrayaṇam ayukta tvena saṃbhāvyam tad samarthanāya uktam visaṃvadet hi pratyakṣam ityādi

original: hiśabdānabhivyakte tu samarthyasamarthakabhāve yatra samarthyasya pūrvamupanyāsastatrodāharaṇam----
analyzed: hi śabda anabhivyakte tu samarthya samarthaka bhāve yatra samarthyasya pūrvam upanyāsaḥ tatra udāharaṇam
apaśyat ca ati kaṣṭāni tapyamānām tapāṃsi umām

original: asaṃbhāvyapatīcchānāṃ kanyānāṃ kā parā gatiḥ // UKss_2.*6 //
analyzed: asaṃbhāvya pati icchānām kanyānām kā parā gatiḥ

original: bahūnāmabhimatavaraprāptyupāyānāṃ prārthanādīnāṃ saṃbhave kasmādbhagavatī tapasā śarīramāyāsitavatītyāśaṅkya tatsamarthanāyābhihitaṃ 'asaṃbhāvyapatīcchanām'iti
analyzed: bahūnām abhimata vara prāpti upāyānām prārthanā ādīnām saṃbhave kasmāt bhagavatī tapasā śarīram āyāsitavatī iti āśaṅkya tad samarthanāya abhihitam asaṃbhāvya patīcchanām iti
duḥprāpa bhartṛ abhilāṣi tvāt tapaḥ samāśritavatī
tapāṃsi bhagavatīm khedayanti
tāni punar sā tathāvidhāni upārjayati
atas tapaḥ tapyate tapaḥ tapaḥ karmakasya eva iti kartuḥ karmavat bhāvaḥ
evam eva caturvidhaḥ ūrtha antara nyāsaḥ bhihitaḥ
nanu yadi samarthya samarthaka bhāve sati artha antara nyāsaḥ bhavati
evaṃsatya prastuta praśaṃsā dṛṣṭāntayoḥ api samarthya samarthaka bhāva sadbhāvāt artha antara nyāsa tā prasaṅgaḥ
tathā hi
prīṇita praṇayi svādu kāle pariṇatam ca yat

original: vinā puruṣakārema phalaṃ paśyata śākhinām“ityāsyāmaprastutapraṃśasāyāṃ viśeṣātsāmānyasya
analyzed: vinā puruṣakārema phalam paśyata śākhinām iti āsyām aprastuta praṃśasāyām viśeṣāt sāmānyasya
pratipattiḥ yathā secana ādikam puruṣa vyāpāram antareṇa vana śākhinām vividha guṇa upetasya
phalasya prasūtiḥ daiva pradhānā evam etat sarvam jagati daiva pradhānam iti
atra ca samarthya samarthaka bhāvaḥ vidyate
sarvam jagat ceṣṭitam daiva pradhānam puruṣakāra anvaya vyatireka an anuvidhāyi tvāt vana śākhi phala vat iti
tatas ca
tatra api artha antara nyāsa tva prasaṅgāt alakṣyavyāptiḥ lakṣaṇa doṣaḥ
dṛṣṭānte pi ca samarthya
samarthaka bhāvaḥ vidyate

original: tathāhi “tvayi dṛṣṭa eva tasyā nirvāti mano manobhavajvalitam /
analyzed: tathā hi tvayi dṛṣṭe eva tasyāḥ nirvāti manaḥ manobhava jvalitam
āloke hi sitāṃśoḥ vikasati kumudam kumudvatyāḥ

original: ityatra yathā candraguṇapakṣapātitvena kumudinyāścandrāloke kumudaṃ vikasati,
analyzed: iti atra yathā candra guṇa pakṣapāti tvena kumudinyāḥ candrāloke kumudam vikasati
tadvat guṇa pakṣapāti tvāt tsyāḥ tvad darśane manaḥ manmatha agni prajvalitam upaśāmyati iti samarthya samarthaka bhāvaḥ vagamyate
tena dṛṣṭānte pi artha antara nyāsa tā prasaṅgaḥ iti āśaṅkya āha
prakṛta artha samarthanāt
aprastuta para śaṃsāyāḥ dṛṣṭāntāt ca pṛthak sthitaḥ
satyam aprastuta praśaṃsāyām dṛṣṭānte ca samarthya samarthaka bhāvaḥ vagāmyate
na tu tatra artha antara nyāsa vat samarthya samarthaka bhāvasya saṃbhavaḥ

original: arthāntaranyāse hi sarthyasya yathāyogaṃ pūrvottarakālabhāvitvena svakaṇṭhenopāttsaya samarthanam,
analyzed: artha antara nyāse hi samarthanam
aprastuta praśaṃsāyām tpa prakṛta sāmarthyena prakṛtam ākṣipyate
na tu sva kaṇṭhena upādīyate
yathā pūrva upavarṇite udāharaṇe

original: tatra hi vanaśākhināṃ phaladarśanenāprakṛtena daivapradhānena samagrajagadgocaraṃ daivaprādhānyaṃ prakṛtamākṣipyate,
analyzed: tatra hi vana śākhinām phala darśanena aprakṛtena daiva pradhānena samagra jagat gocaram daiva prādhānyam prakṛtam ākṣipyate
na tu tasya artha antara nyāsa vat sva kaṇṭhena upādānam
atas ca tatra sati api samarthya samarthaka bhāve śabda upakrānta prakṛta artha niṣṭha tva abhāvāt na artha antara nyāsa tvam
dṛṣṭānte pi ca dvayoḥ api samarthya samarthakayoḥ sva kaṇṭhena upātta tvāt sati api sva kaṇṭha upātta prakṛta artha niṣṭha tve
dṛṣṭāntasya samarthya samarthaka bhāva puraḥsarīkāreṇa pravartamāna tvāt na bhavati arya antara nyāsa tvam
na khalu tasya samarthya samarthaka bhāva puraḥsara kāreṇa pravṛttiḥ
bimba pratibimba bhāva mātrasya śabda spṛṣṭa tvāt
arthāt hi tatra samarthya samarthaka bhāva avasāyaḥ
artha antara nyāse tu samarthya samarthaka bhāvena eva upakramaḥ
tena yatra samarthya samarthaka bhāva upakramam artha antara upādānam tatra artha antara nyāsa tvāt dṛṣṭāntasya artha antara nyāsa tā prasaṅgaḥ na bhavati
tat idam uktam prakṛta artha samarthanāt iti
atra prakṛta śabdaḥ sva kaṇṭha upātta prakṛta artha niṣṭhaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
samarthanam ca atra upakrama avasthā vartti upāttam
vyatirekaḥ
viśeṣa upādānam yat syāt upamāna upameyayoḥ

original: nimittādṛṣṭidṛṣṭibhyāṃ vyatireko dvidhī tu saḥ // UKss_2.6 //
analyzed: nimitta adṛṣṭi dṛṣṭibhyām vyatirekaḥ dvidhī tu saḥ

original: upamānopameyayoḥ parasparaṃ yatra viśeṣaḥ khyāpyate sa vyatirekaḥ /
analyzed: upamāna upameyayoḥ parasparam yatra viśeṣaḥ khyāpyate sa vyatirekaḥ

original: tatra hyupamānādupameyasyopameyādupamānasya vā kenacidviśeṣeṇātireka ādhikyaṃ tasmādyvatirekaḥ /
analyzed: tatra hi upamānāt upameyasya upameyāt upamānasya vā kenacid viśeṣeṇa atirekaḥ ādhikyam tasmāt yu atirekaḥ
sa ca dvividhaḥ
tatra viśeṣa khyāpana nimittasya artha sāmarthyāt ākṣepāt ekaḥ prakāraḥ
aparaḥ tu tasya sva śabdena pratipādanāt
tat uktam nimitta adṛṣṭi dṛṣṭibhyām dvidhā iti
etau api ca bhedau pratyekam dvividhau

original: kvaciddhi arthasāmārthyātpratīyamāne upamānopameyabhāve pūrvoktena prakāradvayena vyatirekaḥ khyāpyate,
analyzed: kvacid hi artha sāmārthyāt pratīyamāne upamāna upameya bhāve pūrva uktena prakāra dvayena vyatirekaḥ khyāpyate
kvacid tu i v ādibhiḥ upātaiḥ
tatra artha sāmarthyena yatra upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ avagamyate tatra pūrvasmin prakāra dvaye pūrva bhedasya udāharaṇam
sā gaurīśikharam gatvā dadarśa umām tapaḥ kṛśām
rāhu pīta prabhasya indoḥ jayantīm dūratas tanum

original: rāhuṇā pītā dravadravyasyodakādeḥ svagalabilāntarbhāvanaṃ yattadvadātmābhyantarīkṛtā prabhā yasya sa tathoktaḥ / atra
analyzed: rāhuṇā pītā drava dravyasya udaka ādeḥ sva gala bila antar bhāvanam yat tadvat ātma abhyantarīkṛtā prabhā yasya sa tathā uktaḥ atra

original: rāhuṇā pītā dravadravyasyodakādeḥ svagalabilāntarbhāvanaṃ yattadvadātmābhyantarīkṛtā prabhā yasya ta tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: rāhuṇā pītā drava dravyasya udaka ādeḥ sva gala bila antar bhāvanam yat tadvat ātma abhyantarīkṛtā prabhā yasya tathā uktaḥ
atra rāhu pīta prabha tva viśiṣṭasya indoḥ tanuḥ upamānam
tapaḥ kṛśā pārvatī upameyā

original: anayoḥ sādhāraṇo dharmaḥ svabhāvataḥ saundarye sati nimittavaśādvicchāyatvam /
analyzed: anayoḥ sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ svabhāvataḥ saundarye sati nimitta vaśāt vicchāya tvam
tat ca sva kaṇṭhena anupāttam api padārtha svarūpa paryālocanayā labhyate

original: evamivādyabhāve 'pyupamānopameyabhāvasyātra sāmarthyātpratipattirjayantīmiti ca upamānādupameyasya viśeṣaḥ khyāpitaḥ /
analyzed: evam iva ādi abhāve pi upamāna upameya bhāvasya atra sāmarthyāt pratipattiḥ jayantīm iti ca upamānāt upameyasya viśeṣaḥ khyāpitaḥ

original: tasya ca viśeṣasya khyāpyamānasya nimittamatra na svakaṇṭhenopāttaṃ,
analyzed: tasya ca viśeṣasya khyāpyamānasya nimittam atra na sva kaṇṭhena upāttam
artha sāmarthyāt tu tat avagamyate

original: rāhurinduprabhāpāne tathā na samarthaḥ yathā tapaḥsātiśayatvātpārvatyāḥ kṣāmatve iti rāhuto 'pi tapaḥsātiśayatvamupamānādupameyasya viśeṣanimittamatrāvagamyate
analyzed: rāhuḥ indu prabhā pāne tathā na samarthaḥ yathā tapaḥ sātiśaya tvāt pārvatyāḥ kṣāma tve iti tapaḥ sātiśaya tvam upamānāt upameyasya viśeṣa nimittam atra avagamyate
evam ayam anupātta nimittaḥ vyatirekaḥ
upātta nimittaḥ tu

original: padmaṃ ca niśi niḥśrīkaṃ divācandraṃ ca niṣprabham /
analyzed: padmam ca niśi niḥśrīkam divācandram ca niṣprabham
sphurat chāyena satatam mukhena adhas prakurvatīm
mukham upameyam
padmam induḥ ca upamānam
tat ca atra dvayam sva kaṇṭha spṛṣṭam
tayoḥ tu sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ kāntimat tā ādiḥ upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ ca iti a tad ubhayam sāmarthyāt avagamyate
na khalu atra vakṣyamāṇa vyatireka vat upamāna upameya bhāvasya dyotakāḥ iva ādayaḥ upāttāḥ
adhas prakurvatīm iti ca upamānāt upameyasya viśeṣaḥ khyāpitaḥ
tatra ca nimittam upāttam upamāna upameya ubhaya ādhāra tvena
upamānayoḥ tāvat padma candrayoḥ niśi divā ca yathākramam niḥśrīka tva niṣprabha tve
upameye tu rātrindivam sphurat chāya tā
atas viśeṣe nimitta darśanena ayam vyatirekaḥ

original: tadevaṃ yatrevādinopamānopameyabhāvo nāvadyotitastatra dvividho vyatireko darśitaḥ /
analyzed: tat evam yatra iva ādinā upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ na avadyotitaḥ tatra dvividhaḥ vyatirekaḥ darśitaḥ
iva ādi upāte tu upamāna upameya bhāve yaḥ vyatirekaḥ tam āha
yaḥ vaidharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā iva ādi samanvitaḥ
vyatirekaḥ tra saḥ pi īṣṭaḥ viśeṣa āpādana anvayāt
yaḥ vaidharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ eti viśeṣa āpādana anvayāt ati ca vyatireka lakṣaṇam yojitam
vaidharmyam hi upameya dharmasya upamāne vigamaḥ
yathevādi samanvitaḥ iti anena yathevādi avadyotita tvam upamāna upameya bhāvasya āha
tasya udāharaṇam
śīrṇa parṇa ambu vāta āśa kaṣṭe tapasi sthitām
samudvahantīm na apūrvam garvam anya tapasvi vat
śīrṇa parṇa ambu vātānām āśaḥ bhakṣaṇam
atra anya tapasvinaḥ upamānam
bhagavatī upameyā
sādhāraṇaḥ ca dharmaḥ kaṣṭe tapasi avasthita tvāt cetasaḥ sa ullāsa tā
vatiḥ ca atra garva udvahana nibandhanam yat tat cetasaḥ sa ullāsa tvam tat nibandhanam upamāna upameya bhāvam avagamayati
garvam na samudvahantīm iti upamānāt upameyasya viśeṣaḥ

original: anye kila tapasvinaḥ sātiśayatapovaśātsamullasitacittāḥ santo garvaṃ samudvahanti,
analyzed: anye kila tapasvinaḥ sa atiśaya tapaḥ vaśāt samullasita cittāḥ santaḥ garvam samudvahanti
bhagavatī tu atyantam upaśānta citta tvāt na tathā
evam ca atra garva upakrama avasthā apekṣam upamāna upameyayoḥ sādṛśyam
tad anirvāhāt tu upamānāt upameyasya vyatirekaḥ
anirvāhe ca nimittam atra sva kaṇṭhena anupāttam api artha sāmarthyāt avagamyate atyanta upaśānta citta tvam nāma
evam ayam nimitta adarśane bati upātta upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ vyatirekaḥ udāhṛtaḥ
nimitta upādāne tu tasya udāharaṇam unneyam
evam ete catvāraḥ vyatirekāḥ pratipāditāḥ
nimitta darśana adarśanābhyām yau tayoḥ
pratyekam upamāna upameya bhāvasya iva ādi upādāna anupādānābhyām dvi bheda tvāt

original: eṣāmapi caturṇāṃ vyatirekāṇāṃ śliṣṭoktiyogyaśabdopādāne sati punarapare pūrvopakrāntenaiva rūpeṇa catvāro bhedā bhavanti /
analyzed: eṣām api caturṇām vyatirekāṇām śliṣṭa ukti yogya śabda upādāne sati punar apare pūrva upakrāntena eva rūpeṇa catvāraḥ bhedāḥ bhavanti
tat āha
śliṣṭa ukti yogya śabdasya pṛthak pṛthak udāhṛtau

original: viśeṣāpādanaṃ yatsyādyvatarekaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ // UKss_2.8 //
analyzed: viśeṣa āpādanam yat syāt yvatarekaḥ sa ca smṛtaḥ
eka prayatna uccāryāṇām ityādi vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇam śliṣṭam

original: śliṣṭālaṅkārasamucitaṃ yaduccāraṇaṃ tatsamucitasya śabdasya yadā tantreṇa sadṛśaśabdāntaropādānahetutayā vā prayogo na kriyate api tu pṛthak
analyzed: śliṣṭa alaṅkāra samucitam yat uccāraṇam tad samucitasya śabdasya yadā tantreṇa sadṛśa śabda antara upādāna hetutayā vā prayogaḥ na kriyate api tu pṛthak
tadā viśeṣa āpādane sati bhavati
tasya udāharaṇam
yā śaiśirī śrīḥ tapasā māsena ekena viśrutā
tapasā tām su dīrgheṇa dūrāt vidadhatīm adhas
atra śiśira śobhā upamānam
bhagavatī upameyā
tayoḥ ca sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ tapaḥ yukta tvam nāma
ekatra tapā
māghaḥ māsaḥ
aparatra tu abhyudaya hetuḥ kṛcchra ācaraṇam
iva ādayaḥ ca atra anupāttāḥ api sāmarthyāt avagamyante
vyatirekaḥ tu dūrāt vidadhatīm adhas iti

original: tasya ca nimittaṃ māsaikyaṃ dīrdhatvaṃ ca tapasoḥ /
analyzed: tasya ca nimittam mās aikyam dīrdha tvam ca tapasoḥ
tat ca yathākramam upamāna upameya gata tvena upāttam

original: tatra ca vatyādinā anupātte upamānopameyabhāve nimittadarśanena vyatireka udāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca vati ādinā anupātte upamāna upameya bhāve nimitta darśanena vyatirekaḥ udāhṛtaḥ

original: evamanayā diśāanyadapi śliṣṭoktiyogyaśabdanibandhe sati vyatarekasya pūrvoktanayena bhedatrayamudāhāryam //
analyzed: evam anayā diśā anyat api śliṣṭa ukti yogya śabda nibandhe sati pūrva ukta nayena bheda trayam udāhāryam
vibhāvanā
kriyāyāḥ pratiṣedhe yā tad phalasya vibhāvanā

original: jñeyā vibhāvanaivāsau samādhau sulabhe sati // UKss_2.9 //
analyzed: jñeyā vibhāvanā eva asau samādhau sulabhe sati
iha yat kiṃcid jñāyate tat sarvam kriyā phalam

original: kriyāmukhena kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryotpatteḥ prātītikena rūpeṇa paridṛśyamānatvāt sarveṣāṃ
analyzed: kriyā mukhena kāraṇebhyaḥ kārya utpatteḥ prātītikena rūpeṇa paridṛśyamāna tvāt sarveṣām

original: phalabhūtānāṃ kriyaivāvyavahataṃ kāraṇam yatra ca kriyā pratiṣidhyate atha ca kriyāphalasyotpattirupadiśyate
analyzed: phala bhūtānām kriyā eva avyavahatam kāraṇam yatra ca kriyā pratiṣidhyate atha ca kriyā phalasya utpattiḥ upadiśyate
tatra vibhāvana ākhyaḥ laṃkāraḥ
kāraṇa vigame kila kāryasya tatra utpattiḥ upavarṇyate
atas viruddha ābhāsā bhāvanā utpādanā
tena vibhāvanā

original: nanvevaṃ sati vyarthadoṣatvaprasaṅgaḥ 'viruddhārthaṃ mataṃ vyartham'iti ata āha---samādhau sulabhe satīti /
analyzed: nanu evam sati vyartha doṣa tva prasaṅgaḥ viruddha artham matam vyartham iti atas āha samādhau sulabhe sati iti
samādhiḥ parihāraḥ
yatra virodhasya sulabhaḥ para hāraḥ iti arthaḥ
tasyāḥ udāharaṇam
aṅga lekhām a kāśmīra samālambhana piñcarām
an alaktaka tāmra ābhām oṣṭha mudrām ca bibhratīm
aṅga lekhā śarīra yaṣṭiḥ
kāramīram kuṅkumam

original: yeyaṃ pītacchāyatā śarīrasya sā nāyikānāṃ kuṅkumasamālambhanalakṣaṇakriyākāryā prāryaṇa paridṛśyate,
analyzed: yā iyam pīta chāya tā śarīrasya sā nāyikānām kuṅkuma samālambhana lakṣaṇa kriyā kāryā paridṛśyate
bhagavatyāḥ tu śarīre pīta chāya tvam na kuṅkuma samālambhanena utpāditam

original: ataḥ kuṅkumasamālambhanalakṣaṇāyāḥ kriyāyā vigame phalasya pītacchāyatvasyātropadeśaḥ /
analyzed: atas kuṅkuma samālambhana lakṣaṇāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ vigame phalasya pīta chāya tvasya atra upadeśaḥ
parihāraḥ ca atra svābhāvika tayā tad chāya tvam iti
tena iyam vibhāvanā

original: analaktakatāmrākṣāmityatrālaktakakāraṇikāyā rāgakriyāyā niṣedhe tatphalasya lauhityasya utpattiḥ svābhāvikī nirdiṣṭā /
analyzed: an alaktaka tāmra akṣām iti atra alaktaka kāraṇikāyāḥ rāga kriyāyāḥ niṣedhe tad phalasya lauhityasya utpattiḥ svābhāvikī nirdiṣṭā
atas vibhāvanā

original: atra ca kuṅkumādisaṃpādyena piñcaratvādinā upamānabhūtena svābhāvikasya piñjaratvāderupameyabhūtasyābhedādhyavasāyo 'tiśayoktyā draṣṭavyaḥ
analyzed: atra ca kuṅkuma ādi saṃpādyena piñcara tva ādinā upamāna bhūtena svābhāvikasya piñjara tva ādeḥ upameya bhūtasya abheda adhyavasāya utiśayoktyā draṣṭavyaḥ
samāsoktiḥ
prakṛta arthena vākyena tad samānaiḥ viśeṣaṇaiḥ
aprastuta artha kathanam samāsoktiḥ udāhṛtā

original: yatra prastutārthaniṣṭhaṃ vākyaṃ tatsamānairviśeṣaṇaistenāprakṛtenārthena tulyāni yāni viśeṣaṇāni taddvāreṇa sādṛśyavaśādaprastutamarthamupamānabhūtaṃ
analyzed: yatra prastuta artha niṣṭham vākyam tad samānaiḥ viśeṣaṇaiḥ tena aprakṛtena arthena tulyāni yāni viśeṣaṇāni tad dvāreṇa sādṛśya vaśāt aprastutam artham upamāna bhūtam
sā saṃkṣepeṇa upamāna upameya lakṣaṇa artha dva tayā abhidhānāt samāsoktiḥ
tasyāḥ udāharaṇam
danta prabhā su manasam pāṇi pallava śobhinīm
tanvīm vana gatām līna jaṭā ṣaṭcaraṇa āvalim

original: atra dantaprabhāpāṇijaṭā bhagavatīviśeṣaṇabhūtā yathākramaṃ latāgatasumanaḥpallavaṣaṭcaraṇarūpeṇa āropeṇa vyā(ptāḥ) (?)
analyzed: atra danta prabhā pāṇi jaṭāḥ bhagavatī viśeṣaṇa bhūtāḥ yathākramam latā gata sumanaḥ pallava ṣaṭcaraṇa rūpeṇa āropeṇa vyāptāḥ
tad bhāvam āpadyante
tanu tvam tu bhagavatī latayoḥ sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ

original: vanaśabdena ca rūpakapratibhotpattihetunā śleṣeṇa bhagavatītapaścaryādhārabhūtamudakaṃ latādhāreṇa kānanena rūpyate /
analyzed: vana śabdena ca rūpaka pratibhā utpatti hetunā śleṣeṇa bhagavatī tapaḥ caryā ādhāra bhūtam udakam latā ādhāreṇa kānanena rūpyate

original: ata etānyatra prakṛtāyā bhagavatyā aprakṛtayā latayā samānāni viśeṣaṇāni /
analyzed: atas etāni atra prakṛtāyāḥ bhagavatyāḥ aprakṛtayā latayā samānāni viśeṣaṇāni

original: tatsāmarthyena ca prakṛtayā bhagavatyā upameyabhūtayā latā upamānatvenākṣipyate /
analyzed: tad sāmarthyena ca prakṛtayā bhagavatyā upameya bhūtayā latā upamāna tvena ākṣipyate
tena iyam samāsoktiḥ
atiśayoktiḥ
nimittataḥ yat tu vayaḥ loka atikrānta gocaram
manyante tām alaṃkāra tayā budhāḥ
bhede na anya tvam anyatra nānātvam yatra badhyate
tathā saṃbhāvyamāna artha nibandhe tiśayokti gīḥ
kārya kāraṇayoḥ yatra paurvāparya viparyayāt

original: āśubhāvaṃ samālambya badhyate so 'pi pūrvavat // UKss_2.13 //
analyzed: āśu bhāvam samālambya badhyate saḥ u pi pūrvavat
yat vacanam kiṃcid kāraṇam āśritya loka atikrānta gocaram upanibadhyate sā atiśayoktiḥ

original: tasyāśca catvāro bhedāḥ yatra bhede anyatve ananyatvamaikyaṃ sa ekaḥ /
analyzed: tasyāḥ ca catvāraḥ bhedāḥ yatra bhede anyatve ananyatvam aikyam saḥ ekaḥ

original: anyatrābhede aikye nānātvaṃ bhedo yatra sa dvitīyaḥ /
analyzed: anyatra abhede aikye nānātvam bhedaḥ yatra sa dvitīyaḥ
tathā bahis a vidyamānasya arthasya saṃbhāvanā mātreṇa upanibandhe tṛtayaḥ
kārya kāraṇayoḥ tu kāryasya śīghram eva utpādāt paurvāparya viparyayeṇa caturthaḥ bhedaḥ
bhedasya udāharaṇam
tapaḥ tejaḥ sphuritayā nija lāvaṇya saṃpadā
kṛśām api akṛśām eva dṛśyamānām asaṃśayam

original: atra yāsāvakārśyāvasthā bhagavatyāḥ pūrvamabhūttato bhinnamapi tapojanitaṃ kārśyaṃ tadabhedenopanibaddhamakṛśāmeveti /
analyzed: atra yā asau akārśya avasthā bhagavatyāḥ pūrvam abhūt tatas bhinnam api tapaḥ janitam kārśyam tat abhedena upanibaddham akṛśām eva iti

original: tatra ca nimittaṃ tapastejasā saviśeṣatvamāpāditaḥ saundaryasaṃbhāraḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca nimittam tapaḥ tejasā sa viśeṣa tvam āpāditaḥ saundarya saṃbhāraḥ
atas nimitta vaśena loka atikrāntaḥ gocaraḥ sya vākyasya
tena iyam ataśayoktiḥ
dvitīyasya tu bhedasya udāharaṇam
acintayat ca bhagavān aho nu ramaṇīya tā
tapasā asyāḥ kṛta anya tvam kaumāra ādyena lakṣyate

original: atra bhagavatī kumārībhāve 'pi vartamānā taduttarakālabhāvinī yāsauyauvanāvasthā tadyuktatvenopanibaddhā kaumārādanyatvamiti /
analyzed: atra bhagavatī kumārī bhāve vartamānā tad uttara kāla bhāvinī yā asau yauvana avasthā tad yukta tvena upanibaddhā kaumārāt anya tvam iti
nimittam ca atra tapaḥ janitā ramaṇīya tā
tena ayam abhede bheda upanibandhaḥ
tṛtīyasya punar bhedasya udāharaṇam
patet yadi śaśi dyota chaṭā padme vikāśini
muktāphala akṣamālāyāḥ kare syāḥ syāt tadā upamā

original: asyāḥ kare muktāphalākṣamālāyāstadā upamā syāditi saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: asyāḥ kare muktāphala akṣamālāyāḥ tadā upamā syāt iti saṃbandhaḥ

original: atra rajanikarakarasaṃparke sati kamalasya saṃkocāvalokanādvikāśitvaṃ bahirasaṃbhavadapi kaviprajāpatinā pratibhopajanitena svavyāpāreṇa saṃbhavadrūpatayā  #
analyzed: atra rajanikara kara saṃparke sati kamalasya saṃkoca avalokanāt vikāśi tvam bahis asaṃbhavat api kavi prajāpatinā pratibhā upajanitena sva vyāpāreṇa saṃbhavat rūpa tayā
pradarśitam
atas tra saṃbhāvyamāna artha nibandhaḥ

original: tasya ca lokātikrāntagocarasyārthasya saṃbhāvanāyā nimittaṃ bhagavatīkarādhāratayā muktāphalākṣamālāvalokanam /
analyzed: tasya ca loka atikrānta gocarasya arthasya saṃbhāvanāyāḥ nimittam bhagavatī kara ādhāra tayā muktāphala akṣa mālā avalokanam
tathā hi ayam tāvat loka atikrāntaḥ paridṛṣṭa pūrvaḥ smābhiḥ gaurī kara muktāphala akṣamālayoḥ ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ valokitaḥ

original: tatsajātīyasya padmasya vikāśinaścandrakarāṇāṃ ca yadyādhārādheyabhāvaḥ syāttadātropamānopameyabhāvo bhavediti saṃbhāvanā pravṛttā /
analyzed: tad sajātīyasya padmasya vikāśinaḥ candrakarāṇām ca yadi ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ syāt tadā atra upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ bhavet iti saṃbhāvanā pravṛttā
sajātīya padārtha darśanāt bahara saṃbhavat api vastu saṃbhavat rūpa tayā upavarṇyate

original: ekasmin khalu padārthe paridṛṣṭe anyasminnanavalokite 'pi tatsajātīyasaṃbhāvanā pravartate /
analyzed: ekasmin khalu padārthe paridṛṣṭe anyasmin anavalokite tad sajātīya saṃbhāvanā pravartate
yathā dākṣiṇātyasya ekasmin uṣṭre paridṛṣṭe satya paridṛṣṭa uṣṭra antara saṃbhāvanā
atas tra saṃbhāvanā sa nimittā

original: anena ca prakāreṇātropamānābhāvaḥ prakṛtasya vastunaḥ pradarśyate nāstyanyatkiṃcidasyopamānamiti /
analyzed: anena ca prakāreṇa atra upamāna abhāvaḥ prakṛtasya vastunaḥ pradarśyate na asti anyat kiṃcid asya upamānam iti

original: ata eva saṃbhāvyamānatayārthasyopanibaddhasya nirācikīrṣayā yadiśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva saṃbhāvyamāna tayā arthasya upanibaddhasya nirācikīrṣayā yadi śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ
yadi śabdena hi atra āśaṅkā dyotyate
āśaṅkā ca aniścita sadbhāve vastuni bhavati

original: yaccāniścitasadbhāvaṃ kavivedhasā saṃbhavadrūpatayopadarśitaṃ vastu tasya purāṇaprajāpatinirmitapadārthaviṣayāyā
analyzed: yat ca aniścita sadbhāvam kavi vedhasā saṃbhavat rūpa tayā upadarśitam vastu tasya purāṇa prajāpati nirmita padārtha viṣayāyāḥ
tad viruddhayā loka pratītyā yāt nirākriyamāṇa tvam tāvat nirupama tvam pratīyate

caturthaḥ tu

original: manye ca nipatantyasyāḥ kaṭākṣā dikṣu pṛṣṭhataḥ /

original: kāryakāraṇayostu kāraṇasya naisargikaṃ prāgbhāvitvaṃ kāryasya tu paścādbhāvitvam /

original: paścādbhāvitatvena ca kāraṇasya kaṭākṣā dikṣu pṛṣṭhataḥ paścāt patanti agre smarabāṇaparamparā gacchantīti atra nimittaṃ (anu)

yathāsaṃkhyam

kramaśas yaḥ nu nirdeśaḥ yathāsaṃkhyam tat ucyate
pūrvam uddiṣṭānām arthānām yadā krameṇa artha antarāṇi anunirdiśyante tadā yathā saṃkhyā ākhyaḥ laṅkāraḥ

original: tatra hi saṃkhyopalakṣitakramānatikrameṇa śabdenānupātto 'pi padārthānāmanvayaḥ samāśrīyate /
analyzed: tatra hi saṃkhyā upalakṣita krama anatikrameṇa śabdena anupāttaḥ pi padārthānām anvayaḥ samāśrīyate
atas yathākramam padārthānām anvaya dhvananāt etasya alaṅkārasya yathāsaṃkhya tā

original: sa cālaṅkāro bahūnāmalpaśo 'pyupanibadhyamāno yataḥ śobhābaddho bhavati ato bhūyasāmityuktam /
analyzed: sa ca alaṅkāraḥ bahūnām alpaśas pi upanibadhyamānaḥ yatas śobhā baddhaḥ bhavati atas bhūyasām iti uktam

original: dvayorhi tasyopanibadhyamānasya yāvaccaturguṇatvādirūpatayopanibandho na kṛtaḥ tāvacchobhopetatvaṃ na bhavati /

bhūyasām punar arthānām tat yathāsaṃkhyam alpena eva prayāsena aramyam bhavati

original: tatra hi tasya dviguṇasya triguṇasya vopanibandhe śobhātiśayo jāyate /

original: yatteṣu pathaiva tato dvayostu bahūśo nibadhnīyāt //

original: nanu “mṛṇālahaṃse“tyādāvupavarṇayiṣyamāṇe udāharaṇe mṛṇālādibhya upamānebhyo bāhvādīnāmupameyānāṃ viśeṣakhyāpanādyvatirekālaṅkāreṇa sahṛdayahṛdayāṇyāvarjyante,
analyzed: nanu mṛṇāla haṃsa ityādau upavarṇayiṣyamāṇe udāharaṇe mṛṇāla ādibhyaḥ upamānebhyaḥ bāhu ādīnām upameyānām viśeṣa khyāpana ādi vatireka alaṅkāreṇa sahṛdaya hṛdayāṇi āvarjyante
na tu yathāsaṃkhyena
tat katham yathāsaṃkhyam alaṅkāraḥ iti āśaṅkya uktam asadharmaṇām iti
yatra api hi sādharmya bhāvāt upamāna upameya bhāva abhāvena vyatireka ādeḥ upanibandha abhāvaḥ tatra api ayam śobhā atiśayam āvahati iti arthaḥ
yathā
kajjala hima kanaka rucaḥ suparṇa vṛṣa haṃsa vāhanāḥ śam naḥ

iti

original: atra hi hariprabhṛtīnāṃ trayāṇāmuddiṣṭānāṃ kajjalaruktvasuparṇavāhanatvajalanidhisthatvādayo dharmāḥ krameṇānunirdiṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: atra hi hari prabhṛtīnām trayāṇām uddiṣṭānām kajjala ruj tva suparṇa vāhana tva jalanidhi stha tva ādayaḥ dharmāḥ krameṇa anunirdiṣṭāḥ
na ca tatra paraspara sādharmyam vidyate

original: atha ca kramaparyālocanayā arthānāmānurūpyeṇa samanvayapratīteḥ śobhātiśayo vidyate /
analyzed: atha ca krama paryālocanayā arthānām ānurūpyeṇa samanvaya pratīteḥ śobhā atiśayaḥ vidyate

original: tenāsya sādharmyādyabhāve 'pi pṛthagalaṅkāratāpratilambhādyatra sādharmyādi vidyate tatrāpyalaṅkāratvaṃ durnivāram /
analyzed: tena asya sādharmya ādi abhāve pi pṛthak alaṅkāra tā pratilambhāt yatra sādharmya ādi vidyate tatra api alaṅkāra tvam durnivāram

tena ayam aṅga aṅgi bhāve saṅkaraḥ
yat vakṣyati paraspara upakāreṇa yatra alaṅkṛtayaḥ sthitāḥ
svātantryeṇa ātma lābham no labhante saḥ saṅkaraḥ
iti
atas yathāsaṃkhyam pṛthak alaṅkāra tvena upadeṣṭavyam
tasya udāharaṇam
mṛṇāla haṃsa padmāni bāhu caṅkramaṇa ānanaiḥ

original: nirjayantyānayā vyaktaṃ nalinyaḥ sakalā jitāḥ // UKss_3.*1 //

utprekṣā
sāmya rūpa avivakṣāyām vācya iva ādi ātmabhiḥ padaiḥ
a tad guṇa kriyā yogāt utprekṣā atiśaya anvitā

original: yatrevādipadanibandhaḥ sāmyasya ca rūpaṃ na vivakṣyate tatrotprekṣākhyo 'laṅkāraḥ /

dyotyasya upamāna upameya bhāvasya abhāve sati iva ādīnām aprayoga prasaṅgāt iti āśaṅkya uktam a tad guṇa kriyā yogāt iti
dravya dharmaḥ siddhaḥ guṇaḥ

idam khalu viśvam

original: atra asauprakṛto yor'thastasya ye kriyāguṇā anantaroktalakṣaṇāstadyogātsāmyarūpāvivakṣāyāmapi ivādiśabdapravṛttiravaraddhā /

original: yatra kilopamānopameyabhāvena sāmyaṃ tatropamānasādṛśyādupamānavartināṃ kriyāguṇānāṃ upameyapratītirbhavati /

original: utprekṣāyāmapi ca yo 'sāvasaḥ aprakṛtastasya ye kriyāguṇāste tasminnaprakṛte vastunyupamānatayānulliṅgite 'pi prakṛte vastunyāsajyante /

tena a tad guṇa kraya ayogāt asyāḥ iva ādi vācya tvam
atas eva anya dharmāṇām svadharmi bhūtāt vastunaḥ utkalitānām rasa bhāva di abhivyaktai anuguṇa tayā vastu antara adhyasta tvena labdha prakarṣāṇām īkṣaṇāt iyam utprekṣā

original: na hi vastvantaradharmā vastvantare samāsaktuṃ śakyā ityāśaṅkyoktam---atiśayānviteti /

original: tatra yā vācyā svakaṇṭhenevādibhirvaktavyā sā ivādībhirucyate /

original: atra japāsaktā bhagavatī arkamavalokayatīti tasyāḥ śaśāṅkasadṛse mukhe śyāmikā saṃjātā /

original: taccātra tasyāḥ śyamikāyā janma atiśayoktyā pātarūpatayā pratipāditaṃ patitamiti /

original: sā cātra śyāmika śaśilāñchanena śaśena tulyā /

original: yadetacchaśino lāñchanaṃ śyāmikārūpaṃ tadbhagavatīvadana indubhrāntyeva nipatitamiti /

original: evaṃ cātra śaśasadṛśī śyāmikā caitanyaśūnyatvena bhagavatīvadanamindubhrāntyā na gocarīkaroti /

original: atha ca tasyāḥ śaśabhāvamāpāditāyā indubhramalakṣaṇena cetanadharmeṇa saṃbandho nibaddhaḥ /

original: tenātra tasya vastvantarasya cetanasya yo 'sau guṇo bhramalakṣaṇastadyogādivādeḥ pravṛttiḥ /

original: indubhramaśca bhāvarūpo guṇaḥ śaśīkṛtaśyamikākartṛkatayā kavinibaddhena vaktrā bhagavatābhimānenādhyavasitaḥ /

original: atra kapolaphalakayostapovaśāt kṣāmatvamāpannayoḥ parasparādarśanamabhāvarūpaṃ sādhyatvāt kriyārūpakṣāmatāyāṃ kāraṇatayotprekṣitam /

original: bhṛgabālādeḥ svasamucite vyāpāre pravṛttasya ye hevākāḥ svajātyānurūpyeṇābhiniveśaviśeṣāstadupanibandhaḥ svabhāvoktiḥ /

original: uddīpanavibhāvastu yadvaśena ratyādīnāṃ bhāvānāmatiśayena dīptatā bhavati,
analyzed: uddīpana vibhāvaḥ tu yad vaśena rati ādīnām bhāvānām atiśayena dīpta tā bhavati

gamayati yathā ati bahala nīla jalada udayaḥ vṛṣṭim

original: yathā hi kāryasya suvivecitasya kāraṇaṃ pratyavyabhicāritā evaṃ kāraṇasyāpi suvivecitasya kāryaṃ pratyavyabhicāritā vyavahāre bāhulyena dṛśyate
analyzed: yathā hi kāryasya su vivecitasya kāraṇam pratyavyabhicāri tā evam kāraṇasya api su vivecitasya kāryam pratyavyabhicāri tā vyavahāre bāhulyena dṛśyate
atas vibhāvaḥ kāraṇa tvāt rati ādīn kārya bhūtān gamayati

original: vyabhicārī tu ratyādikānāṃ sthāyināṃ bhāvānāmavasthāviśeṣarūpo nirvedādiḥ /

original: sa ca sahacāritvāt sthāyināṃ bhāvānāmavasthāviśeṣarūpo nirvedādiḥ /

original: samastatvena vyastatvena ca yathāyogaṃ sūcanāni svalakṣaṇasvarūpāṇāṃ sāmānyāvasthāpāditānāṃ

original: ete ca śṛṅgārādayo nava yathāyogaṃ caturvargaprāptyupāyatayā taditaraparihāranibandhanataya ca ratyādīnāṃ sthāyināṃ navānāṃ bhāvānāṃ yaḥ paripoṣastadātmakāḥ
analyzed: ete ca śṛṅgāra ādayaḥ nava yathāyogam caturvarga prāpti upāya tayā tad itara parihāra nibandhana tayā ca rati ādīnām sthāyinām navānām bhāvānām yaḥ paripoṣaḥ tad ātmakāḥ
atas tathāvidhena rūpeṇa āsvādya tvāt āsvāda bheda nibandhanena tāntrikeṇa rasa śabdena abhidhīyante
nirveda ādau tu tathāvidhasya āsvādyasya abhāvāt pravṛtti nimitta bheda nibandhanasya tāntrikasya rasa śabdasya apravṛttiḥ
āsvādya tva mātra vivakṣayā tu tatra api madhura amla ādi vat rasa śabda pravṛttiḥ aviruddhā
yat uktam śṛṅgāra ādīn rasān anukramya rasanāt rasa tvam eṣām madhura ādīnām iva uktam ācāryaiḥ

tat āhuḥ

original: tādṛśa ityanena āsvādaviśeṣanibandhanatvaṃ śṛṅgarādiṣu tāntrikasya rasaśabdasyoktam /

original: eṣāṃ ca śṛṅgārādīnāṃ navānāṃ rasānāṃ svaśabdādibhiḥ pañcabhiravagatirbhavati /
analyzed: eṣām ca śṛṅgāra ādīnām navānām rasānām sva śabda ādibhiḥ pañcabhiḥ avagatiḥ bhavati
yat uktam bhaṭṭodbhaṭena pañca rūpāḥ rasāḥ iti
tatra sva śabdāḥ śṛṅgāra ādeḥ vācakāḥ śṛṅgāra ādayaḥ śabdāḥ
sthāyinaḥ rasānām upādāna kāraṇa prakhyāḥ rati ādayaḥ nava bhāvāḥ
saṃcāriṇaḥ tu nirveda ādayaḥ rasānām avasthā viśeṣa rūpāḥ
vibhāvāḥ tu teṣām nimitta kāraṇa bhūtāḥ yoṣit ādayaḥ ṛtu mālya anulepana ādayaḥ ca
āṅgika ādayaḥ tu catvāraḥ rasānām kārya bhūtāḥ abhinayāḥ

original: eteṣāṃ ca svaśabdādīnāṃ pañcānāṃ samastavyastatayā āspadatvādyena kāvyena sphuṭarūpatayā śṛṅgārādirasāvirbhāvo darśyate tatkāvyaṃ rasavat /

rasāḥ khalu tasya alaṅkārāḥ

original: tatra yatra śāstrasaṃvidaviruddhena rūpeṇa teṣāmupanibandhastatra preyo 'laṅkāro rasavadalaṅkāraścābhihitaḥ /

original: yatra tu tadviruddhatvaṃ tanmūlakalokavyavahāraviruddhatvaṃ ca tadviṣayāṇāṃ rasabhāvanāmupanibandhe satyūrjasvikāvyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yatra tu tad viruddha tvam tad mūlaka lokavyavahāra viruddha tvam ca tad viṣayāṇām rasa bhāvanām upanibandhe sati ūrjasvi kāvyam bhavati

original: tatra hi rāgadveṣamohakāraṇakā anaucityena rasabhāvā upanibadhyante /
analyzed: tatra hi rāga dveṣa moha kāraṇakāḥ anaucityena rasa bhāvāḥ upanibadhyante

original: ata eva tatra svakalpanāparikalpitatvena ūrjaso balasya vidyāmānatvādūrjakhivyapadeśaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva tatra sva kalpanā parikalpita tvena ūrjasaḥ balasya vidyā māna tvāt ūrjakhi vyapadeśaḥ
jyotsnā tamisrā iti atra urjasvi śabdaḥ
tasya udāharaṇam

original: tathā kāmo 'sya vavṛdhe yathā himagireḥ sutām /
analyzed: tathā kāmaḥ sya vavṛdhe yathā himagireḥ sutām
saṃgrahītum pravavṛte haṭhena upāsya satyatham

original: atra sakalalokātiśāyino bhagavato 'kṛtavivāhakamārīviṣayatayā haṭhasaṃgrahaḥ śāstrasaṃvidviruddhaḥ pravṛddharāgakāraṇaku upanibaddhaḥ /
analyzed: atra sakala loka atiśāyinaḥ bhagavataḥ kṛta vivāhaka mārī viṣaya tayā haṭha saṃgrahaḥ śāstra saṃvid viruddhaḥ upanibaddhaḥ
tena ūrjastitā

original: tatra kāmo vavṛdhe ityayaṃ śṛṅgārasya svaśabdaḥ /
analyzed: tatra kāmaḥ vavṛdhe iti ayam śṛṅgārasya sva śabdaḥ
tasya rati paripoṣa ātmaka tvena kāma vṛddhi svabhāva tvāt kāma śabdaḥ tu etad antargataḥ

original: śṛṅgārasya yāsau sthāyibhūtā ratistasyāḥ svaśabdaḥ himagireḥ sutāmityālambanavibhāvaḥ /
analyzed: śṛṅgārasya yā asau sthāyi bhūtā ratiḥ tasyāḥ sva śabdaḥ himagireḥ sutām iti ālambana vibhāvaḥ
haṭhena iti anena āvega lakṣaṇaḥ vyabhicārībhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ

paryāya uktam
paryāya uktam yat anyena prakāreṇa abhidhīyate
vācya vācaka vṛttibhyām śūnyena avagama ātmanā
vācakasya abhidhāyakasya sva śabdasya vṛttiḥ vyāpāraḥ vācya artha pratyāyanam
vācyasya tu abhidheyasya vyāpāraḥ vācya antareṇa saha ākāṅkṣā saṃnidhi yogyatā māhātmyāt saṃsarga gamanam
evaṃvidhaḥ ca yaḥ vācya vācakayoḥ vyāpāraḥ tam antareṇa api prakāra antareṇa artha sāmarthya ātmanā avagama svabhāvena

original: yadavagamyate tatparyāyeṇa svakaṇṭhānabhihitamapi sāntareṇa śabdavyāpāreṇāvagamyamānatvāt paryāyoktaṃ vastu /

original: asvāpaphalalubdhe hitapradetyatra tu bhagavatīpakṣe asvāpaṃ sukhenāptuṃ yanna śakyate phalaṃ tatra ye lubdhāstebhya īhitamīpsitaṃ pradadātītyarthaḥ

original: prabhātasandhyāpakṣe tu svāpasya nidrānubhavasya yatphalaṃ śramanivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ tatra
analyzed: prabhāta sandhyā pakṣe tu svāpasya nidrā anubhavasya yat phalam śrama nivṛtti lakṣaṇam tatra

original: yo na lubdhaḥ sandhyopāsanapravṛttatvāttadviṣayaṃ hitamadṛṣṭaṃ samarpayatītyevaṃvidhetyarthaḥ /

atra ca pūrvasmin pakṣe aikapadyāt
tha a tha ādi svareṇa anta udātta tvam

original: uttaratra punarasvāpaphalalubdhe iti hitapradeti ca anayorbhinnapadatvānnānāsvaratvam /

original: asvāpeti akārasya phalalubdhe iti ca ekārasya ubhayoḥ pakṣayoryathāyogaṃ lāghavālāghavābhyāṃ prayatnabhedo 'pi /

iva śabdaḥ ca upamāna upameya bhāvam dyotayati

original: muktā parityaktā aśrīraśobhā yayā sā tathāvidhā /

original: tathā padmavat kamalavat rāgo lauhityaṃ yayostathāvidhau pādapallavau yasyāsatadrūpā /
analyzed: tathā padma vat kamala vat rāgaḥ lauhityam yayoḥ tathāvidhau pāda pallavau yasyāḥ asa tadrūpā

original: yadā tvasau bhagavatī rūpakapratibhotpattinibandhanena śleṣeṇa trailokyodaravartimāṇikyasaṃbhārarūpatayā
analyzed: yadā tu asau bhagavatī rūpaka pratibhā utpatti nibandhanena śleṣeṇa trailokya udara varti māṇikya saṃbhāra rūpa tayā
rūpyate tadā prakṛta ūrthaḥ candrakānta indranīla mauktika śobhā padmarāgaiḥ avacchādita rūpa tayā pratīyate
sākṣāt evaṃvidha ratna maya avayava yogi tvāt tribhuvana udara antargata ratna samṛddhi rūpā iti
atra ca muktāśrīḥ iti atra svarabhedaḥ vidyate
bahuvrīhi pakṣe bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā iti pūrva pada prakṛti svara tvāt
tatpuruṣe tu samāsa anta udātta tvāt
śiṣṭānām tu śabdānām svarabhedaḥ na asti
prayatna guru tva aguru tve tu trijagat ratna śabda vyatirikteṣu tad tad varṇa viṣaya tayā vidyete
tena tatra śabda śleṣa tā
trijagat ratna śabdasya tu ubhayatra api kasyacid viśeṣasya a vidyamāna tvāt artha śleṣa tvam

original: apārijātavārtāpītyatra bhagavatyajātaśatrutvādapagataśatrusamūhavārtā tadīyā ca śobhā sarvasya cittamāvarjayatītyato nandanā śrīryasyāstathāvidhā
analyzed: a pārijāta vārtā api iti atra bhagavati ajāta śatru tvāt apagata śatru samūha vārtā tadīyā ca śobhā sarvasya cittam āvarjayati iti atas nandanā śrīḥ yasyāḥ tathāvidhā

original: udakamadhyavartitayā ca yo 'sau apsu udake pratabimbita industadvatsundarī /
analyzed: udaka madhya varti tayā ca yaḥ sau apsu udake pratabimbitaḥ induḥ tadvat sundarī
nityam ca galat lāvaṇya pravāhā
yadā tu asau bhagavatī nandana śrī śabdasya deva udyāna śobhā lakṣaṇa artha antara abhidhāya tvāt rūpaka pritibhā utpatti nibandhanena
śleṣeṇa etad bhāvam āpadyate tadā tad samāśraya tvena apārijāta vārtā api ityādi pada paryālocanayā
virodha pratibhā hetoḥ aparasya api śleṣasya āvirbhāvaḥ bhavati
na khalu deva udyāna śobhā a vidyamāna pārijāta ākhya vṛkṣa viśeṣa vṛttāntā bhavati
na ca asau bhūmau tiṣṭhati

original: abindusundarītyatra tu bindubhiryasyāḥ saundaryaṃ nāsti tasyāḥ kathaṃ lāvaṇyabindavaḥ prasareyuriti virodhapratapattihetuḥ śleṣaḥ /
analyzed: abindusundarī iti atra tu bindubhiḥ yasyāḥ saundaryam na asti tasyāḥ katham lāvaṇya bindavaḥ prasareyuḥ iti virodha pratapatti hetuḥ śleṣaḥ
apa arijāta vārtā api iti atra api apagatā ari jāta vārtā iti bahuvrīhau prakṛtyā iti pūrva pada prakṛti svara tvam
tatpuruṣa pakṣa itu anta udātta tvam
abindu sundarī iti atra abindu vat sandarī iti upamāna tvā tatpuruṣe prakṛti svaraḥ
tasya ca saptamī anta pūrva pada tvāt anena eva sūtreṇa prakṛti svareṇa ādi udātta tvam
a bindu sundarī iti atra tu avyaya tvāt nañaḥ pūrva pada prakṛti svara tvena tat eva
tena atra svarabhedasya abhāvaḥ
prayatna bheda kṛtāt tu cakāra vaicitryāt śabda śleṣa tā
iti mahā śrī pratīhāra indurāja viracitāyām udbhaṭa alaṅkārasārasaṃgraha laghu vṛttau caturthaḥ vargaḥ
atha pañcamaḥ vargaḥ
apahnutim viśeṣa uktim virodham tulyayogitām
aprastuta praśaṃsā ca vyāja stuti vidarśane
upameya upamām ca eva sahoktim saṃkaram tathā
parivṛttim ca jagaduḥ alaṅkārān pare girām
apahnutiḥ
apahnutiḥ abhīṣṭā ca kiñcid antargatā upamā
bhūta artha apahnavena asyāḥ nibandhaḥ kriyate budhaiḥ
yatra bhūtam vidyamānam upameya lakṣaṇam artham apahnutya upamāna rūpa āropeṇa upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ tiḥ alaṅkāraḥ
atra ca prākaraṇikasya
vidyamānasya arthasya yat vidyamānaḥ sphuṭena rūpeṇa upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ cakāsti iti uktam
kiñcid antargatā upamā iti
tasyāḥ uda haraṇam

original: etaddhi na tapaḥ satyamidaṃ hālāhalaṃ viṣam /
analyzed: etat hi na tapaḥ satyam idam hālāhalam viṣam
viśeṣataḥ śaśi kalā komalānām bhavādṛśām

original: atra prākaraṇikasya tapasaḥ svarūpamapahnutya hālāhalaviṣaviśeṣarūpatādhyāropeṇa tatsādṛśyamavagamitam /
analyzed: atra prākaraṇikasya tapasaḥ svarūpam apahnutya hālāhala viṣa viśeṣa rūpatā adhyāropeṇa tad sādṛśyam avagamitam
tat ca atra hālāhala viṣa sādṛśyam upameyasya apahnuta tvāt na sphuṭa rūpam
hālāhala ākhyaḥ viṣa bhedaḥ yaḥ śīghram vyāpādayati
viśeṣoktiḥ
yat sāmagrye pi śaktīnām phala anutpatti bandhanam
viśeṣasya abhidhitsātaḥ tat vaśeṣa uktiḥ ucyate

original: śaktīnāṃ kārakāṇāṃ sāmagrye 'pi avikalatve yaḥ kriyāphalasya kiñcidviśeṣamavagamayitumanutpatterupanibandhaḥ sā viśeṣoktiḥ /
analyzed: śaktīnām kārakāṇām sāmagrye avikala tve yaḥ kriyā phalasya kiñcid viśeṣam avagamayitum anutpatteḥ upanibandhaḥ sā viśeṣoktiḥ
tasyāḥ ca dvau bhedau

original: kvacitkhalu kāraṇasāmagrye 'pi yatkāryaṃ notpadyate tasyānutpattau svakaṇṭhena nimittamupādīyate,
analyzed: kvacid khalu kāraṇa sāmagrye pi yat kāryam na utpadyate tasya anutpattau sva kaṇṭhena nimittam upādīyate
kvacid tu artha sāmarthyāt avagamyate tat āha
darśitena nimittena nimitta adarśanena ca

original: tasyā bandho dvidhā lakṣye dṛśyate lalitātmakaḥ // UKss_5.5 //
analyzed: tasyāḥ bandhaḥ dvidhā lakṣye dṛśyate lalitā ātmakaḥ
adarśanam anupādānam
tatra dvitīyasya bhedasya udāharaṇam
mahā ṛddhini gṛhe janma rūpam smara suhṛd vayaḥ

original: tathāpi na sukhaprāptiḥ kasya citrīyate na dhīḥ // UKss_5.*2 //
analyzed: tathā api na sukha prāptiḥ kasya citrīyate na dhīḥ

original: atra dhanasaṃbhārayogaḥ surūpatvaṃ yauvanaṃ ceti yānyetāni sukhaprāptau kāraṇānyavikalāni tatsadbhāve 'pi kriyāphalabhūtāyāḥ sukhaprāpteranutpattirupanibaddhā
analyzed: atra dhana saṃbhāra yogaḥ surūpa tvam yauvanam ca iti yāni etāni sukha prāptau kāraṇāni avikalāni tad sadbhāve pi kriyā phala bhūtāyāḥ sukha prāpteḥ anutpattiḥ upanibaddhā
pūrva uktānām sukha hetūnām vismaya vibhāvanā ātmaka viśeṣa khyāpanāya
atra ca nimittam khakaṇṭhena anupāttam api artha sāmarthyāt avagamyate
vidhi vaidhurya ādi rūpa śabdaḥ tra śarīrasya rūpa mātra avyabhicāri tvāt rūpa prakarṣa tātparyeṇa upāttaḥ
yauvane hi manmatha abhimukhībhavati
ādi abheda udāharaṇam tu
ittham visaṃṣṭhulam dṛṣṭvā tāvakīnam viceṣṭitam

original: nodeti kimapi praṣṭu satvarasyāpi me vacaḥ // UKss_5.*3 //
analyzed: nā udeti kim api praṣṭu sa tvarasya api me vacaḥ
atra praśna tvarā lakṣaṇa kāraṇa sadbhāve pi praśna vacasaḥ n utpattiḥ upanibaddhā
tayā ca praśna vacana kāraṇasya vismaya vibhāvanā ākhyaḥ viśeṣaḥ vagamyate
atra ca nimittam bhagavatī gati visaṃṣṭhula ceṣṭita darśanam sva kaṇṭhena upāttam
virodhaḥ
guṇasya vā kriyāyāḥ vā viruddha anya kriyā vacaḥ
yat viśeṣa abhidhānāya virodham tam pracakṣate

original: yatra kavinā guṇasya vā kriyāyā vā athavā dvirvāśabdasyopāttatvāt dravyasya viruddho
analyzed: yatra kavinā guṇasya vā kriyāyāḥ vā athavā dvis vā śabdasya upātta tvāt dravyasya

original: 'nyaḥ padārthaḥ sajātīyo vijātīyo vā vacasā svapratibhāprasūtena varṇanikātmanā kriyate
analyzed: nyaḥ padārthaḥ sajātīyaḥ vijātīyaḥ vā vacasā sva pratibhā prasūtena varṇanikā ātmanā kriyate
kañcid viśeṣam avagamayitum sa virodha ākhyaḥ laṅkāraḥ
guṇa kriyā dravyāṇām utprekṣā alaṅkāra lakṣaṇa vyākhyāna samaye svūrūpam uktam
kriyā kāraṇam utpādanam
t pradhānam vacaḥ kriyā vacaḥ

original: kavipratibhayā khalu purāṇaprajāpatinirmitaśuṣkaparuṣapadārthavilakṣaṇāḥ sarasāḥ padārthāḥ abhinavā eva nirmīyante /
analyzed: kavi pratibhayā khalu purāṇa prajāpati nirmita śuṣka paruṣa padārtha vilakṣaṇāḥ sarasāḥ padārthāḥ abhinavāḥ eva nirmīyante
atas kriyā vacaḥ iti uktam
tasya udāharaṇam

original: yadvā māṃ kiṃ karomyeṣa vācālayati vismayaḥ /
analyzed: yat vā mām kim karomi eṣa vācālayati vismayaḥ

original: bhavatyāḥ kvāyamākāraḥ kvedaṃ tapasi pāṭavam // UKss_5.*4 //
analyzed: bhavatyāḥ kva ayam ākāraḥ kva idam tapasi pāṭavam

original: atra yadetatpūrvamupakrāntaṃ vaco me nodetīti tasyākṣepo yadvetikṛtaḥ /
analyzed: atra yat etat pūrvam upakrāntam vacaḥ me na udeti iti tasya ākṣepaḥ yat vā iti kṛtaḥ

original: kiṃvā karomi vismayavācālitaḥ san bravīmi bhavatyāḥ kvate /
analyzed: kiṃvā karomi vismaya vācālitaḥ san bravīmi bhavatyāḥ kva te
eṣa vismayaḥ mām vācālayati iti saṃbandhaḥ

original: atrākṛteḥ sukumārāyāḥ pāṭavasya ca kaṭhinakāyasādhyasya virodho bhagavatīniṣṭhatvenopanibaddhaḥ /
analyzed: atra ākṛteḥ sukumārāyāḥ pāṭavasya ca kaṭhina kāya sādhyasya virodhaḥ bhagavatī niṣṭha tvena upanibaddhaḥ
tena ca vismaya vibhāvanā ākhyaḥ viśeṣaḥ tra khyāpyate
ayam ca asiddha svabhāva dharma niṣṭha tvāt guṇa virodhaḥ
evam sādhya svabhāva dharma niṣṭhe kriyā virodhe udāhāryam

original: tathā dravyavirodhe guṇakriyāvirodhe guṇadravyavirodhe kriyādravyavirodhe ca //
analyzed: tathā dravya virodhe guṇa kriyā virodhe guṇa dravya virodhe kriyā dravya virodhe ca
tulya yogi tā

original: aprastutānāmeva vā yatra sāmyamabhidhīyate sā tulyayogitā /
analyzed: aprastutānām eva vā yatra sāmyam abhidhīyate sā tulyayogitā

original: ata eva prākaraṇikāprākaraṇikobhayārthaniṣṭhatvābhāvāttatropamānopameyoktiśūnyatvaṃ prastāvabhāgbhiḥ prastutaiḥ sāmyābhidhāyi vaca iti saṃbandhaḥ
analyzed: atas eva prākaraṇika aprākaraṇika ubhaya artha niṣṭhatva abhāvāt tatra upamāna upameya ukti śūnyatvam prastāva bhāgbhiḥ prastutaiḥ sāmya abhidhāyi vacaḥ iti saṃbandhaḥ
tasyāḥ pūrva bhedasya udāharaṇam

original: tvadaṅgamārdavaṃ draṣṭuḥ kasya citte na bhāsate /
analyzed: tvad aṅga mārdavam draṣṭuḥ kasya citte na bhāsate
mālatī śaśabhṛt lekhā kadalīnām kaṭhora tā

original: tvaccharīrasaukumāryadarśinaḥ kasyeva cetasi mālatyādīnāṃ kāṭhinyaṃ na bhāsata ityarthaḥ /

atra mālatī ādīnām aprākaraṇikānām eva arthānām kaṭhora tva lakṣaṇam sāmyam upanibaddham
draṣṭuḥ iti tṛn

ucitāni tava aṅgasya yadi amūni tat ucyatām

original: adhikārādupavarṇanāvasarādapagatasya prākaraṇikādaparasya vastuno yatropanibandhaḥ sā aprastutapraśaṃsā /

original: atra kṛcchreṇa gantuṃ śakyate yasmindeśe tadgatakānanānāṃ śobhā aprākaraṇikya eva svadehajarjaratayopavarṇitāḥ /

vyāja stutiḥ

vastutas tu stutiḥ ca iṣṭā vyāja stutiḥ asau matā

original: yatra śabdānāmabhidhāyakānāṃ yā śaktirarthapratyāyanautsukyaṃ tasyā yaḥ svabhāvo niyatārthaniṣṭhatvātmakastena nindā gamyate iva natvasau nindaiva
analyzed: yatra śabdānām abhidhāyakānām yā śaktiḥ artha pratyāyana autsukyam tasyāḥ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ niyata artha niṣṭha tva ātmakaḥ tena nindā gamyate iva na tu asau nindā eva

atas eva āha
vastutas tu stutiḥ ca iṣṭā iti
vastutas iti artha sāmarthyāt iti arthaḥ

dhik an anya upamām etām tāvakīm rūpa saṃpadam

original: atra yadetaddhigvādopahatatvaṃ rūpasaṃpadaḥ sākṣācchabdavyāpāreṇa spṛṣṭaṃ na tatsvātmaparyavasitaṃ,

vidarśanā
abhavān vastu saṃbandhaḥ bhavan vā yatra kalpayet

original: yatra padārthānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ svayamanupapadyamānaḥ sannupamānopameyabhāve paryavasyati athavā upamānopameyabhāvakalpanayā svātmānamupapādayati  #
analyzed: yatra padārthānām saṃbandhaḥ svayam anupapadyamānaḥ san upamāna upameya bhāve paryavasyati athavā upamāna upameya bhāva kalpanayā sva ātmānam upapādayati
tatra vidarśanā
