vidhuḥ candraḥ
vibhāvarī rātriḥ

original: atra rajanikararahitavibhāvarīviśobhatvasya yadetatkarmatvaṃ tatkāminīkartṛkāyāṃ bharaṇakriyāyāṃ na samanvayaṃ gacchati /
analyzed: atra raja nikara rahita vibhāvarī viśobha tvasya yat etat karma tvam tat kāminī kartṛkāyām bharaṇa kriyāyām na samanvayam gacchati
na hi anyasya saṃbandhinīm viśobhām anyaḥ bibharti
atas padārtha samanvayasya atra anupapattiḥ
upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ tu atra vākya artha viśrānti sthānam kṛṣṇa rātri vat viśobha tām bibhart iti
evam etat bhavati vastu asaṃbandhe upamāna upameya bhāva kalpanāyām udāharaṇam

original: yatra tu padārthasamankya upamānopameyabhāvakalpanayā svātmānamupapādayati tasya vidarśanābhedasyodāharaṇamudbhaṭapustake na dṛśyate /
analyzed: yatra tu upamāna upameya bhāva kalpanayā sva ātmānam upapādayati tasya vidarśana abhedasya udāharaṇam udbhaṭa pustake na dṛśyate
tasya tu bhāmaha udatam idam udāharaṇam
ayam manda dyutiḥ bhāsvānaḥ tam prati yiyāsati
udayaḥ patanāya iti śrīmataḥ bodhayan narān iti
tatra bhāsvataḥ yat etat astamaya aunmukhyam

original: tadupetasya śrīmataḥ prayojyakartṝn prati pātāvasānodayakarmake 'vabodhe tatsamarthācaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: tad upetasya śrīmataḥ prayojya kartṝn prati pāta avasāna udaya karmake vabodhe tat samartha ācaraṇa lakṣaṇam
hetu kartṛ tvam upanibaddham

original: tathāvidhaṃ khalu bhāsvantaṃ paśyantaḥ śrīmanto budhyante bhāsvata iva sarvasyodayaḥ pātāvasāna iti /
analyzed: tathāvidham khalu bhāsvantam paśyantaḥ śrīmantaḥ budhyante bhāsvataḥ iva sarvasya udayaḥ pāta avasāne iti

original: tāṃścāsau tathāvabudhyamānān svāvasthopadarśanena prayuṅkte yathā mamāyamudayaḥ pātāvasānastathā bhavatāmapīti /
analyzed: tān ca asau tathā avabudhyamānān sva avasthā upadarśanena prayuṅkte yathā mama ayam udayaḥ pāta avasānaḥ tathā bhavatām api iti

original: atra ca preṣaṇādhyeṣaṇayorabhāvāttatsamarthācaraṇalakṣaṇa eva prayojakavyāpāraḥ kārīṣo 'dhyāpayati bhikṣā vāsayatīti yathā /
analyzed: atra ca preṣaṇa adhyeṣaṇayoḥ abhāvāt tad samartha ācaraṇa lakṣaṇaḥ eva prayojaka vyāpāraḥ kārīṣaḥ dhyāpayati bhikṣāḥ vāsayati iti yathā

original: tena ca prayojyaprayojakabhāvena svātmānamupapādayitumupamānopameyabhāva ākṣiptaḥ he śrīmanto yathā mamāyamudayaḥ patanāya tadvadbhavatāmapīti  #
analyzed: tena ca prayojya prayojaka bhāvena sva ātmānam upapādayitum upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ ākṣiptaḥ he śrīmantaḥ yathā mama ayam udayaḥ patanāya tadvat bhavatām api iti  /
yūyam budhyadhvam iti

original: tenātra prayojyaprayojakabhāvalakṣaṇena padārthasamanvayena svātmopapādanāyopamānopameyabhāvasyākṣepāt dvitīyo vidarśanāyā bhedaḥ //
analyzed: tena atra prayojya prayojaka bhāva lakṣaṇena padārtha samanvayena sva ātma upapādanāya upamāna upameya bhāvasya ākṣepāt dvitīyaḥ vidarśanāyāḥ bhedaḥ
saṃkaraḥ
sa ca caturvidhaḥ saṃdeha śabda artha varti alaṅkāra eka śabda abhidhāna anugrāhya anugrāhaka bhedena
tatra saṃdeha saṃkaraḥ tāvat
aneka alaṅkriyā ullekhe samam tad vṛtti asaṃbhave

original: ekasya ca grahe nyāyadoṣābhāve ca saṃkaraḥ // UKss_5.11 //
analyzed: ekasya ca grahe nyāya doṣa abhāve ca saṃkaraḥ
anekasya alaṅkārasya ullekhe cetasi upārohe saṃdeha saṃkaraḥ bhavati
na tu eka śabda abhidhāna saṃkara ādau api aneka alaṅkāra ullekhaḥ saṃbhavati
yathā
murāri nirgatā nūnam naraka pratipanthinī
tava api mūrghni gaṅgā iva cakra dhārā patiṣyati
atra hi upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ tad pratibhā hetuḥ ca śleṣaḥ neka alaṅkāraḥ ullikhyate
upamāna upameya bhāve tāvat
gaṅgā upamānam
cakradhārā upameyā
murāri nirgata tvam sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ
śleṣaḥ tu atra naraka pratipanthi śabdāt ātmānam labhate
ekatra hi narakaḥ dānavaḥ
aparatra tu avīci ādiḥ
etau ca dvau alaṅkārau ekasmin iva śabde nupraviśataḥ

original: na hyupamānopameyabhāvastatpratibhāheturvā śleṣaḥ samāsādyabhāve ivaśabdādimantareṇa svarūpaṃ pratilabhate /
analyzed: na hi upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ tad pratibhā hetuḥ vā śleṣaḥ samāsa ādi abhāve iva śabda ādim antareṇa sva rūpam pratilabhate
tena atra dvau alaṅkārau ekasmin vācake iva śabde

original: yadi cānekālaṅkārollekhe sati saṃdehasaṃkarastata evamādāvapyanekālaṅkārollekhasya saṃbhavātsaṃdehasaṃkaraprasaṅga ityāśaṅkyoktam---samaṃ tadvṛttyasaṃbhava  #
analyzed: yadi ca aneka alaṅkāra ullekhe sati saṃdeha saṃkaraḥ tatas evam ādau api aneka alaṅkāra ullekhasya saṃbhavāt saṃdeha saṃkara prasaṅgaḥ iti āśaṅkya uktam samam tad vṛtti asaṃbhava
iti

original: tasyānekasyālaṅkārasya samaṃ yugapadyadi vṛttirvyāpāro 'laṅkāryālaṅkaraṇātmako na saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasya anekasya alaṅkārasya samam yugapad yadi vṛttiḥ vyāpāraḥ laṅkārya alaṅkaraṇa ātmakaḥ na saṃbhavati iti arthaḥ

original: pūrvokte tūdāharaṇe murārinirgateti sādhāraṇadharmopādānānnarakapratipanthinīti ca śleṣapadopadarśanānnānekasyālaṅkārasya yugapadvṛtterasaṃbhavaḥ
analyzed: pūrva ukte tu udāharaṇe murāri nirgatā iti sādhāraṇa dharma upādānāt naraka pratipanthinī iti ca śleṣa pada upadarśanāt na anekasya alaṅkārasya yugapad vṛtteḥ asaṃbhavaḥ
tena tatra na saṃdeha saṃkara tā
nanu yadi aneka alaṅkāra ulleke yugapad vṛtti asaṃbhave ca saṃdeha saṃkara tvam

original: eva sati yatra pratibhāmātreṇānekasminnalaṅkāre ullikhyamāne yasya sādhakaṃ pramāṇamasti sa upādīyate /
analyzed: eva sati yatra pratibhā mātreṇa anekasmin alaṅkāre ullikhyamāne yasya sādhakam pramāṇam asti saḥ upādīyate

original: yasya tu bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ vidyate sa tyajyate /
analyzed: yasya tu bādhakam pramāṇam vidyate sa tyajyate

original: tatrāṣyanekālaṅkārollekhasya samaṃ tadvṛttyasaṃbhavasya ca saṃbhavātsaṃdehasaṃkaratvaṃ prasajjatītyāśaṅkyoktam---ekasya ca grahe nyāyadoṣābhāve  #
analyzed: tatra aṣi aneka alaṅkāra ullekhasya samam tad vṛtti asaṃbhavasya ca saṃbhavāt saṃdeha saṃkara tvam prasajjati iti āśaṅkya uktam ekasya ca grahe nyāya doṣa abhāve
ca iti
nyāyaḥ sādhakam pramāṇam
doṣaḥ bādhakam pramāṇam

original: yatrānekālaṅkārollekhe yugapadvṛttyasaṃbhave ca ekatarasya grahaṇe sādhakabādhake pramāṇe samastavyastatayā na vidyete tatra saṃdehasaṃkaraḥ
analyzed: yatra aneka alaṅkāra ullekhe yugapad vṛtti asaṃbhave ca ekatarasya grahaṇe sādhaka bādhake pramāṇe samasta vyasta tayā na vidyete tatra saṃdeha saṃkaraḥ
tena na aniṣṭa prasaṅgaḥ

original: tathāhi---yatra sādhakabādhake pramāṇe sāmastyena vidyate tatra yasya sādhakaṃ pramāṇamasti tasyopādānādbādhakasya pramāṇopetasya ca tyāgādekasya  #
analyzed: tathā hi yatra sādhaka bādhake pramāṇe sāmastyena vidyate tatra yasya sādhakam pramāṇam asti tasya upādānāt bādhakasya pramāṇa upetasya ca tyāgāt ekasya
grahaṇam bhavati
yatra api sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇayoḥ vaiyastyena anyatarasya vidyamāna tā tatra api pratibhā ullikhyamāna aneka alaṅkāra madhyāt sādhaka pramāṇa upetasya upādānāt pramāṇa śūnyasya

original: tathā bādhakapramāṇopetasya parityāgāttditarasya ca pūrvollikhitasya pāriśeṣyeṇopādānādekasya graho bhavati /
analyzed: tathā bādhaka pramāṇa upetasya parityāgāt tad itarasya ca pūrva ullikhitasya pāriśeṣyeṇa upādānāt ekasya grahaḥ bhavati
yatra tu sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa abhāvaḥ tatra saṃdehaḥ eva
evam ayam saṃdeha saṃkaraḥ lakṣitaḥ
tasya udāharaṇam
yadi api atyantam ucitaḥ vara induḥ te na labhyate

original: tathāpi vacmi kutrāpi kriyatāmādaro nare // UKss_5.*10 //
analyzed: tathā api vacmi kutra api kriyatām ādaraḥ nare
atra vara induḥ iti varaḥ eva induḥ
varaḥ induḥ iva iti rūpaka samāsopamayoḥ dvayoḥ alaṅkārayoḥ ullekhaḥ
na ca tasya anekasya alaṅkārasya yugapad vṛttiḥ saṃbhavati
eka alaṅkāra saṃśrayeṇa eva alaṅkārasya kṛtakṛtyā tvāt

original: na cātra dvayormadhyādekatarasya grahaṇāya sādhakabādhakapramāṇayogaḥ. sādhakaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ vidyamānaṃ vidhimukhenālaṅkāraṃ jñāpayet /
analyzed: na ca atra dvayoḥ madhyāt ekatarasya grahaṇāya sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇa yogaḥ sādhakam hi pramāṇam vidyamānam vidhi mukhena alaṅkāram jñāpayet
tathā bādhakam api prahātavya alaṅkāra niṣedha mukhena upādeyam alaṅkāram pūrva ullikhitam pāriśeṣyāt upādeya tayā pratipādayati
atra tu dvayoḥ sādhaka bādhaka pramāṇayoḥ abhāvāt saṃdehaḥ
tena saṃkaraḥ laṅkāraḥ
śabda artha vartī alaṅkāraḥ tu
śabda artha varti alaṅkārāḥ vākye ekatra bhāsinaḥ
saṃkaraḥ vā
yatra ekasmin vākye śabda vartinā ūrtha vartinaḥ ca alaṅkārāḥ saṃsargam upayānti sa śabda artha alaṅkāraḥ
tasya udāharaṇam
ittham sthitiḥ vara arthā ced mā kṛthāḥ vyartham arthi tām

original: rūpeṇa te yuvā sarvaḥ pādabaddho hi kiṅkaraḥ // UKss_5.*11 //
analyzed: rūpeṇa te yuvā sarvaḥ pāda baddhaḥ hi kiṅkaraḥ
vara arthā bhartṛ arthā
kiṅkaraḥ dāsaḥ
atra thakāra upanibaddhaḥ nuprāsa ātmakaḥ śabda alaṅkāraḥ
arthālaṅkāraḥ ca arthāntaranyāsaḥ vidyate
tathā hi atra mā akṛthāḥ vyartham arthi tām iti upāditsita irthe rthi tvasya akaraṇam yat upanibaddham

original: tadanupapadyamānatayā saṃbhāvya tatsamarthanāyoktaṃ 'rūpeṇa te yuvā sarvaḥ pādabaddho hi kiṅkara'iti /
analyzed: tat anupapadyamāna tayā saṃbhāvya tad samarthanāya uktam rūpeṇa te yuvā sarvaḥ pāda baddhaḥ hi kiṅkara eti
yaḥ guṇa utkarṣa śālī sa nā arthayate
api tu arthyate yathā ratna ādi
tvam ca rūpavat tvāt guṇa utkarṣa śālinī
tasmāt upāditsita irthe
tava arthi tvam ayuktam iti
tena ayam śabda artha varti alaṅkāra saṃkaraḥ
eka śabda abhidhāna saṃkaraḥ tu
eka vākya aṃśa praveśāt vā abhidhīyate
ekasmin vākya aṃśe vākya eka deśe yatra anekasya alaṅkārasya anupraveśaḥ saḥ eka śabda abhidhāna saṃkaraḥ
tasya udāharaṇam
mā evam evā āssva sat chāya varṇikā cāru karṇikā

original: atropamālaṅkāra upamāpratibhotpattihetubhūtaśca śleṣa ityetau dvāvalaṅkārāvekasminvākyāṃśe ivaśabde 'nupraviṣṭau /
analyzed: atra upamā alaṅkāraḥ upamā pratibhā utpatti hetu bhūtaḥ ca śleṣaḥ iti etau dvau alaṅkārau ekasmin vākya aṃśe iva śabde nupraviṣṭau
tathā hi ambhojinī upamānam
gaurī upameyā
dṛṣṭi mātra sukha prada tvam sādhāraṇaḥ dharmaḥ iti upamā
sat chāyā varṇikā cāru karṇikā iti śleṣaḥ

original: ambhojinyāṃ hi varṇā rājavartādayaḥ gauryāṃ tu gauratvam /
analyzed: ambhojinyām hi varṇāḥ rājavarta ādayaḥ gauryām tu gaura tvam
gauryām tu cārū karṇau
ka pū ca atra samāsa antaḥ
tena ayam śleṣaḥ
etau ca dvau alaṅkārau ekasmin vākya aṃśe iva śabde nupraviṣṭau
tena ayam eka śabda abhidhāna saṃkaraḥ
anugrāhya anugrāhaka saṃkaraḥ tu
paraspara upakāreṇa yatra alaṅkṛtayaḥ sthitāḥ

original: svātantryeṇātmalābhaṃ no labhante so 'pi saṃkaraḥ // UKss_5.13 //
analyzed: svātantryeṇa ātma lābham no labhante saḥ pi saṃkaraḥ
yatra ubhayoḥ upamāna upameyayoḥ parasparam upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ tatra upameya upamā
upameyena upamānasya upamānāt
nanu ca prākaraṇikam sāmya abhidhāna saṃbandhi upameyam
a prākaraṇikam upamānam
yadi ca atra upameyasya upamāna tvam abhidhīyate evam
sati tasya prākaraṇika tvam vyāhanyate iti āśaṅkya uktam pakṣa antara hāni gām iti

original: nātropamānopameyabhāve tātparyaṃ kintu etadeva dvayamevaṃvidhaṃ vidyate,
analyzed: na atra upamāna upameya bhāve tātparyam kintu etat eva dvayam evaṃvidham vidyate

original: na tvanyadetayoḥ sadṛśaṃ vastvantaraṃ vidyate iti /
analyzed: na tu anyat etayoḥ sadṛśam vastu antaram vidyate iti
atas ca etad pakṣa dvitaya vyatiriktasya pakṣa antarasya atra hāneḥ vivakṣita tvāt parasparam upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ
na duṣyati iti tasya pakṣa antara hānau pratapa ādyāyām avāntaravākya artha tvena avasthānāt

original: varaṃ viṣaṃ bhakṣaya mā cārasya gṛhe bhuṅkthāḥ itivat /
analyzed: varam viṣam bhakṣaya mā cārasya gṛhe bhuṅkthāḥ itivat
atra hi viṣa bhakṣaṇam na vidhīyate
durjana gṛhe bhojana parivarjana tātparyāt
evam iha api upamāna upameya bhāvasya avivakṣā pakṣa antara hānau tātparyāt
tasyāḥ udāharaṇam
hareṇa iva smaravyādhaḥ tvayā an aṅgīkṛtaḥ san

original: tvadvapuḥ kṣaṇamapyeṣa dhārṣṭyādiva na muñcati // UKss_5.*13 //
analyzed: tvad vapuḥ kṣaṇam api eṣa dhārṣṭyāt iva na muñcati

original: atra dhārṣṭyādi na muñcatīti yāsāvutprekṣā sā hareṇeva smaravyādhastvayānaṅgīkṛto 'pi sannityupamāpratibhotpattihetuśleṣavaśena svarūpaṃ pratilabhate
analyzed: atra dhārṣṭya ādi na muñcati iti yā asau utprekṣā sā hareṇa iva smaravyādhaḥ tvayā anaṅgīkṛtaḥ san iti upamā pratibhā utpatti hetu śleṣa vaśena sva rūpam pratilabhate
an aṅgīkṛtaḥ hi anaṅga tvam aśarīra tvam āpāditaḥ anūrīkṛtaḥ ca

original: yaścānūrīkṛtaḥ kṣaṇamapi na muñcati tatra dhārṣṭyaṃ hetutayotprekṣituṃ śakyate /
analyzed: yaḥ ca anūrīkṛtaḥ kṣaṇam api na muñcati tatra dhārṣṭyam hetutayā utprekṣitum śakyate
tena śleṣa vaśena atra utpreksā āsādita svabhāvā
atoyam anugrāhya anugrāhaka saṃkaraḥ
evam ayam caturvidhaḥ saṃkaraḥ nānā alaṃkāra gata vikalpa vyavasthā samuccaya aṅga aṅgi bhāva samāśrayaṇena abhihitaḥ
tatra aneka alaṃkāra vikalpāt saṃdeha saṃkaraḥ
nibhinna ādhāra tvena śabda artha vartinā ulaṃkārayoḥ avasthānāt vyavasthā samāśrayaḥ śabda artha varti alaṃkāra saṃkaraḥ
eka śabda abhidhāna saṃkare tu samuccayena aneka ulaṃkāraḥ ekasmin vākya aṃśe iva ādau anupraviśati
anugrāhya anugrāhaka saṃkare tu anakasya alaṃkārasya aṅga aṅgi bhāvaḥ
atas vikalpa vyavasthā samuccaya aṅga aṅgi bhāva saṃśrayāḥ ete catvāraḥ saṃkara bhedāḥ
upameya upamā
anyonyam eva yatra syāt upamāna upameya tā
upameya upamām āhuḥ tām pakṣa antara hāni gām
yatra ubhayoḥ upamāna upameyayoḥ parasparam upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ tatra upameya upamā
upameyena upamānasya upamānāt

original: nanu ca prākaraṇikaṃ sāmyābhidhānasaṃbandhi upameyam aprakaraṇikamupamānam /
analyzed: nanu ca prākaraṇikam sāmya abhidhāna saṃbandhi upameyam a prakaraṇikam upamānam

original: yadi cātropameyasyopamānatvam abhidhīyate evaṃ sati tasya prākaraṇikatvam vyāhanyate ityāśaṅkyoktam -- pakṣāntarahānigāmiti /
analyzed: yadi ca atra upameyasya upamāna tvam abhidhīyate evam sati tasya prākaraṇika tvam vyāhanyate iti āśaṅkya uktam pakṣa antara hāni gām iti

original: nātropamānopameyabhāve tātparyaṃ kiṃtu etadeva dvayamevaṃvidhaṃ vidyate na tvanyadetayoḥ sadṛśaṃ vastvantaraṃ vidyata iti /
analyzed: na atra upamāna upameya bhāve tātparyam kiṃtu etat eva dvayam evaṃvidham vidyate na tu anyat etayoḥ sadṛśam vastu antaram vidyate iti

original: ataśca etat pakṣadvitayavyatiriktasya pakṣāntarasyātra hānervivakṣitatvāt parasparamupamānopameyabhāvo na duṣyatīti /
analyzed: atas ca etat pakṣa dvitaya vyatiriktasya pakṣa antarasya atra hāneḥ vivakṣita tvāt parasparam upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ na duṣyati iti

original: tasya pakṣāntarahānau pratipādyāyāmavāntaravākyārthatvenāvasthānāt -- varaṃ viṣaṃ bhakṣaya mā cāsya gṛhe bhuktvā -- itivat /
analyzed: tasya pakṣa antara hānau pratipādyāyām avāntaravākya artha tvena avasthānāt varam viṣam bhakṣaya mā ca asya gṛhe bhuktvā itivat

original: atra hi viṣabhakṣaṇaṃ na vidhīyate durjanagṛhe bhojanaparivarjanatātparyāt /
analyzed: atra hi viṣa bhakṣaṇam na vidhīyate durjana gṛhe bhojana parivarjana tātparyāt
evam iha api upamāna upameya bhāvasya avivakṣā pakṣa antara hānau tātparyāt
śirāṃsi paṅkajāni iva vega utpātayataḥ dviṣām

original: ājau karopamaṃ cakraṃ yasya cakropamaḥ karaḥ // UKss_5.*14 //
analyzed: ājau kara upamam cakram yasya cakra upamaḥ karaḥ

original: atra yasyetyupāttsya tvatkṛte so 'pi vaikuṇṭha ityatra tacchabdasamanvayenā kāṅkṣāvicchedo bhaviṣyate /
analyzed: atra yasya iti upāttsya tvad kṛte saḥ pi vaikuṇṭhaḥ iti atra tad śabda samanvayena ā kāṅkṣā vicchedaḥ bhaviṣyate

original: uttareṣvapi ca ślekeṣu tenaiva yacchabdārtho nirākāṅkṣī kāryaḥ /
analyzed: uttareṣu api ca ślekeṣu tena eva yad śabda arthaḥ nirākāṅkṣī kāryaḥ
atra kara cakrayoḥ parasparam upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ
sādhāraṇaḥ ca atra dharmaḥ ati tvarita tvena śatru śiraḥ vakartanam
eṣa ca atra upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ upamāna antara abhāve paryavasitaḥ

original: yadi parametayoreva parasparamupamānopameyabhāvaḥ syādanyatve tayorupamānaṃ nāstīti //
analyzed: yadi param etayoḥ eva parasparam upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ syāt anya tve tayoḥ upamānam na asti iti
saha uktiḥ
tulya kāle kriye yatra vastu dvaya samāśrite

original: padenaikena kathyete sā sahoktirmatā satām // UKss_5.15 //
analyzed: padena ekena kathyete sā sahoktiḥ matā satām

original: yatra vastudvayasamavete dve kriye padenaikena tantravṛttyā kathyete tatra sahoktirnāmālaṅkāro bhavati /
analyzed: yatra vastu dvaya samavete dve kriye padena ekena tantra vṛttyā kathyete tatra sahoktiḥ nāma alaṅkāraḥ bhavati

original: nanu 'saṃjahāra śaratkālaḥ'ityādāvapi dīpake padenaikena vastudvayasamavete dve kriye kathyete /
analyzed: nanu saṃjahāra śarad kālaḥ ityādau api dīpake padena ekena vastu dvaya samavete dve kriye kathyete

original: ataśca tatrāpi sahoktitvaṃ prāpnotīti āsaṅkyoktam---tulyakāle iti /
analyzed: atas ca tatra api sahokti tvam prāpnoti iti āsaṅkya uktam tulya kāle iti

original: yatra sahādinā padena tulyakālatāmavagamya vastudvitayasamāśrite dve kriye kathyete tatra sahoktitvam /
analyzed: yatra saha ādinā padena tulya kālatām avagamya vastu dvitaya samāśrite dve kriye kathyete tatra sahokti tvam
na ca evam dīpakaḥ iti na ativyāptiḥ

original: sahādinā ca śabdena yugapatkālatāyāmavadyotyamānāyāṃ dvaya gatiḥ /
analyzed: saha ādinā ca śabdena yugapad kāla tāyām avadyotyamānāyām gatiḥ

original: kadācitkhalu yayoḥ kriyayostulyakālatā te kriye tulyakakṣatayā svāśrayaviśrāntatvenābhidhīyete,
analyzed: kadācid khalu yayoḥ kriyayoḥ tulya kālatā te kriye tulya kakṣatayā sva āśraya viśrānta tvena abhidhīyete

original: yatā devadattyajñadattau saha bhuñjāte iti kadācittvekāśrayaviśrāntāyāṃ kriyāyāmabhihitāyāṃ sahādyarthaparyālocanāsāmarthyādaparasyāśrayasya  #
analyzed: yatā devadatti ajñadattau saha bhuñjāte iti kadācid tu eka āśraya viśrāntāyām kriyāyām abhihitāyām saha ādi artha paryālocanā sāmarthyāt aparasya āśrayasya
kriyā saṃbandhaḥ vagamyate

original: yathā devadatto yajñadattena saha bhūṅkta iti /
analyzed: yathā devadattaḥ yajñadattena saha bhūṅkte iti
tatra iha dvitīyā gatiḥ āśrīyate

original: śābdena rūpeṇaikatra kriyāsaṃbandhasya pratītasyāparatrārthena rūpeṇonnīyamānatvena vakrabhaṇite sadbhāvāt /
analyzed: śābdena rūpeṇa ekatra kriyā saṃbandhasya pratītasya aparatra arthena rūpeṇa unnīyamāna tvena vakra bhaṇite sadbhāvāt

original: evaṃvidhasya yatraiva śobhātiśayavidhāyitvaṃ tatraiva sahokteralaṅkāratā na sarvatreti draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: evaṃvidhasya yatra eva śobhā atiśaya vidhāyi tvam tatra eva sahokteḥ alaṅkāra tā na sarvatra iti draṣṭavyam
tasyāḥ udāharaṇam
dyu janaḥ mṛtyunā sārdham yasya ājau tārakā maye
cakre cakra abhidhānena praiṣyeṇa āpta manorathaḥ
yasya praiṣyeṇa iti saṃbandhaḥ

original: atra mṛtyordyujanasya ca manorathāvāptikaraṇalakṣaṇe dve kriye padenaikenokte cakre 'vāptamanoratha iti /
analyzed: atra mṛtyoḥ dyujanasya ca manoratha avāpti karaṇa lakṣaṇe dve kriye padena ekena ukte cakre vāpta manorathaḥ iti

original: yadyapyavāptamanoratha iti cakra iti ca suptiḍantatvabhedena padadvitvaṃ tathāpi kriyāpadadvitayopādānavyāvṛttervavakṣitatvātpadenaikeneti  #
analyzed: yadi api avāpta manorathaḥ iti cakre iti ca sup tiṭ anta tva bhedena pada dvi tvam tathā api kriyā pada dvitaya upādāna vyāvṛtteḥ vavakṣita tvāt padena ekena iti
na virudhyate

original: athavā cakre iti karoti kriyā sāmānyabhūtā viśeṣamantareṇāparyavasyantī manorathāvāptilakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣaṃ garbhīkaroti /
analyzed: athavā cakre iti karoti kriyā sāmānya bhūtā viśeṣam antareṇa aparyavasyantī manoratha avāpti lakṣaṇam viśeṣam garbhīkaroti
atas ca atra sati api aneka pada tve ekapadībhāvaḥ iva prakāśate
tena ekena padena iti uktam
sārdham śabdaḥ ca atra tulya kāla tām avadyotayati

original: yasya praiṣyeṇājñākāriṇā cakrasaṃjñakena kartṛbhūtena mṛtyunā sārdhamapṛthakkālatayā dyujana āptamanorathaḥ kṛta iti /
analyzed: yasya praiṣyeṇa ājñā kāriṇā cakra saṃjñakena kartṛ bhūtena mṛtyunā sārdham apṛthak kāla tayā dyu janaḥ āpta manorathaḥ kṛtaḥ iti
aneka loka kavalīkaraṇāt mṛtyoḥ manoratha avāptiḥ
dyu janasya ca śatru vināśāt
parivṛttiḥ
sama nyūna viśeṣṭaiḥ tu kasyacid parivartanam
artha anartha svabhāvam yat parivṛttiḥ abhāṇi sā
kasyacid vastunaḥ vastu antareṇa parivartanam parivṛttiḥ
sā ca trividhā
parivartana kārakāṇām parivartanīyena saha sama tvāt nyūna tvāt adhika tvāt ca
tat idam uktam sama nyūna viśiṣṭaiḥ iti

original: tatra yasyāḥ samor'thaḥ parivartyate tasyā anarthasvabhāvatā /
analyzed: tatra yasyāḥ samaḥ ūrthaḥ parivartyate tasyāḥ anartha svabhāva tā
artha śabdena hi upādeyaḥ
thyate sau iti kṛtvā
yatra ca sāmyam na asti
tena arthya tva abhāva anugamāt tatra anartha tvam abhidhīyate
atas tatra anartha svabhāvam parivartanam
yatra apa ca nikṛṣṭa parigraheṇa utkṛṣṭa parityāgaḥ kriyate
tatra api anartha svabhāva tā
upādeya viparītasya upādānāt
artha pratipakṣaḥ hi atra anarthaḥ
adharma anṛta vat
yatā hi adharma anṛta śabdābhyām na uttara padārthḥ abhāva mātram abhidhīyate
na api uttara padārtha tulyaḥ ṛthaḥ
kim tarhi etat pratipakṣasya eva abhidhānam
evam iha api anartha śabdena artha pratipakṣasya eva abhidhanam
yathā anarthaḥ vairiṇām āpatitaḥ iti evamādau
tena yatra utkṛṣṭena nikṛṣṭaḥ parigṛhyate tatra

original: yatra tu nikṛṣṭenotkṛṣṭaḥ parigṛhyate tatrotkṛṣṭasya sukhahetutvenopādeyatvādarthasvabhāvatā /
analyzed: yatra tu nikṛṣṭena utkṛṣṭaḥ parigṛhyate tatra utkṛṣṭasya sukha hetu tvena upādeya tvāt artha svabhāva tā
tat idam uktam artha anartha svabhāvam iti
tatra sama parivṛtteḥ udāharaṇam
uro da tvā amarārīṇām yena yuddheṣu agṛhyata
hiraṇyākṣa vadha ādyeṣu yaśaḥ sākam jaya śriyā

original: atra urodānena utsāho lakṣyate yaścātra lakṣyamāṇāsyārthasyotsāhasyopāyatayā pratīyate /
analyzed: atra uraḥ dānena utsāhaḥ lakṣyate yaḥ ca atra lakṣyamāṇa asya arthasya utsāhasya upāya tayā pratīyate

original: abhidheyor'tho vakṣaso dānaṃ nāma yo hi yatra vakṣa udyamayati sa tatrotsahata iti tatpratibhāvacchāditasyotasāhasya pratitiḥ tadapekṣayā samena  #
analyzed: abhidheya ūrthaḥ vakṣasaḥ dānam nāma yaḥ hi yatra vakṣaḥ udyamayati sa tatra utsahate iti tad pratibhā avacchāditasya utasāhasya pratitiḥ tad apekṣayā samena
samasya parivartanam
uraḥ yaśasoḥ sama tvāt
nyūna parivṛtteḥ tu udāharaṇam
netra uraga bala bhrāmyat mandara adri śiraḥ cyutaiḥ

original: ratnairāpūrya dugdhārbdhi yaḥ samādatta kaustubham // UKss_5.*17 //
analyzed: ratnaiḥ āpūrya dugdha arbdhi yaḥ samādatta kaustubham
netra bhūtaḥ uragaḥ vāsukiḥ
atra kaustubhasya utkṛṣṭasya nikṛṣṭa ratna para tyāgena grahaṇāt nikṛṣṭena utkṛṣṭasya parivartanam
viśeṣṭa parivṛtteḥ tu udāharaṇam

original: yo balau vyāptabhūsīmna makhena dyāṃ jigīṣati /
analyzed: yaḥ balau vyāpta bhū sīmna makhena dyām jigīṣati

original: abhayaṃ svargasadmabhyo datvā jagrāha kharvatam // UKss_5.*18 //
analyzed: abhayam svarga sadmabhyaḥ da tvā jagrāha kharvatam
bhū sīmā pṛthivyāḥ avadhiḥ
makhaḥ yajñaḥ

original: atra abhayenotkṛṣṭena nikṛṣṭasya kharvatvasya hrasvatvasya parivartanaṃ abhidheyāpekṣayā
analyzed: atra abhayena utkṛṣṭena nikṛṣṭasya kharva tvasya hrasva tvasya parivartanam abhidheya apekṣayā
pūrvatara udāharaṇa vat pratibhāti
tātparya artha apekṣayā tu na iyam parivṛttiḥ

original: cattaddevebhyaḥ abhayaṃ pratijñātaṃ tadupāyabhūtāyā vāmanaveṣeṇa svarvatāyāḥ parigṛhītatvāt /
analyzed: abhayam pratijñātam tad upāya bhūtāyāḥ vāmana veṣeṇa svarvatāyāḥ parigṛhīta tvāt
iti māha śrī pratīhāra indurāja viracitāyām udbhaṭa alaṅkāra sāra saṃgraha ladhu vṛttau pañcamaḥ vargaḥ
atha ṣaṣṭhaḥ vargaḥ
ananvayam sa saṃdeham saṃsṛṣṭim bhāvikam tathā
kāvya dṛṣṭānta hetū ca iti alaṅkārān pare viduḥ
atra iti śabdasya vakṣyamāṇam yat ananvaya ādi lakṣaṇam tad upakṣepa artha tvena prayogāt na ananvaya ādi svarūpa parāmarśa ārtha tvam
iti evam vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇaka tvena ananvaya ādīn alaṅkārān viduḥ iti arthaḥ
iti evam vakṣyamāṇa lakṣaṇaka tvena ananvaya ādīn alaṅkārān viduḥ iti arthaḥ
atas vedana kriyā karma tvāt ananvayam ityādau dvitīyā
kāvya dṛṣṭānta hetū ca iti atra dṛṣṭānta hetu śabdābhyām kāvya śabdaḥ pratyekam abhisaṃbadhyate
dṛṣṭānta śabdasya ca atra pūrva nipātaḥ abhyarhita tvāt

original: abhyarhitatvaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya dṛṣṭāntapratibimbitavyāptimukhena hetoḥ prāyeṇa gamakatā saṃpratyayāt /
analyzed: abhyarhita tvam dṛṣṭāntasya dṛṣṭānta pratibimbita vyāpti mukhena hetoḥ prāyeṇa gamaka tā saṃpratyayāt
sa saṃdehaḥ

original: upamānena tattvaṃ ca bhedaṃ ca vadataḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: upamānena tattvam ca bhedam ca vadataḥ punar

original: sasaṃdehaṃ vacaḥ stutyai sasaṃdehaṃ vadurbudhāḥ // UKss_6.2 //
analyzed: sa saṃdeham vacaḥ stutyai sa saṃdeham vaduḥ budhāḥ

original: upamānabhedapūrvaṃ bhedamabhidadhataḥ kaveḥ kavinibaddhasya vā vakturvaca iti saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: upamāna bheda pūrvam bhedam abhidadhataḥ kaveḥ kavi nibaddhasya vā vaktuḥ vacaḥ iti saṃbandhaḥ

original: saṃdehopetavacanavyājena upamānena tattvaṃ tadbhāvamabhedamupameyasyābhidhāyottarakālaṃ yadā tasmādupamānāttasyopameyasya bhedo 'bhidhīyate  #
analyzed: saṃdeha upeta vacana vyājena upamānena tattvam tad bhāvam abhedam upameyasya abhidhāya uttara kālam yadā tasmāt upamānāt tasya upameyasya bhedaḥ bhidhīyate  /
tadā sa saṃdehaḥ laṅkāraḥ

original: nanu upamānena saha pūrvamabhede 'bhihite sati punaryadi tasmāddhedasyābhidhānaṃ kriyate /
analyzed: nanu upamānena saha pūrvam abhede bhihite sati punar yadi tasmāt hedasya abhidhānam kriyate
evam sati gajasnānam prāpnoti iti āśaṅkya uktam stutyai iti
stuti artha tvena evaṃvidhā abhidhā samāśrīyate iti arthaḥ
tasya udāharaṇam
haste kim asya niḥśeṣa deti a hṛd dalana udbhavam
yaśaḥ saṃcayaḥ eṣa syāt piṇḍībhāvaḥ sya kiṃkṛtaḥ
nābhi padma spṛhā āyātaḥ kim haṃsaḥ nā eṣa cañcalaḥ
iti yasya abhitas śaṅkham aśaṅkiṣṭa ārjavaḥ janaḥ
ārjavaḥ mūrkhaḥ
ṛju tva yogāt
atra śaṅkhaḥ upameyaḥ
yaśaḥ saṃcayaḥ haṃsaḥ ca upamānam
tayoḥ ca pūrvam abheda saṃdeha vyājena abhihitaḥ kim eṣa yaśaḥ saṃcayaḥ syāt iti

original: tathā kiṃ haṃsa iti punaścātropamānādupameyasya bhedo varṇitaḥ /
analyzed: tathā kim haṃsaḥ iti punar ca atra upamānāt upameyasya bhedaḥ varṇitaḥ
yaśaḥ saṃcayāt tāvat bheda upavarṇanam
yaśaḥ saṃcayaḥ khalu prasaraṇa śīlaḥ
asya tu tad viruddhaḥ piṇḍībhāvaḥ dṛśyate
tena na ayam yaśaḥ saṃcayaḥ iti
haṃsāt tu bheda abhidhānam na eva cañcalaḥ iti
haṃsasya ha cañcala tvam nāma dharmaḥ
iha ca tat na upalabhyate
tasmāt na eva haṃsaḥ iti
evaṃvidhasya ca atra abhidhānasya phalam stutiḥ
yaśaḥ saṃcayaḥ bhagavatā sva hasta vartī kṛtaḥ iti
tathā a saṃbhāvyamāna haṃsa āgamanam tribhuvana utpatti nibandhanam yat tat nābhi nalinam tadvān bhagavān iti
sa saṃdehasya bheda antaram āha
alaṅkāra antara chāyām yat kṛtvā dhīṣu bandhanam
asaṃdehe saṃdeha rūpam saṃdeha nāma tat
chāyā śobhā

original: yatra saṃdehābhāve 'pi saṃdehasyopanibandhe sati na pūrvavadupamānādupameyasya bheda upanibadhyate kiṃtarhyabheda eva saṃśayacchāyayā /
analyzed: yatra saṃdeha abhāve saṃdehasya upanibandhe sati na pūrvavat upamānāt upameyasya bhedaḥ upanibadhyate kiṃtarhi abhedaḥ eva saṃśaya chāyayā
tathāvidhasya ca upanibandhasya phalam alaṅkāra antara upajanitā saundarya pratipattiḥ
yat āha dhīṣu alaṅkāra antara chāyām kṛtvā iti
tatra api saṃdeha alaṅkāraḥ
tasya udāharaṇam
nīla abdaḥ kim ayam merau pralaya anale

original: iti yaḥ śaṅkyate śyāmaḥ pakṣīndrerkatviṣi sthitaḥ // UKss_6.*3 //
analyzed: iti yaḥ śaṅkyate śyāmaḥ pakṣi indra irka tviṣi sthitaḥ

original: atra meroruparivartī nīlo balāhakaḥ kalpāntavahnyāścayaśca dhūmaḥ ityetadubhayamupamānam /
analyzed: atra meroḥ uparivartī nīlaḥ balāhakaḥ kalpānta vahni āścayaḥ ca dhūmaḥ iti etat ubhayam upamānam
garuḍa ārūḍhaḥ tu bhagavān kṛṣṇa vapuḥ upameyaḥ

original: tena ca upamānadvayena saṃdehavyājena bhagavānāpāditābheda upanibaddhaḥ kimayamevaṃvidhaḥ athaivaṃvidhaḥ iti /
analyzed: tena ca upamāna dvayena saṃdeha vyājena bhagavān āpādita abhedaḥ upanibaddhaḥ kim ayam evaṃvidhaḥ atha evaṃvidhaḥ iti
tābhyām ca upamānābhyām upameyasya pūrvavat bheda nibandhanam na atra kiṃcid abhihitam
phalam ca evam abhidhānasya upamā alaṅkāra dhvananam
evaṃvidha upamāna dvitaya sadṛśaḥ bhagavān vainateya ārūḍhaḥ iti
ananvayaḥ
yatra tanā eva tasya syāt upamāna upameya tā
a sādṛśya vivakṣātaḥ tam iti āhuḥ ananvayam

original: yatra tenaiva na tu vastvantareṇa tasyaiva vastvantarasyopamānopameyabhāvo bhavettatra vastvantarānugamābhāvādananvayākhyo 'laṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: yatra tena eva na tu vastu antareṇa tasya eva vastu antarasya upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ bhavet tatra vastu antara anugama abhāvāt ananvaya ākhyaḥ laṅkāraḥ
nanu ca sādṛśya saṃbandhe sati prākaraṇikam upameyam aprākaraṇikam tu upamānam iti upamāna upameyayoḥ lakṣita tvāt katham ekasya eva upamiti kriyāyām
karma tvam karaṇa tvam ca saṃbhavati iti āśaṅkya uktam asādṛśya vivakṣātaḥ iti
na atra umā pāna upameya bhāve tātparyam kintu upameya upamā vat upamāna antara vyāvṛttau iti arthaḥ
itiśabde tra vakṣyamāṇa udāharaṇa upakṣepa artha tvāt ananvaya śabdena na abhisaṃbadhyate
tena ananvayam iti dvitīyā
tasya udāharaṇam
yasya vāṇī sva vāṇī iva sva kriyā iva kriyā amalā

original: rūpaṃ svamiva rūpaṃ ca lokalocanalobhanam // UKss_6.*4 //
analyzed: rūpam svam iva rūpam ca loka locana lobhanam

original: atra vāṇīkriyārūpāṇāṃ trayāṇāmanupamatayā lokottaratvaṃ pratipādayitumātmanaivopamānopameyabhāvo nibaddhaḥ /
analyzed: atra vāṇī kriyā rūpāṇām trayāṇām anupama tayā lokottara tvam pratipādayitum ātmanā eva upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ nibaddhaḥ
saṃsṛṣṭiḥ
alaṅkṛtīnām bahvīnām dvayoḥ vā api samāśrayaḥ
ekatra nirapekṣāṇām mithas saṃsṛṣṭiḥ ucyate

original: bahūnāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ parasparanirapekṣāṇāṃ dvayorvā tathāvidhayorekatra śabda eva artha eva vā upanibandhe sati saṃsṛṣṭiralaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: bahūnām alaṅkārāṇām paraspara nirapekṣāṇām dvayoḥ vā tathāvidhayoḥ ekatra śabdaḥ eva arthaḥ eva vā upanibandhe sati saṃsṛṣṭiḥ alaṅkāraḥ
yatra tu paraspara sāpekṣa tvam tatra sandeha eka śabda abhidhāna anugrāhya anugrāhaka saṅkarāḥ trayaḥ pūrvam abhihitāḥ

original: yatra ca śabdārthalakṣaṇāśrayadvitayaniṣṭhatayā anekālaṅkāropanibandhastatrāpi śabdārthavartyanekālaṅkārasaṃkara uktaḥ /
analyzed: yatra ca śabda artha lakṣaṇa āśraya dvitaya niṣṭha tayā aneka alaṅkāra upanibandhaḥ tatra api śabda artha varti aneka alaṅkāra saṃkaraḥ uktaḥ
etad vailakṣaṇyena tu saṃsṛṣṭiḥ
tasyāḥ udāharaṇam
tvad kṛte saḥ vaikuṇṭhaḥ śaśī iva uṣasi candrakām

original: apyadhārāṃ sudhāvṛrṣṭi manye tyajati tāṃ śriyam // UKss_6.*5 //
analyzed: api a dhārām sudhā vṛrṣṭi manye tyajati tām śriyam
tat uttiṣṭha ati dhanyena kena api kamala īkṣaṇe

original: vareṇa saha tāruṇyaṃ nirviśantī gṛhe vasa // UKss_6.*6 //
analyzed: vareṇa saha tāruṇyam nirviśantī gṛhe vasa
nirviśantī upabhuñjānā

original: atra śaśī uṣasi candrikāmiva vaikuṇṭhaḥ tvatkṛte śriyaṃ tyajati ityupamā /
analyzed: atra śaśī uṣasi candrikām iva vaikuṇṭhaḥ tvad kṛte śriyam tyajati iti upamā
a dhārām sudhā vṛṣṭim iti rūpakam

original: tathā hyatra lakṣmyāḥ sarve pīyūṣavṛṣṭeḥ saṃbandhino dharmā vidyante kevalaṃ dhārāsaṃbandho
analyzed: tathā hi atra lakṣmyāḥ sarve pīyūṣa vṛṣṭeḥ saṃbandhinaḥ dharmāḥ vidyante kevalam
na asti iti upamāna gata eka guṇa nivṛtti dvārikā śiṣṭa upamāna gata sakala guṇa abhyanujñā rūpa āropaṇā avagamyate
yathā ayam puruṣaḥ akaraḥ hastī iti

original: tadetasmin śloke upamāyā rūpakasya ca dvayoralaṅkārayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ /
analyzed: tat etasmin śloke upamāyāḥ rūpakasya ca dvayoḥ alaṅkārayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭiḥ
tayoḥ kevala abhidheya āśraya tvāt paraspara nirapekṣa tvāt ca
tat uttiṣṭha eti etad śloka apekṣayā tu kamala īkṣaṇe iti samāsopamā ātmakam upamā bhedam āśritya
pūrva ukta alaṅkāra dvaya saṃkalanayā bahūnām alaṅkārāṇām saṃsṛṣṭi udāharaṇa diś pradarśanam draṣṭavyam
bhāvikam
pratyakṣāḥ iva yatra arthāḥ dṛśyante bhūta bhāvinaḥ
ati adbhutāḥ syāt tat vācām an ākulyena bhāvikam
sāṃpratikena pradhvaṃsa abhāvena upalakṣyamāṇāḥ padārthāḥ bhūtāḥ
yathā idānīm yudhiṣṭhira ādayaḥ

original: ye tu sāpratikena prāgabhāvena upalakṣyante te bhāvinaḥ,
analyzed: ye tu sāpratikena prāgabhāvena upalakṣyante te bhāvinaḥ
yathā idānīm bhagavat avatāraḥ kalkī bhaviṣṇuyaśāḥ

original: evamanantaropalakṣitāḥ bhūtā bhāvinaśca yer'thāste sāṃpratikapradhvaṃsābhāvaprāgabhāvaviviktatayā vartamānāyamānāḥ pratyakṣā iva yatra dṛśyante  #
analyzed: evam anantara upalakṣitāḥ bhūtāḥ bhāvinaḥ ca ye ṛthāḥ te sāṃpratika pradhvaṃsa abhāva prāgabhāva vivikta tayā vartamānāyamānāḥ pratyakṣāḥ iva yatra dṛśyante
tat bhāvikam nāma alaṅkāraḥ bhavet
atra hetuḥ vācām an ākula tā arthānām ca ati adbhuta tvam
tat uktam vācām anākulyena iti
ati adbhutāḥ iti ca
tatra vācām an ākula tā vyasta saṃbandha rahita loka prasiddha śabda upanibandhāt jhagiti artha pratīti kāri tā

original: tasyāṃ hi satyāṃ kaveḥ saṃbandhī yo bhāvaḥ
analyzed: tasyām hi satyām kaveḥ saṃbandhī yaḥ bhāvaḥ

original: āśrayaḥ śṛṅgārādirasasaṃvalitacaturvargopāyabhūtaviśiṣṭārthollekhī sa kavinaiva sahṛdayaiḥ śrotṛbhiḥ svābhiprāye 'bhedena tattatkāvyapratibimbitarūpatayā  #
analyzed: āśrayaḥ śṛṅgāra ādi rasa saṃvalita caturvarga upāya bhūta viśiṣṭa artha ullekhī sa kavinā eva sahṛdayaiḥ śrotṛbhiḥ sva abhiprāye bhedena tat tat kāvya pratibimbita rūpatayā
sākṣātkriyate

original: śrotṛṇāmapi hi tathāvidhasvacchaśabdānubhavadrāvitāntarātmanāṃ sahṛdayānāṃ svābhiprāyapratimudrā tatra saṃkrāmati /
analyzed: śrotṛṇām api hi tathāvidha su accha śabda anubhava drāvita antarātmanām sahṛdayānām sva abhiprāya pratimudrā tatra saṃkrāmati

original: ataḥ kaveryo 'sāvabhiprāyastadgocarīkṛtā bhūtā bhāvino 'pi padārthastatra sahṛdayaiḥ śrotṛbhiḥ svābhiprāyābhedena pratyakṣā iva dṛśyante /
analyzed: atas kaveḥ saḥ abhiprāyaḥ tad gocarīkṛtāḥ bhūtāḥ padārthaḥ tatra sahṛdayaiḥ śrotṛbhiḥ sva abhiprāya abhedena pratyakṣāḥ iva dṛśyante

original: yathā cātra śabdagatamanākulatvamanantaroktena prakāreṇa hetustathārthagatamapi citrodāttārthopanibandhahetukamatyadbhutatvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: yathā ca atra śabda gatam anākulatvam anantara uktena prakāreṇa hetuḥ tathā artha gatam api citra udātta artha upanibandha hetukam ati adbhuta tvam draṣṭavyam
tat uktam bhāvikam upakramya bhāmahena citra udātta adbhuta artha tvam kathāyām su abhinīta tā
śabda an ākula tā ca iti tasya hetūn pracakṣate iti
su abhinīta tā iti abhinaya ādi dvāreṇa śṛṅgāra ādi rasa saṃvalita tvam caturvarga upāyasya uktam
tat evam evaṃvidha hetu nibandhanam kavi śrotṛ bhāva dvitaya saṃmīlana ātmakam bhāvikam draṣṭavyam

original: ata eva cātra kavisaṃbandhino bhāvasya śrotṛbhāvābhedādhyavasitasya puraḥ--sphuradrūpasya vidyamānatvādbhāvikavyapadeśaḥ bhāvo 'smin vidyate  #
analyzed: atas eva ca atra kavi saṃbandhinaḥ bhāvasya śrotṛ bhāva abheda adhyavasitasya puras sphurat rūpasya vidyamāna tvāt bhāvika vyapadeśaḥ
iti bhāvikam
tat āhuḥ rasa ullāsī kaveḥ ātmā svacche
mādhurya ojaḥ yuta prauḍhe prativindya prakāśate
saṃpīta svaccha śabda artha drāvita abhyantaraḥ tatas

original: śrotā tatsāmyataḥ puṣṭiṃ caturvarge parāṃ vrajet“iti /
analyzed: śrotā tad sāmyataḥ puṣṭim caturvarge parām vraja iti
svacchaḥ iti prasāda guṇaḥ bhihitaḥ
prauḍha caturvarge parām vraja iti iti
svacchaḥ iti prasāda guṇaḥ bhihitaḥ
prauḍhaḥ iti tu sa alaṅkāra tā
saṃpītau samyak āsvāditau
tad sāmyataḥ iti su abhiprāya abhedena kavi gatasya abhiprāyasya adhyavasānāt iti arthaḥ
tasya udāharaṇam
karoṣi pīḍām prītim ca nirañjana vilocanā
mūrtyā anayā samudvīkṣya nānā ābharaṇa śobhayā
atra ābharaṇa ucita mūrti tve pi nirañjana vilocana tva upalakṣitāt ābharaṇa tyāgāt pīḍā
sahaja saundarya nirbhara tvena tu ābharaṇa saṃpādyāyāḥ śobhāyāḥ paridṛśyamāna tvāt prītiḥ

original: tenātra sāṃpratikapradhvaṃsābhāvopalakṣitatvādbhūṣaṇasaṃbandho vyatito 'pyadbhuto yo 'sau vapuḥprakarṣastadvaśena pratyatra iva kavinopanibaddhaḥ
analyzed: tena atra sāṃpratika pradhvaṃsa abhāva upalakṣita tvāt bhūṣaṇa saṃbandhaḥ pi adbhutaḥ yaḥ sau vapuḥ prakarṣaḥ tad vaśena pratyatre iva kavinā upanibaddhaḥ
tathā eva ca asau sahṛdayānām camatkāram āvahati

original: saṃtatamutkṛṣṭatayā vaicitryeṇa īkṣaṇīyā ābharaṇaśobhā yasyāmiti bahuvrīhiḥ /
analyzed: saṃtatam utkṛṣṭa tayā vaicitryeṇa īkṣaṇīyā ābharaṇa śobhā yasyām iti bahuvrīhiḥ
kāvye hetuḥ
śrutam ekam yat anyatra smṛteḥ anubhavasya vā
hetutām pratipadye kāvya liṅgam tat ucyate

original: yatra ekaṃ vastu śrutaṃ sadvastvantaraṃ smārayati anubhāvayati vā tatra kāvyaliṅgaṃ nāmālaṅkāraḥ /
analyzed: yatra ekam vastu śrutam sat vastu antaram smārayati anubhāvayati vā tatra kāvyaliṅgam nāma alaṅkāraḥ
pakṣa dharma tva anvaya vyatireka anusaraṇa garbha tayā yathā tārkika prasiddhāḥ hetavaḥ loka prasiddha vastu viṣaya tvena upanibadhyamānā

original: vairasyamāvahanti na tathā kāvyehetuḥ atiśayena sarveṣāṃ janānāṃ yosau hṛdayasaṃvādīsarasaḥ
analyzed: vairasyam āvahanti na tathā atiśayena sarveṣām janānām yaḥ asau hṛdaya saṃvādī sarasaḥ
padārthaḥ tad niṣṭha tayā upanibadhyamāna tvāt
atas kāvya liṅgam iti kāvya grahaṇam upāttam

original: na khalu tacchāstraliṅgaṃ kiṃ tarhi kāvyaliṅgamiti kāvyagrahaṇena pratipādyate /
analyzed: na khalu tat śāstra liṅgam kim tarhi kāvya liṅgam iti kāvya grahaṇena pratipādyate

kāvyasya sarasa tvāt

na tu nīrasam

ojaḥ gāḍha tā
prasādaḥ tu avyavadhānena
rasa abhivyakti anuguṇa tā
tat eteṣām trayāṇām guṇānām madhyāt prasādasya prādhānyam

original: mādhuryaujasostu tattadrasābhivyaktyānuguṇyena tāratamyenāvasthitayoḥ prasāda eva sopayogatā /
analyzed: mādhurya ojasoḥ tu tad tad rasa abhivyaktyā ānuguṇyena tāratamyena avasthitayoḥ prasādaḥ eva sopayogatā

original: evaṃ ca tatra tadrasānuguṇyena mādhuryaujobhyāṃ tāratamyenāvasthitābhyāṃ upakṛto
analyzed: evam ca tatra tad rasa ānuguṇyena mādhurya ojobhyām tāratamyena avasthitābhyām
sau prasāda ātmā rasānām avyavadhānena pratīti hetuḥ guṇaḥ tad upeta śabda artha śarīra tvena
kāvyasya avasthānāt sarasa tā eva bhavati
na tu nīrasa tā

original: yadyevamidānīṃ guṇaireva kṛtakṛtyatvātkāvyasyālaṅkārāṇāṃ tatra nirupayogatā prāpnoti /
analyzed: yadi evam idānīm guṇaiḥ eva kṛtakṛtya tvāt kāvyasya alaṅkārāṇām tatra nirupayoga tā prāpnoti
na evam guṇa āhita śobhe kāvye alaṅkārāṇām

original: yathāhi laukikānāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ guṇasaṃskṛte yuvativapuṣi nibadhyamānānāmalaṅkāratā evaṃ kāvyālaṅkārāṇāmapi draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: yathā hi laukikānām alaṅkārāṇām guṇa saṃskṛte yuvati vapuṣi nibadhyamānānām alaṅkāra tā evam kāvya alaṅkārāṇām api draṣṭavyam

original: nanu nirguṇe 'pi kāvye alaṅkārāṇāṃ guṇavacchobhāvidhāyitvaṃ kasmānneṣyate /
analyzed: nanu nirguṇe pi kāvye alaṅkārāṇām guṇavat śobhā vidhāyi tvam kasmāt na iṣyate
apara dṛṣṭa tvāt

original: na khalu nirguṇe kāvye nibadhyamānānāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ jaradyoṣidalaṅkāravacchobhāvidhāyitvaṃ dṛśyate /
analyzed: na khalu nirguṇe kāvye nibadhyamānānām alaṅkārāṇām jarat yoṣit alaṅkāra vat śobhā vidhāyi tvam dṛśyate
tathā hi

original: jaradyoṣityalaṅkārāṃ nibadhyamānā na tasyāḥ śobhāṃ hīyate /
analyzed: jarat yoṣiti alaṅkārām nibadhyamānā na tasyāḥ śobhām hīyate

original: tathāhi---jaradyoṣityalaṅkārā nibadhyamānā na tasyāḥ śobhāṃ kurvanti,
analyzed: tathā hi jarat yoṣiti alaṅkārāḥ nibadhyamānāḥ na tasyāḥ śobhām kurvanti

original: pratyuta tasyāṃ nibadhyamānānāṃ teṣāmātmīyameva saubhāgyaṃ hīyate /
analyzed: pratyuta tasyām nibadhyamānānām teṣām ātmīyam eva saubhāgyam hīyate

original: tathā kāvyālaṅkārāṇāmapi nirguṇe kāvye nibadhyamānānāṃ kāvyaśobhāhetutvābhāvaḥ svaśobhāhāniśca bhavati /
analyzed: tathā kāvya alaṅkārāṇām api nirguṇe kāvye nibadhyamānānām kāvya śobhā hetu tva abhāvaḥ sva śobhā hāniḥ ca bhavati

original: yadavocadbhaṭṭavāmanaḥ---“yuvateriva rūpamaṅga kāvyaṃ svadate śuddhaguṇaṃ tadapyatīva /
analyzed: yat avocat bhaṭṭa vāmanaḥ yuvateḥ iva rūpam aṅga kāvyam svadate śuddha guṇam tat api atīva
vihita praṇayam nirantarābhiḥ sat alaṅkāra vikalpa kalpanābhiḥ

original: yadi bhavati vacaścyutaṃ guṇebhyo vapuriva yauvanavandhyamaṅganāyāḥ /
analyzed: yadi bhavati vacaḥ cyutam guṇebhyaḥ vapuḥ iva yauvana vandhyam aṅganāyāḥ
api jana da yatāni durbhaga tvam niyatam alaṅkaraṇāni saṃśrayante
iti
aṅga śabdaḥ iṣṭa āmantraṇe
śuddha guṇa tvāt svadamānam sat alaṅkāra vikalpa kalpanābhiḥ vihita paricayam atiśayena svadate iti saṃbandhaḥ
atas eva alaṅkārāṇaām anitya tā
guṇa rahitam hi kāvyam akāvyam eva bhavati
na tu alaṅkāra rahitam
alaṅkārāṇām hi kāvyam akāvyam eva bhavati
na te alaṅkāra rahitam
alaṅkārāṇām guṇa upajanita śobhe kāvye śobhā atiśaya vidhāyi tvāt
tat uktam
kāvya śobhāyāḥ kartāraḥ dharmāḥ guṇāḥ
tad atiśaya hetavaḥ tu alaṅkārāḥ
pūrve nityāḥ
iti
pūrve iti guṇāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: lakṣye ca alaṅkārarahitamapi kevalaguṇasaṃskriyamāṇaśabdārthaśarīraṃ kāvyaṃ dṛśyate,
analyzed: lakṣye ca alaṅkāra rahitam api kevala guṇa saṃskriyamāṇa śabda artha śarīram kāvyam dṛśyate

original: yathā amarukasya kaveranibaddhaśṛṅgārarasasyandī ślokaḥ---“kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaprakalpatamaśrutam
analyzed: yathā amarukasya kaveḥ anibaddha śṛṅgāra rasa syandī ślokaḥ katham api kṛta pratyāpattau priye skhalita uttare viraha kṛśayā kṛtvā
asahana sakhī śrotra prāpti pramāda sa saṃbhramam vivalita dṛśā śūnye gehe samucchvasitam tatas
iti
na khalu atra artha laṅkāraḥ kaścid paridṛśyate
atha mādhurya ojobhyām paribṛṃhatasya prasādasya vidyamāna tvāt kāvya rūpa tā

original: nanu cātrāpi īrṣyāvipralambhavirahavipralambhaśṛṅgārābhyāṃ svatirodhānenopakṛtaḥ saṃbhogaśṛṅgāro nāyikāniṣṭho nibaddhastadyogācca rasavattvamalaṃ  #
analyzed: nanu ca atra api īrṣyā vipralambha viraha vipralambha śṛṅgārābhyām sva tirodhānena upakṛtaḥ saṃbhoga śṛṅgāraḥ nāyikā niṣṭhaḥ nibaddhaḥ tad yogāt ca rasavat tvam alam
bhaviṣyati

original: tathāhi 'kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye'ityatra bhāge virahavipralambhapūrvakaḥ priyatamacittasāṃmukhyātmā saṃbhogaśṛṅgāraḥ sūcitaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi katham api kṛta pratyāpattau priye iti atra bhāge viraha vipralambha pūrvakaḥ priyatama citta sāṃmukhya ātmā saṃbhoga śṛṅgāraḥ sūcitaḥ

original: ssvalitottara iti tu saṃjātagotraskhalitatvātpreyaso nāyikāyā īrṣyāvipralambhaśṛṃgāro nibaddhaḥ /
analyzed: ssvalita uttaraḥ iti tu saṃjāta gotra skhalita tvāt preyasaḥ nāyikāyāḥ īrṣyā vipralambha śṛṃgāraḥ nibaddhaḥ

original: punaśca virahakṛśayetyādibhistribhiḥ pādairavahitthena bhāvena nāyikādhāramīrṣyā vipralambhaśṛṅgāraṃ pracchādya saṃbhogaśṛṅgāreṇa cittollāsasūcitena  #
analyzed: punar ca viraha kṛśayā ityādibhiḥ tribhiḥ pādaiḥ avahitthena bhāvena nāyikā ādhāram īrṣyā vipralambha śṛṅgāram pracchādya saṃbhoga śṛṅgāreṇa citta ullāsa sūcitena
vākya artha samāptiḥ kṛtā
tathā hi viraha kṛśa ityādinā pādena nāyikā gataḥ manyuḥ avacchādya upadarśitaḥ
asahana sakhī ityādinā tu gotra skhalitasya sakhī śrotra prāptim viraha vipralambha kāraṇa tvena āśaṅkya

original: dṛṣṭiparāvṛttyā sakhījanaśūnye gṛhe paridṛṣṭe yattannayakayā samullasitaṃ tadupanibandhātsaṃbhogaśṛṅgāreṇa
analyzed: dṛṣṭi parāvṛttyā sakhī jana śūnye gṛhe paridṛṣṭe yat tat nayakayā samullasitam tad upanibandhāt saṃbhoga śṛṅgāreṇa
vākya arthaḥ nirvāhitaḥ
tat evam atra saṃbhogasya vapralambha vādhena labdha padabandhasya upanibandhāt rasavat tvam alaṅkāraḥ
tat katham atra niralaṅkāra tā uktā
ucyate
na khalu kāvyasya rasānām vā alaṅkārya alaṅkāra bhāvaḥ
kintu ātma śarīra bhāvaḥ
rasāḥ hi kāvayasya ātma tvena avasthitāḥ
śabda arthau ca śarīra rūpa tayā

original: yathā hyātmādhiṣṭhitaṃ śarīraṃ jīvatīti vyapadiśyate tathā rasādhiṣṭhitasya kāvyasya jīvadrūpatayā vyapadeśaḥ kriyate /
analyzed: yathā hi ātma adhiṣṭhitam śarīram jīvati iti vyapadiśyate tathā rasa dhiṣṭhitasya kāvyasya jīvat rūpa tayā vyapadeśaḥ kriyate
tasmāt rasānām kāvya śarīra bhūta śabda artha viṣaya tayā ātma tvena avasthānam
na tu alaṅkāra tayā

original: rasābhivyaktiśca yathāyogaṃ mādhuryaujobhyāṃ tāratamyenāvasthitābhyāmupabṛṃhito yo 'sau prasādātmā guṇastena kriyate /
analyzed: rasa abhivyaktiḥ ca yathāyogam mādhurya ojobhyām tāratamyena avasthitābhyām upabṛṃhitaḥ sau prasāda ātmā guṇaḥ tena kriyate
atas tra vipralambha śṛṅgāra upakṛtasya saṃbhoga śṛṅgārasya sa guṇa kāvya ātma tvena avasthānam

original: na tu kāvyaṃ prati alaṅkāratayeti yuktamidamuktaṃ niralaṅkāramapi kāvyaṃ saguṇaṃ dṛśyate iti /
analyzed: na tu kāvyam prati alaṅkāra tayā iti yuktam idam uktam niralaṅkāram api kāvyam sa guṇam dṛśyate iti

original: evaṃ rasāntareṣu bhāveṣu rasabhāvābhāseṣu tatpraśameṣu ca vācyam /
analyzed: evam rasa antareṣu bhāveṣu rasa bhāva ābhāseṣu tad praśameṣu ca vācyam
tat āhuḥ rasa ādi adhiṣṭhitam kāvyam jīvat rūpa tayā yatas
kathyate tat rasa ādīnām kāvya ātma tvam vyavasthitam
iti
yat tu rasa ādīnām pūrvam alaṅkāra tvam uktam tat evaṃvidha bheda avivakṣayā
tat evam guṇa saṃskṛta śabda artha śarīra tvāt sarasam eva kāvyam
yadi evam guṇa śūnya tvāt nīrase

original: vyākaraṇādau bharatādau ca kāvyavyapadeśo na prāptaḥ /
analyzed: vyākaraṇa ādau bharata ādau ca kāvya vyapadeśaḥ na prāptaḥ
tatas ca vṛtta deva ādi carita śaṃsi ca utpīdya vastu ca
kalā śāstra āśrayam ca iti caturdhā bhidyate punar
iti bhāmaha uditam virudhyate
atra hi kalā āśraya śabdena bharata ādi abhihitam
śāstra āśraya śabdena ca vyākaraṇa ādi
atas vaktavyam etat katham tatra kāvya vyapadeśaḥ iti
ucyate
mukhyayā tāvat vṛttyā guṇa saṃskṛta śabda artha śarīram eva kāvyam

original: guṇarahitaśabdārthaśarīre tu kvāyamātre kāvyaśabdasya kāvyasādṛśyādupacārātprayogo bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: guṇa rahita śabda artha śarīre tu kvāya mātre kāvya śabdasya kāvya sādṛśyāt upacārāt prayogaḥ bhaviṣyati
uktam ca kāvya śabdaḥ yam guṇa alaṅkāra saṃskṛtayoḥ śabda arthayoḥ varte
bhaktyā tu
bhaktyā iti upacāreṇa iti arthaḥ
tat evam guṇa saṃskṛta śabda artha śarīra tvāt kāvyasya sarasa tvam iti
tad viśiṣṭam kāvya liṅgam

original: sarasapadārthaniṣṭhameva bhavatiṣa na tu nīrasavastumātraniṣṭhaṃ śāstraliṅgavadityupapannam /
analyzed: sa rasa padārtha niṣṭham eva na tu nīrasa vastu mātra niṣṭham śāstra liṅga vat iti upapannam
tārkikāṇām ca hetu vyāpāre dvaividhyam

original: kecitkhalu tārkakā vyāptigrahaṇakāle yadanubhūtaṃ vyāpakaṃ vahnyādivastu dhūmādervyāpyasya tatsmaraṇamātre dhūmādihetudarśanaprabuddhasaṃskārāṇāṃ  #
analyzed: kecid khalu tārkakāḥ vyāpti grahaṇa kāle yat anubhūtam vyāpakam vahni ādi vastu dhūma ādeḥ vyāpyasya tad smaraṇa mātre dhūma ādi hetu darśana prabuddha saṃskārāṇām
puruṣāṇām hetu vyāpāram manyante

original: apare tu vahnyādīnāṃ parvatādidharmaviśeṣasaṃbandhasya pūrvamagṛhītasya dhūmādihetuvyāpārasāmarthyena idānīmeva avaseyatvālliṅgasāmarthyālliṅgyanubhavasyaiva  #
analyzed: apare tu vahni ādīnām parvata ādi dharma viśeṣa saṃbandhasya pūrvam agṛhītasya dhūma ādi hetu vyāpāra sāmarthyena idānīm eva avaseya tvāt liṅga sāmarthyāt liṅgi anubhavasya eva  /
utpattim āhuḥ
tat idam uktam smṛteḥ anubhavasya vā iti
tasya udāharaṇam
chāyā iyam tava śoṣa aṅga kānteḥ kiñcid anujjvalā
vibhūṣā ghaṭana uddeśān darśayantī dunoti mām

original: atra vibhūṣaṇavinyāsāspadabhūtā ye kaṇṭhādayastadavaśiṣṭānāmaṅgānāṃ yāsau kāntiḥ dīptiḥ tasyā anujjvalā malinā yāsau chāyā śobhā sā liṅgaṃ,
analyzed: atra vibhūṣaṇa vinyāsa āspada bhūtāḥ ye kaṇṭha ādayaḥ tad avaśiṣṭānām aṅgānām yā asau kāntiḥ dīptiḥ tasyāḥ anujjvalā malinā yā asau chāyā śobhā sā liṅgam
tad sāmarthyāt ca bhūṣā vinyāsa pradeśānām bhūṣaṇa saṃbandhaḥ numīyate
tena tat kāvya liṅgam
kāvya dṛṣṭāntaḥ
iṣṭasya arthasya vispaṣṭa pratibimba nidarśanam
yathevādi padaiḥ sūnyam budhaiḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ ucyate

original: iṣṭasya prākaraṇikatayā pratipādayitumabhimatasyārthasya yatra vispaṣṭatayā pratibimbaṃ sadṛśa vastu nidarśyate tatra kāvyadṛṣṭānto nāmālaṅkāraḥ
analyzed: iṣṭasya prākaraṇika tayā pratipādayitum abhimatasya arthasya yatra vispaṣṭa tayā pratibimbam vastu nidarśyate tatra kāvya dṛṣṭāntaḥ nāma alaṅkāraḥ
nanu kopāt ekatara āghāta nipatat matta dantinaḥ
hareḥ hariṇa yuddheṣu kiyān vyākṣepa vistaraḥ iti evamādau api aprastuta praśaṃsāyām iṣṭa artha pratibimba nidarśanam vidyate

original: tathāhi---atra rāmadevasya mārīcavadhe vyāpāro nirāyāso hariṇahananodyogikasarikiśorapratibimbitatvena nidarśitaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi atra rāma devasya mārīca vadhe vyāpāraḥ nirāyāsaḥ hariṇa hanana udyogika sari kiśora pratibimbita tvena nidarśitaḥ
atas dṛṣṭānta tā prasaṅgaḥ
na etat
yatas etad artham eva vispaṣṭa grahaṇam upāttam

original: atra hi pratibambādeva bimbasyonnayanādvispaṣṭarūpatayā iṣṭasyārthasya pratibimbanidarśanaṃ nāsti /
analyzed: atra hi pratibambāt eva bimbasya unnayanāt vispaṣṭa rūpa tayā iṣṭasya arthasya pratibimba nidarśanam na asti

original: yatra tu iṣṭamarthaṃ svakaṇṭhenopādāya tasya pratibimbamupadarśyate tatra dṛṣṭāntatvam /
analyzed: yatra tu iṣṭam artham sva kaṇṭhena upādāya tasya pratibimbam upadarśyate tatra dṛṣṭānta tvam
atas na a ta vyāptiḥ

original: upamādāvapyetvaṃvidhasya rūpasya saṃbhava iti tannirākaraṇārthamuktam---yathevādipadaiḥ śūnyamiti /
analyzed: upamā ādau api e tvaṃvidhasya rūpasya saṃbhavaḥ iti tad nirākaraṇa artham uktam yathevādi padaiḥ śūnyam iti
ādi grahaṇena atra sādhāraṇa dharmasya api parigrahaḥ
tasya udāharaṇam
kiñca atra bahunā uktena vraja bhartāram āpnuhi
udanvantam an āsādya mahā nadyaḥ kim āsate
atra bhagavatī kartṛkāyāḥ vara prāpteḥ mahānadī kartṛkā pratibimba tvena upanibaddhā
atas dṛṣṭāntaḥ
evam ete ṣṭaka ṣaṭka trika saptaka ekādaśaka ṣaṭkaiḥ ṣaṅbhiḥ vargaiḥ ekacatvāriṃśat alaṅkārāḥ pratipāditāḥ

original: nanu yatra kāvye sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinaḥ pradhānabhūtasya svaśabvyāpārāspṛṣṭatvena
analyzed: nanu yatra kāvye sahṛdaya hṛdaya āhlādinaḥ pradhāna bhūtasya sva śabda vyāpāra a spṛṣṭa tvena
pratīyamāna eka rūpasya arthasya sadbhavaḥ tatra tathāvidha artha abhivyakti hetuḥ kāvyajīvata bhūtaḥ
kaiścana sahṛdayaiḥ dhvaniḥ nāma vyañjaka tva bheda ātmā kāvya dharmaḥ bhihitaḥ
sa kasmāt iha na upadiṣṭaḥ
ucyate
eṣu eva alaṅkāreṣu antarbhāvāt
tathā hi pratīyamāna eka rūpasya vastu traividhyam taiḥ uktam vastu mātra alaṅkāra rasa ādi bhedena
tatra vastu mātram tāvat pratīyate yathā
cakra abhighāta prasabha ājñayā eva cakāra yaḥ rāhu vadhū janasya
āliṅgana uddāma vilāsa vandhyam rata utsavam cumbana mātra śeṣam
iti

original: atra hi rāhuvadhūratotsavasya yā cumbanamātreśeṣatā tatkarmakā cakrābhighātaprasabhājñākaraṇikā cakāreti karaṇalakṣaṇā kriyābhidhīyate / sā
analyzed: atra hi rāhu vadhū rata utsavasya yā cumbana mātra īśeṣa tā tad karmakā cakra abhighāta prasabha ājñā karaṇikā cakāra iti karaṇa lakṣaṇā kriyā abhidhīyate sā
ca evaṃvidhā kārya bhūta tvāt kāraṇam antareṇa anupapadyamānā tathāvidha vairasya kāri rāhu śiraḥ cheda lakṣaṇam kāraṇam na alaṅkāra rūpam
na api rasa ādi rūpam
api tu vastu mātra rūpam kalpayati
atas tra vastu mātrasya evaṃvidhasya śabda vyāpāra a spṛṣṭasya pratīyamāna tā

original: tadviṣayasya ca kāvyadharmasya dhvananābhidhānasya vācyavācakavyāpāraśūnyāvagamanasvabhāvatvātparyāyoktālaṅkārasparś itvaṃ, taduktam----
analyzed: tad viṣayasya ca kāvya dharmasya dhvanana abhidhānasya vācya vācaka vyāpāra śūnya avagamana svabhāva tvāt paryāyokta alaṅkāra sparś tat uktam
paryāya uktam yat anyena etyādi

original: nanu paryāyoktaśabdena prakārāntareṇa ucyamāntvātpratīyamānaṃ vastu abhidhīyate /

tat ca iha pratīyamānam
pradhāna tvāt alaṅkārya tayā vaktum yuktam

ucyate
pradhānam api guṇānām saundarya hetu tvāt alaṅkṛtau sādhana tvam bhajati

original: dṛśyate hi loke vyapadeśaḥ svāmyalaṅkaraṇakā bhṛtyā iti /
analyzed: dṛśyate hi loke vyapadeśaḥ svāmi alaṅkaraṇakāḥ bhṛtyāḥ iti

original: ato 'trāpi pratīyamānasya satyapi pradhānatve svaguṇabhūtavācyasaundaryasādhakatamatvādalaṅkāravyapadeśo na virudhyate /
analyzed: pratīyamānasya sati api pradhāna tve sva guṇa bhūta vācya saundarya sādhakatama tvāt alaṅkāra vyapadeśaḥ na virudhyate

original: yadi vā bhagavadvāsudevavartitayā yo 'sau vīraraso 'vagamyate tadapekṣayā tasya mukhyayaiva vṛttyā guṇabhūtatvādalaṅkāratā /

original: kāmaṃ santu dṛḍhaṃ kaṭhorahṛdayo rāmo 'smi sarvaṃ sahe
analyzed: kāmam santu dṛḍham kaṭhora hṛdayaḥ smi sarvam sahe

original: vaidehī tu kathaṃ bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava” //
analyzed: vaidehī tu katham bhaviṣyati hahā hā devi dhīrā bhava
iti evamādau api rāma ādīnām śabdānām asādhāraṇa rūpatayā rājya bhraṃśa vana vāsa sītā haraṇa pitṛ maraṇa ādayaḥ
duḥkha eka hetavaḥ svārtha sahacāriṇaḥ vastu mātra rūpāḥ vyaṅgya dharmāḥ tad pariṇata rūpa tayā
svārthasya pratītiḥ tad vetu bhūta tvāt paryāya ukta alaṅkāra saṃsparśi tā eva

original: na khalu pade paryāyoktena bhavitavyamitīyaṃ rājñāmājñā sūtrakāravacanaṃ vā /
analyzed: na khalu pade paryāya uktena bhavitavyam iti iyam rājñām ājñā sūtra kāra vacanam vā

original: tasmānna vastumātre pratīyamāne tadabhivyaktihetuḥ kāvyadharmo dhvanirnāmārthāntaram //
analyzed: tasmāt na vastu mātre pratīyamāne tad abhivyakti hetuḥ kāvya dharmaḥ dhvaniḥ nāma arthāntaram
alaṅkārāṇām tu yadi api
lāvaṇya kānti paripūrita diś bhukhe smin
smere dhunā tava mukhe tarala āyata akṣi

original: kṣobhaṃ yadeti na manāgapi tena manye
analyzed: kṣobham yadā iti na manāk api tena manye
su vyaktam eva jala rāśiḥ ayam payodhiḥ
ityādau pratīyamāna eka rūpa tā
tathā api anantara ukta lakṣaṇeṣu alaṅkāreṣu anupraveśaḥ bhaviṣyati paryāyokte vā

original: tathā hyatra śloke mukhyasya lāvaṇyakāntiparipūritadiṅbhukhasya vikasitahāsajyotsnasya
analyzed: tathā hi atra śloke mukhyasya lāvaṇya kānti paripūrita diṅbhukhasya vikasita hāsa jyotsnasya

saṃbhāvya tad bhāvaḥ jāḍya samūha avacchādita svabhāva tvāt abhihitaḥ

original: tathāvidhārthaparyālocanayā cātra mukhasya candreṇa rūpaṇā pratīyate /

original: na ca yasyālaṅkārasya pratīyamānarūpatā tasyehālaṅkāratvaṃ kenacinnivāritamiti pratīyamānarūpatayā rūpakākhyo 'laṅkāro bhaviṣyati /

athavā paryāyoktyā rūpakasya atra avasata tvāt paryayoktam alaṅkāraḥ

original: bahulābhatvasya tatsadṛśasya yā lakṣaṇā taddvāreṇa garbhīkṛtopamānopameyabhāvā asaṃbhavadvācyārthā
analyzed: bahu lābha tvasya tad sadṛśasya yā lakṣaṇā tad dvāreṇa garbhīkṛta upamāna upameya bhāvā asaṃbhavat vācyārthā
nidarśanā draṣṭavyā

sarva eka śaraṇam akṣayam adhīśam īśam dhiyām harim kṛṣṇam
catur ātmānam niṣkriyam ari mathanam namata cakradharam
ityādau api śleṣaḥ

original: tathā hyatra sarvaikaśaraṇamakṣayamityādīnāṃ śabdānāmarthabhedena bhinnatve sati yathāyogamekaprayatnoccāryāṇāmekapratayatnoccāryaśabdasadṛśānāṃ  #

vā uccāraṇam

pratīyamāna tāyām udāharaṇam

nirdhyātam parivartanam punar api prārabdhum aṅgīkṛtam
bhūyas tata prakṛtam kṛtam ca śithila kṣipta eka dos lekhayā

original: tanvaṅgyā na tu pāritaḥ stanabharaḥ ṛṣṭuṃ priyasyorasaḥ” //

original: tathā hi--atra gotraskhalitasya śrutipathaprāpterīrṣyāvipralambhaśṛṅgāro nāyikāyāḥ saṃmukhībhūto 'pi saṃbhogaśṛṅgāreṇa svahetusāmagryapratilabdhaprakarṣeṇa  #

tirodhāya pradarśitaḥ

darśana prārthanā adhyavasāya anuṣṭhāna ātmikāḥ catasraḥ vasthāḥ saṃbhoga śṛṅgāra mantharīkṛta sva svabhāva tvena upavarṇitāḥ

original: punaśca saṃbhogaśṛṅgāreṇa vākyārtho nirvāhito 'na tu pāritaḥ'ityādinā /
analyzed: punar ca saṃbhoga śṛṅgāreṇa vākya arthaḥ nirvāhitaḥ na tu pāritaḥ ityādinā

original: yatrāpi bhāvastathā rasabhāvābhāsā rasabhāvatadābhāsapraśamāśca pratīyamānāstatrāpi yathākramaṃ preyasvadūrjasvitsamāhitalakṣaṇālaṅkārayogo  #
analyzed: yatra api bhāvaḥ tathā rasa bhāva ābhāsāḥ rasa bhāva tad ābhāsa praśamāḥ ca pratīyamānāḥ tatra api yathākramam preyasvat ūrjasvit samāhita lakṣaṇa alaṅkāra yogaḥ
vācyaḥ
evam etat pradhāna bhūteṣu rasa ādiṣu uktam

original: guṇabhūteṣvapi ca raseṣūdāttālaṅkāraḥ pratipāditaḥ 'caritaṃ ca mahātmanām'ityādinā /
analyzed: guṇa bhūteṣu api ca raseṣu udātta alaṅkāraḥ pratipāditaḥ caritam ca mahātmanām ityādinā
atas ca rasa ādiṣu abhivyañjaka tvasya na artha antara tā

original: evaṃ ca trividhe 'pi pratīyamāner'the yacchaṣṭhānāṃ vyañjakatvamanantaropavarṇiteṣūdāharaṇeṣu ṣaṭūprakāratayopadarśitaṃ tasyokteṣvevālaṅkāreṣvantarbhāvādyvāptiḥ
analyzed: evam ca trividhe pratīyamāna irthe vyañjaka tvam anantara upavarṇiteṣu udāharaṇeṣu tasya ukteṣu eva alaṅkāreṣu antarbhāvāt yvāptiḥ

original: ṣaṭprakāratā cātra trividhapratīyamānārthaniṣṭhasyāpi vyañjakatvasya vācyasya vivakṣitatvāvivakṣitatvābhyāmukta /
analyzed: ṣaṣ prakāra tā ca atra trividha pratīyamāna artha niṣṭhasya api vyañjaka tvasya vācyasya
tathā hi dvividham vyañjaka tvam
vācaka śakti āśrayam vācya śakti āśrayam ca
tatra vācaka śakti āśrayam alaṅkārāṇām eva vyaṅgya tvāt eka prakāram
tatra hi alaṅkārāḥ eva vyajyante
na tu vastu mātram na apara sa ādayaḥ yat uktam
ākṣiptaḥ eva alaṅkāraḥ śabda śaktyā prakāśate
yasmin anuktaḥ śabdena śabda śakti udbhavaḥ hi saḥ
iti
vācya śakti āśrayam tu rasa ādi vastu mātra alaṅkāra abhivyakti hetu tvāt trividham

original: tatra yattāvadvācakaśaktyā śrayaṃ vyaṅgyabhūtālaṅkāraikaniyataṃ śabdaśaktimūlānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgayatayā sahṛdayairvyañjakatvāmuktaṃ “sarvaikaśaraṇamakṣayam“ityādau,
analyzed: tatra yat tāvat vācaka śaktyā śrayam vyaṅgya bhūta alaṅkāra eka niyatam śabda śakti mūla anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgaya tayā sahṛdayaiḥ vyañjaka tvām uktam sarva eka śaraṇam akṣayam ityādau

original: tatra śabdaśaktyā ye pratīyante virodhādayo 'laṅkārāstatsaṃskṛtasvabhāvaṃ vācyamavagamyete /
analyzed: tatra śabda śaktyā ye pratīyante virodha ādayaḥ laṅkārāḥ tad saṃskṛta svabhāvam vācyam avagamyete
atas ca tra vācyasya vivakṣā eva

original: yattu vācyaśaktyāśrayaṃ “yāte gotraviparyaye śrutipatham“ityādāvasaṃlakṣyakramarasādivyaṅgyaniṣṭhaṃ vyañjakatvamuktaṃ tatrāpi vācyasya vivakṣitatvameva
analyzed: yat tu vācya śakti āśrayam yāte gotra viparyaye śruti patham ityādau asaṃlakṣya krama rasa ādi vyaṅgya niṣṭham vyañjaka tvam uktam tatra api vācyasya vivakṣita tvam eva
vācya bhūta anubhāva ādi vivakṣayā eva vyaṅgya rasa ādi pratīteḥ utpādāt

original: tadevaṃ vācakaśaktyāśrayavyaṅgyabhūtālaṅakāraikaniyate vācyaśaktyāśraye cāsaṃlakṣyakramarasādivyaṅgyaniṣṭhe vyañjakatve vācyasya vivakṣitatvameva
analyzed: tat evam vācaka śakti āśraya vyaṅgya bhūta alaṅakāra eka niyate vācya śakti āśraye ca asaṃlakṣya krama rasa ādi vyaṅgya niṣṭhe vyañjaka tve vācyasya vivakṣita tvam eva

original: vastumātrālaṅkāraviṣayasya tu vācyaśaktyāśrayasya vyañjakatvasya pratyekaṃ vācyasya vivakṣitatvāvivakṣitatvābhyāṃ dvaividhyam /
analyzed: vastu mātra alaṅkāra viṣayasya tu vācya śakti āśrayasya vyañjaka tvasya pratyekam vācyasya vivakṣita tva avivakṣita tvābhyām dvaividhyam

original: tathāhi 'cakrābhighātaprasabhājñaye'tyādau vastuviṣaye vyañjakatve vācyasya vivakṣitatvaṃ kāryavivakṣāpūrvakatvena kāraṇapratītiprasavāt /
analyzed: tathā hi cakra abhighāta prasabha ājñayā ityādau vastu viṣaye vyañjaka tve vācyasya vivakṣita tvam kārya vivakṣā pūrvaka tvena kāraṇa pratīti prasavāt
snigdha śyāmala kānti ityādau tu rāma ādi śabdānām artha antara saṃkramita vācyānām vācyam avivakṣitam
vyaṅgya dharma antara pariṇata tvāt
eva vastu mātra viṣaye vyañjaka tve vācyasya vivakṣā avivakṣe
laṅkāra viṣaye pi vācya śakti āśraye vyañjaka tve
lāvaṇya kānti ityādau ekasmin manye iti etasmin śabde yaḥ viśeṣa ukti utprekṣayoḥ anupraveśaḥ tad vaśena
samāsādita svabhāvaḥ sau eka śabda abhidhāna saṃkaraḥ vācyam vivakṣitam
tad mūlaka tvena rūpaka pratīteḥ utpādāt
suvarṇa puṣpām pṛthivīm ityādau tu vācyasya avivakṣā

original: upameyasya bahulābhatvasya tatsadṛśasya yā lakṣaṇā tasyā atyantatiraskṛtavācyamūlatvāt /
analyzed: upameyasya bahu lābha tvasya tad sadṛśasya yā lakṣaṇā tasyāḥ atyanta tiraskṛta vācya mūla tvāt
yadi tu atra na tiṭ antena upamānam asti iti tad bhāva adhyavasānāt suvarṇa puṣpa pṛthivī cayana lakṣaṇa upamāna avacchādita rūpa tvena
śūra ādi viṣayasya bahu lābha tvasya upameyasya prauḍhā uktyā pratipattiḥ
tatas tra prauḍha ukti mātra niṣpanna śarīrasya vācyasya arthasya prādhānyā a bhede na anya tvam iti evam ātmaka tayā upavarṇitam atiśayokti bheda tvam vācyam
vyaṅgyā hi upamā tadānīm atra guṇībhavati
evam alaṅkāra niṣṭhasya api vyañjaka tvasya vācya vivakṣita tva avivakṣita tvābhyām dvaividhyam

original: yatra cāvivakṣā vācyasya vastuniṣṭhe 'laṅkāraniṣṭhe vā vyañjakatve tatra vyaṅgyarasāderjhagityavagamyamānatvādasaṃlakṣyakramatā draṣṭavyā /
analyzed: yatra ca avivakṣā vācyasya vastu niṣṭhe laṅkāra niṣṭhe vā vyañjaka tve tatra vyaṅgya rasa ādeḥ jha giti avagamyamāna tvāt asaṃlakṣyakramatā draṣṭavyā
yat uktam bhaṭṭa vāmanena lakṣaṇāyām hi jha c iti artha pratipatti kṣamatvam rahasyam ācakṣate iti

original: ata eva ca sahṛdayairyatra vācyasya vivakṣitatvaṃ tatraiva vastvalaṅkārayoḥ pratīyamānayorvācyena saha kramavyavahāraḥ pravartitor'thaśaktimūlānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyo
analyzed: atas eva ca sahṛdayaiḥ yatra vācyasya vivakṣita tvam tatra eva vastu alaṅkārayoḥ pratīyamānayoḥ vācyena saha krama vyavahāraḥ pravartita ūrtha śakti mūla anuraṇana rūpa vyaṅgyaḥ
na tu vācya vivakṣāyām api

original: yatra ca vācyasyāvavakṣā pūrvamuktā “rāmo 'smī'ti 'suvarṇapuṣpā'miti ca tatra vayamadhikāropetaprastutārthānubandhivastūpanibandhādaprastutapraśaṃsābhedatvameva  #
analyzed: yatra ca vācyasya avavakṣā pūrvam uktā smi iti ca tatra vayam adhikāra upeta prastuta artha anubandhi vastu upanibandhāt aprastuta praśaṃsā bheda tvam eva
nyāyyam manyāmahe
yat uktam adhikārāt apetasya ityādi

original: yattu pūrvaparyāyoktabhedatvaṃ 'snigdhaśyāmalakāntī'tyādau rāmādīnāṃ śabdānāmabhihitaṃ tadupakramamātrarūpatayā draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: yat tu pūrva paryāya ukta bheda tvam snigdha śyāmala kānti ityādau rāma ādīnām śabdānām abhihitam tat upakrama mātra rūpatayā draṣṭavyam
vivakṣita vācyasya paryāya ukta bheda tvāt

original: yatra khalu vācyavivakṣāpūrvakatvena arthāntaraṃ pratīyate 'cakrābhighāte'tyādāvudāharaṇacatuṣṭaye tatra paryāyoktabhedatā /
analyzed: yatra khalu vācya vivakṣā pūrvaka tvena artha antaram pratīyate cakra abhighāta ityādau udāharaṇa catuṣṭaye tatra paryāya ukta bheda tā
yatra tu avivakṣite pratītiḥ tatra aprastuta praśaṃsā
atas ca paryāyokta aprastuta praśaṃsayoḥ eva yathākramam vivakṣita avivakṣita vācyayoḥ sarva dhvani bheda sāmānya bhūtayoḥ dhvani bhedayoḥ antargatiḥ vācyā
suvarṇa puṣpām pṛthivīm ityādau tu vidarśana abheda tvam yat pūrvam uktam tad adhikāra upeta prastuta artha anubandhi vastu upanibandha ātmatvena asaṃbhavat vācyāyāḥ
vidarśanāyāḥ aprastuta praśaṃsā bheda tvāt upapadyate eva
etat ca vidvadbhiḥ vicārya gṛhītavyam na tu avamṛśya eva asūyitavyam iti alam ati vacāla tayā

original: tadevaṃ vācakaśaktamūle 'laṅkāraikaniyate vācyaśaktimūle ca rasādiviṣaye vyañjakatve vācyasya vivakṣitatvaikarūpatvam /
analyzed: tat evam vācaka śakta mūle laṅkāra eka niyate vācya śakti mūle ca rasa ādi viṣaye vyañjaka tve vācyasya vivakṣita tva eka rūpa tvam

original: vastvalaṅkāraviṣaye tu vācyaśaktimūle vyañjakatve pratyekaṃ vācyasya vivakṣitatvāvivakṣitatvābhyāṃ dvibhedatā /
analyzed: vastu alaṅkāra viṣaye tu vācya śakti mūle vyañjaka tve pratyekam vācyasya vivakṣita tva avivakṣita tvābhyām dvi bheda tā
atas tad samāśrayaṇena trividha pratīyamāna artha niṣṭhasya api vyañjaka tvasya ṣaṣ prakāra tā bhavati
eteṣām ca ṣaṇṇām bhedānām madhyāt dvayoḥ bhedayoḥ vācyasya avivakṣā uktā
caturṣu vivakṣita tvam

original: yatra ca vivakṣitatvaṃ tatra vācyasya svataḥsaṃbhavitvātprauḍhoktimātraniṣpāditaśarīratvācca dvaividhyam /
analyzed: yatra ca vivakṣita tvam tatra vācyasya svataḥsaṃbhavi tvāt prauḍha ukti mātra niṣpādita śarīra tvāt ca dvaividhyam
atas tatra tasya aṣṭau bhedāḥ bhavanti

original: ete cāṣṭau bhedā vācyasya yatrāvivakṣā tadviṣayābhyāṃ pūrvoditābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ bhe dābhyāṃ saṃkalitāḥ santo daśa saṃpadyante /
analyzed: ete ca aṣṭau bhedāḥ vācyasya yatra avivakṣā tad viṣayābhyām pūrva uditābhyām dvābhyām saṃkalitāḥ santaḥ daśa saṃpadyante

original: eta eva tu padavākyaprakāśyatayā dvaiguṇyaṃ bhajamānā viṃśatirbhavti /
analyzed: ete eva tu pada vākya prakāśya tayā dvaiguṇyam bhajamānā viṃśatiḥ bhavti
varṇa saṃghaṭanā prabandha ādhārasya vyañjaka tvasya ca pada vākya anupraveśena eva āvirbhāvāt
pada prakāśya tve yathā rāmaḥ smi iti
cakra abhidhātā ityādau tu vākya prakāśya tā

original: yathā ca pradhānabhūte vyaṅgye eṣā vyañjakatā rviśatividhā bhavati,
analyzed: yathā ca pradhāna bhūte vyaṅgye eṣā vyañjaka tā rviśatividhā bhavati
tathā guṇībhūte pi yathāsaṃbhavam yojyā iti
tat āhuḥ
vivakṣyam avivakṣyam ca vastu alaṅkāra gocare
bheda ṣaṭke caturdhā yat vācyam uktam vivakṣitam
svataḥsaṃbhavi vā tat syāt atha vā prauḍhi nirmitam
daśa bhedāḥ dhvaneḥ ete viṃśatiḥ pada vākyataḥ
pradhāna badbhuṇībhūte vyaṅgye prāyeṇa te tathā
iti

original: vastvalaṅkāravācye dhvanau pratyekaṃ vācyaṃ vivakṣyamavivakṣyaṃ ceti saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: vastu alaṅkāra vācye dhvanau pratyekam vācyam vivakṣyam avivakṣyam ca iti saṃbandhaḥ
vivakṣyam iti vivakṣā arham iti arthaḥ

original: śabdaśaktirasāspada iti vācyakaśaktasamāśrayaṃ rasādivyaṅgyaniṣṭhaṃ ca vyañjakatvamuktam /
analyzed: śabda śakti rasa āspade iti vācyaka śakta samāśrayam rasa ādi vyaṅgya niṣṭham ca vyañjaka tvam uktam
tad viśiṣṭa śaktim vyañjaka bhūtām rasa ādīn ca vyaṅgya bhūtān āspadīkaroti
evam etat yvañjaka tvam
paryāya ukta ādiṣu antar bhāvitam
etat ca iha bahu vaktavya tvāt na vaitatyena prapañcitam

original: kuśāgrīyabuddhīnāṃ hi diṅbhātra evopadarśite sati buddhivallī pratānaśatairnānādigvayāpitvena vistāramāsādayatīti //
analyzed: kuśa agrīya buddhīnām hi diś bhātre eva upadarśite sati buddhi vallī pratāna śataiḥ nānā diś vayāpi tvena vistāram āsādayati iti
mīmāṃsā sāra meghāt pada jaladhi vidhoḥ tarkamāṇikya kośāt
sāhitya śrī murāreḥ budha kusuma madhoḥ śauri pāda abja bhṛṅgāt
śrutvā saujanya sindhoḥ dvijavara mukulat kīrtivallī ālavālāt
kāvyālaṅkārasāre laghu vivṛtim adhāt kauṅkaṇaḥ śrī indurājaḥ
iti mahā śrī pratīhāra indurāja viracitayām udbhaṭa alaṅkārasārasaṃgraha laghu vṛttau ṣaṣṭaḥ vargaḥ
